The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . Taking their second loss in a row , the Magic were finally eliminated from playoff contention in the East . The Hawks , on the other hand , continued to build their lead as the top overall projected playoff seed . Despite losing five of their last ten games , they 're still eight and a half games ahead of the second place Cleveland Cavaliers . Both teams struggled shooting the ball , as the Hawks went 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic finished at 45 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . The Hawks were led by Nikola Vucevic , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field to score 21 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his third double - double over his last four games , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 15 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Al Horford finished with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and 13 rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on all eight attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him after struggling with his shot against the Pelicans on Sunday . Channing Frye added 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt ) and three rebounds off the bench . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) handled the Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 at the O2 in London , England on Thursday . Milwaukee jumped out to an early 22 - 21 lead and never looked back , as the lead reached as many as 31 points in the third quarter . The Knicks mounted a mini - comeback midway through the fourth , cutting the lead to 12 at one point , but a pair of Zaza Pachulia free throws followed by an O.J . Smith three - pointers , finished with 17 points and three rebounds . Brandon Knight led the Bucks in scoring with 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , and he added five assists and two rebounds . Zaza Pachulia posted a double - double with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . J.R. Smith had a solid all - around night as well , as he scored 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) , to go with seven rebounds , four assists and one block in 37 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Knicks in scoring with 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt ) , along with 12 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 30 minutes . Tim Hardaway Jr. was the only other Knicks player to score in double digits , as he chipped in 17 points , along with seven rebounds , in 20 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double figures for the Bucks was Johnny Aldrich , who tallied a double - double with 10 points and 14 rebounds , in 31 minutes . The Bucks shot only 46 percent from the field but turned the ball over 22 times , compared to Charlotte’s five . Up next , the Bucks take on the Warriors on Saturday . The Bucks play host to the Knicks on Friday night .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 - 0 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the FedExForum in Phoenix . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 46 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were also able to force the Suns into 18 turnovers , while only committing 16 of their own . The Grizzlies were led by the duo of Eric Bledsoe and Courtney Lee . Bledsoe finished with a team - high of 24 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , to go along with two steals , while Morris finished with 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds . Lee has been on a bit of late , scoring only 20 points in one of his last four games , so it was good to see him return to form . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Isaiah Thomas , who recorded 15 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and two assists in 26 minutes . Since joining the Suns 8 games ago , he 's averaged 27 points , 13 rebounds and 8 assists , as he 's really stepped up lately for the injury plagued Grizzlies . Zach Randolph did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) , six rebounds and two steals in 29 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Suns will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Saturday night . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Detroit , as they shot 46 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Raptors really turned it on , as they outscored the Pistons 25 to 31 . The Pistons actually dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 37 boards to the Pistons 44 . Detroit came into this game as a small favorite , but couldn’t muster up enough late to pull out the road win . The bench was the only reason they played so well , as they scored 41 bench points to go along with an impressive 31 rebounds . Andre Drummond had his worst game of the season , as he tallied 14 points , eight rebounds and one block while dealing with foul trouble of his own . Detroit will have to play again on Monday in the second half of a back - to - back , as they 'll have to travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs . The Raptors appear to be finally putting it all together and it 's likely as simple as health . DeMar DeRozan had one of his best games of the season though , as he tallied 25 points , six rebounds and four assists in the defeat . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double , totaling 20 points and 16 rebounds . Up next for the Raptors is a matchup against the New York Knicks on Tuesday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . While currently riding an eight - game losing streak , the Pistons were able to overcome the drought and secured a victory in a double - overtime thriller . With just six seconds left in regulation , Jabari Parker came up clutch for the Pistons and hit a three - point shot to tie the game , but the Pistons just ran out of time and gave the Pistons a one - point game . The Pistons were able to out - score the Bucks 22 - 18 in the fourth quarter , therefore setting them up to pull off an impressive 11 - point win in front of their home crowd . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this one , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 49 percent from the floor and 58 percent from beyond the arc . Khris Middleton led the Pistons , going 11 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding two assists . He 's combined for 57 points over his last two games , so he continues to ride the hot hand . Morris on the other hand also recorded 22 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) of his own , to go along with eight rebounds and two steals . He 's had a nice stretch of three games , averaging 17 points and 7 rebounds over that span . Marcus Morris chipped in with 20 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds as well . Doing his best to keep the Bucks in the game was Khris Middleton . Middleton went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now averaging 10 points and 3 rebounds on the season . Jabari Parker had a solid all - around game . He recorded 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and three assists in 50 minutes . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Marcus Morris was dialed in with his shot as well , going 8 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 20 points . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .
Giannis Antetokounmpo has been a model of consistency for the Bucks all season long and Tuesday night was his most impressive performance of the season , as he posted 34 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and five steals . The 34 points was a season - high , while the 12 rebounds was his second highest total of the season . Tuesday also marked the second time this year Antetokounmpo recorded 34 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and five steals as he continues to stuff the stat sheet as well as any player in the NBA . However , it was the play of Michael Beasley that may have been just as , if not more , important for Milwaukee 's upset victory . Beasley 's 17 points Tuesday night were his second highest total of the season and the seventh time he has reach double - digit scoring . In those seven games , the Bucks are 6 - 1 , as Beasley 's contributions off the bench have had a positive effect on Milwaukee 's offensive attack . Wednesday 's performance marked the second time in the last nine games that Antetokounmpo has scored at least 20 points and four rebounds with at least 19 points , two rebounds and three assists . On top of all of that , Love is shooting 52 percent from the field in those 19 games , and has failed to score more than 8 points in any game this season . So , while the 12 turnovers per game is n't a rarity for this team and this is a great sign going forward .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Saturday . LeBron James was once again the story of the night as he torched the Celtics for his sixth 27 - point performance of the season . James finished the night with 27 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists on 10 - of - 24 shooting in the 46 - point performance . Kevin Love ( ankle ) returned to the lineup after a one - game absence and finished with two points and one assist in 17 minutes . Jared Sullinger played just eight minutes , and his role appears to be getting reduced as the Cavaliers ' other big men continue to excel . LeBron James scored 27 points to lead all scorers and added 10 rebounds and eight assists in 46 minutes . The Celtics shot 40 percent from the field as a team and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Cavaliers host the Phoenix Suns ( 0 - 4 ) on Monday , while the Cavaliers host the Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 8 ) on Tuesday . Cleveland was playing the second game of a back - to - back Wednesday after Tuesday 's 127 - 118 track meet in Phoenix . The Celtics relied heavily on their three - point shooting , but to no avail as they shot just 6 - 44 from beyond the arc . The Celtics begin a three - game road trip Monday against the New York Knicks .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 114 - 101 on Tuesday night . In a battle of one of the best offenses in the NBA , the defenses showed their true form . The key for Oklahoma City was their rebounding , as they brought down 54 boards to the Bucks 31 . Oklahoma City has been playing better ball recently , but this was a baffling loss . Giannis Antetokounmpo flirted with a triple - double in this win , as he accumulated 28 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Oklahoma City were led by Russell Westbrook , who totaled 28 points , 5 rebounds , seven assists and three steals in the victory . Those are the types of performances the Thunder need from Durant all season if they are to compete for an NBA title . That is the beauty of having Westbrook and Westbrook . That 's a recipe for disaster , especially when you 're not shooting the three - ball well . In any case , they still pulled out a win in impressive comeback fashion and got back to .500 . Giannis Antetokounmpo was a force , as he tallied 28 points , five rebounds and seven assists in the win . O.J. Mayo also made his return from a one - game absence and that 's a silver lining in a tough result . The 22 - game winning streak is over , but it 's time to reflect and appreciate how special of a run that actually was . Milwaukee wo n't play again until Sunday , when they play the Milwaukee Bucks in their next fixture .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the New York Knicks in quadruple overtime , 142 - 139 , at Phillips Arena on Sunday . A game that started off with very little defense being played over the first two quarters ended up becoming much tighter over the third and fourth periods . After the Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) held a 65 - 61 lead going into halftime , the two teams combined for just 84 points in the second half . With four overtimes , there were plenty of opportunities for heroics , and Carmelo Anthony and Courtney Lee capitalized on three of them . Anthony 's driving layup with two seconds left in regulation and 18 - footer with six ticks in the first overtime helped New York stay alive , while Lee 's 26 - foot three - point jumper with one second on the clock in the second overtime sent matters into a third extra period . Dennis Schroder then turned the tables , draining a driving layup with three seconds remaining in the third overtime . Finally , it was Paul Anthony who put an end to the Knicks ' first four - overtime tilt since 1951 , pouring in a shot with 27 seconds remaining that gave Atlanta ( 28 - 20 ) a 141 - 139 lead they would n't relinquish . In all , four Knicks players , including Anthony , fouled out , while Millsap played a whopping 60 minutes . Anthony led the way for New York with a season - high 45 points , along with six rebounds , four assists and one block over 46 minutes , taking a whopping 36 shots in the process . Brandon Jennings , starting for Derrick Rose ( ankle ) , totaled 18 points , 11 assists , three rebounds and one steal . Lee had a near double - double with 17 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Kristaps Porzingis managed 15 points , five boards , one assist and three blocks . Justin Holiday stepped up with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . Mindaugas Kuzminskas posted 13 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block in a reserve role as well . Kyle O'Quinn hauled in 12 boards off the bench , and Joakim Noah had a modest six points but added 14 rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocks . Millsap paced Atlanta with a 37 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , one steal and one block . Kent Bazemore managed 24 points and nine rebounds . Schroder posted a 23 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , while Dwight Howard posted a 19 - point , 13 - rebound effort of his own . Tim Hardaway , Jr. matched Howard 's point total while dishing out eight assists , hauling in five rebounds and recording a steal . Mike Dunleavy led the reserves with 12 points . The Knicks get a day off to rest before facing the Washington Wizards in the Nation 's Capital on Tuesday evening , while the Hawks travel to South Florida to face the Heat on Wednesday night .
The host Golden State Warriors took down the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , 133 - 120 . The Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) saw stellar top - down play even despite the absence of All-Star Draymond Green . The reigning conference Player of the Month duo , Steph Curry and Kevin Durant , recorded a pair of double - doubles . Curry led the team with 29 points and dished out 11 assists , while Durant scored 26 to go with 10 assists and eight rebounds . It was a typically dominant game for the loaded superteam , as the Warriors shot over 52 percent from the field and poured in 14 three - pointers . Seven players scored in double - digits and the team dished out a whopping 38 assists . Golden State was able to quickly get ahead of the Clippers with a 33 - 22 advantage in the first quarter . The Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) remain without injured superstar Chris Paul , and could have used him in Thursday 's double - digit loss . Star forward Blake Griffin took the reigns on offense in Paul 's stead , scoring a game - high 31 points . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal Crawford scored 21 and hit five three - pointers . However , not even 50 percent shooting as a team and ten three - pointers was enough for LA to best the stacked Warriors ' squad . 15 team turnovers did little to help the Clippers ' case . The Warriors will travel to Sacramento on Saturday , while the Clippers will play in Boston on Sunday .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 14 - 53 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 28 - 40 ) 87 - 90 on Friday . In a battle between the two bottom teams in the west , the better team prevailed . The shooting was terrible from both teams , as they both shot 40 percent from the field . The difference for the suns was the play of their starters , as they outscored the Lakers starters 80 - 31 . In fact , no Lakers starter scored in double figures for the first time in over a decade . This now gives Los Angeles their fifth win in their last eight games , with this loss being the best record in the NBA . Carmelo Anthony led the team in scoring , dropping 26 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . Robin Lopez also had a nice game , as he totaled 16 points and eight rebounds . The Lakers will look to get out of this slump on Saturday against the Los Angeles Clippers . This now gives Los Angeles four wins in their last five and they appear to be making one final push at the postseason . Carmelo Anthony did his best to keep the Knicks in this game , as he accumulated 26 points , 12 rebounds and four assists in the win . Robin Lopez also played well , as he amassed 16 points , eight rebounds and two blocks . Brandon Clarkson made his return from a knee injury to score 11 points and snatched down three rebounds . On deck for the Lakers is a matchup against the Oklahpma City Thunder on Tuesday .
DeMar DeRozan 's game - high 30 points led Toronto , and the Raptors tallied success rates of 52 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range . They also won the rebounding battle by a 46 - 37 margin and built an insurmountable 65 - 39 halftime lead . Matching 27 - point efforts from DeMar DeRozan , who also provided three assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jabari Parker continued his stretch of excellent play , leading the way for the Raptors with 27 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Kyle Lowry followed with 18 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . DeMarre Carroll and DeMarre Carroll were next with matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and two assists , and the latter providing six rebounds , two assists and one steal . DeMarre Carroll generated 13 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Greg Monroe led the second unit with 11 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the visitors with 30 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block . Terrence Ross tallied 25 points , five rebounds , one steal and one block . DeMarre Carroll tallied 13 points , six boards and two assists . Matthew Dellavedova registered 2 points and five assists , while Tony Snell registered eight points , five rebounds , four assists and one block . DeMar DeRozan paced the starting five with 30 points , three rebounds and three assists . Kyle Lowry was next with 18 points , three rebounds , seven assists and one steal .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 0 - 1 ) 105 - 101 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Right from the tip - off , the Grizzlies were clearly the better offensive team in this one . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . They shot 52 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves finished at 45 percent from the floor and 50 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Marc Gasol had a monster night , finishing with 32 points ( 12 - 17 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and nine rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Williams was also very efficient Tuesday . He shot 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding six assists . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Shabazz Muhammad , who recorded 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) in 23 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 37 - 42 ) took down the Washington Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) 117 - 80 on Monday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Washington , as they shot 39 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Nets really turned it on , as they outscored the Wizards 21 to 18 . The Nets actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 50 boards to the Nets 50 . Washington has seen its playoff hopes slip in recent weeks , but this win keeps some hope alive . The Wizards are now within three games of the final playoff spot in the East , albeit with only six games left . Brook Lopez was huge though , as he tallied 26 points , nine rebounds and four blocks . Bojan Bogdanovic was second on the team , as he scored 22 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Thaddeus Young recorded a double - double , as he totaled 24 points and 16 rebounds . The Wizards will look to get out of this slide on Wednesday against the Charlotte Hornets . This was one of Brooklyn 's best games of the season , as they handled an Eastern Conference foe extremely easily . The Nets were clicking on all cylinders , but their defense was the key , as they held the Wizards to 39 percent shooting . All the starters played well , as four of them scored at least 10 points and all five recorded at least five assists . Marcin Gortat was a force , as he scored 21 points and grabbed 16 rebounds in the win . Deron Williams also had a great game , as he amassed 22 points , two assists and three rebounds in the victory . The Nets have now won nine of their last 22 and they 'll look to keep that momentum going against the New York Knicks on Saturday .
The Washington Wizards ( 36 - 37 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 15 - 58 ) 101 - 88 on Sunday at the Verizon Center in Washington . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Wizards did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 39 percent compared to the Lakers , who went 25 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Wizards did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Lakers into 18 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . John Wall had a huge day for the Lakers . He shot 9 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding 13 assists . He 's combined for 39 points in hist last two games and is now averaing 19 points per game . Marcin Gortat led the Lakers in scoring with 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , while also grabbing 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 32 points and 36 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 22 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Julius Randle was able to notch a double - double as he finished with 14 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds . He 's now averaging 18 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , J.J. Hickson was the only other Wizards ' player to reach double figures . He finished with 14 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and six rebounds in 32 minutes . He 's now averaging 14 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , J.J. Hickson was able to provide a nice boost with the second unit . Hickson went 5 - for - 5 from the field to score 14 points , while also adding five rebounds in 22 minutes . The Wizards ' next game will be on the road against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Lakers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Cavaliers got out to a quick start in this matchup , out - scoring the Wizards 20 - 20 in the first quarter alone . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Wizards into 13 turnovers , while committing only 16 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by Kevin Love who went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 2 from the three - point line to finish with 19 points , while also adding three rebounds and 0 blocked shots . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games , where he 's averaging 18 points and 16 rebounds . Love , on the other hand , posted 19 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 5 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with three rebounds and two blocked shots . The Los Angeles Lakers ( 5 - 23 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 23 ) 111 - 107 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers were down 81 - 78 following the third quarter , but were able to make a run in the final quarter , out - scoring the Lakers 27 - 28 to finish off the game and secure the six - point victory on the road . The Lakers were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 46 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Lakers were led by the duo of Gary Harris and Will Barton . Barton went 10 - for - 21 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding eight rebounds . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Lakers ' seven - game win streak . Bryant on the other hand finished with 31 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , three rebounds and five assists . He nearly had the unconventional quadruple - double as well , considering he recorded nine turnovers . Bryant was basically able to do whatever he wanted against a poor Nuggets defense in this one . Coming off the bench , Jordan Clarkson had a solid outing . He went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while adding eight rebounds as well . He 's had a nice start to March offensively , recording two games in a row with 14 points.The only other Celtic to reach double figures was Lou Williams , who came off the bench for 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) , four rebounds and five assists . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists over that span . Gary Harris chipped in with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) and four rebounds as well . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 108 - 104 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday . The Blazers ( 37 - 29 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Mavericks ( 22 - 30 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Dallas forced the Blazers into an uncharacteristic nine turnovers , which allowed them to keep pace with the Trail Blazers ( 20 - 30 ) . The Blazers were led by Wesley Matthews , who tallied 27 points , and added six rebounds and three assists . Evan Turner was next on the team with 24 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Damian Lillard followed with 13 points , six rebounds , six assists and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu supplied 14 points , eight boards and one assist . Al-Farouq Aminu and Mason Plumlee turned in matching nine - point efforts , with the former adding nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , and the latter providing nine rebounds , two assists and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu was productive in a reserve role as well with 14 points , eight boards and one steal . The Mavericks head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Trail Blazers remain home to face the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday evening as well .
The Miami Heat ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 1 ) 107 - 102 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Miami . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Heat were able to bounce back with a convincing 12 - point victory in game two . The Heat got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Raptors 31 - 26 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Heat shot 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors shot 47 percent from the floor and only 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were able to force the Celitcs into 10 turnovers , giving them an even greater advantage to take home the victory . The Heat had six players reach double figures in points in this one . Kyle Bosh led all scorers , going 7 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also handing out four assists . He 's been on a hot stretch of late , averaging 24 points and seven assists over his last three games . DeMare Deng was the only other member of the Raptors ' rotation to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds in 28 minutes . The Heats ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday . Both teams were shorthanded in the contest , however . The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , Jrue Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun Moore ( toe ) , making the game very one sided from the gate . The New Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just six points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter . The second half was a different story , as Los Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter . Chris Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first three quarters of action . Paul added five rebounds and three steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake Davis 's ( knee ) absence . DeAndre Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and nine rebounds rather easily . Jamal Crawford and Marreese Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively . Tim Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Buddy Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 88 - 69 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) were n't sure that they 'd have Paul George ( ankle ) available to help try to break a two - game losing streak until late in the afternoon , but he ultimately was able to suit up and share the co - lead in scoring among the starting five . He also helped spearhead a defensive effort that saw Indiana limit the Magic ( 4 - 7 ) to a 32 percent success rate from the field and a 20 percent tally from three - point range , while also holding them to a season - low point total . They also elicited a total of 14 turnovers from Orlando while turning the ball over just nine times in their own right . The key for the Pacers was their play in the two middle quarters , as they outscored the visitors by a 55 - 38 margin over the second and third periods . Orlando was paced by Evan Fournier , who supplied 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Elfrid Payton managed 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Nikola Vucevic struggled through an uncharacteristic 1 - of - 10 effort from the field , an unsightly performance that he nevertheless managed to somewhat compensate for with 12 rebounds . Aaron Gordon was the only other Magic player to hit double digits in the scoring column , pacing the bench with 11 points , three boards and an assist . George and Monta Ellis each turned in 13 - point efforts , with the former posting six rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block , while the latter had a pair of rebounds and assists , to go along with a block . Thaddeus Young provided a solid complementary effort with 11 points , five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Jeff Teague filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , eight rebounds , five assists , a steal and three blocks . C.J . Miles led the reserves with 16 points , four rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks . The Magic head back home to await the New Orleans Pelicans for a Wednesday visit , while the Pacers have their own Wednesday home date with the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 8 - 7 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) 110 - 96 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Grizzlies were able to out - score the Mavericks 36 - 24 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Dallas . The Grizzlies also out - shot the Mavericks 42 - 42 , giving them even more of an advantage , which may have been the difference in this one . The Grizzlies were led by the duo of Mike Conley and Marc Gasol . Conley went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to finish with 21 points and six assists . He shot a combined 8 - for - 15 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , JaMychal Green went 5 - for - 7 from the field and 9 - for - 2 from the free throw line to score 13 points , while adding 10 rebounds in 28 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise as he 's averaging only 14 points per game so far this season . Marc Gasol did n't have his best shooting performance , but still finished with 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) , 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Mavericks will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Dallas Mavericks 94 - 87 Tuesday at American Airlines Center . The Spurs ( 15 - 4 ) held a comfortable five - point lead heading into halftime before allowing superstar Kawhi Leonard and the Mavericks to come storming back and make it a competitive ball game . In the final minute of the game , Kawhi Leonard 's mid - range jumper broke a 96 - 96 tie and put San Antonio up two , but then , a 40 - foot three - point jumper to put the Spurs up by three with just under 23 seconds remaining . The Mavericks then owned the overtime period , where they outscored the Mavericks 21 - 21 . Wesley Matthews led the charge for the Spurs , scoring a game - high 26 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting from the field . His running mate in the backcourt , Kawhi Leonard , was not too far behind , scoring 21 points on top of seven rebounds and two steals . It was a poor shooting night all around for San Antonio , as the team shot 47 percent from the field and an impressive 58 percent from behind the arc . For the Mavericks , it was a night to forget , with only two other players score in double figures . Kawhi Leonard led the way , scoring 21 points to go along with seven rebounds and two assists . Patty Mills added 23 points , while Harrison Barnes and Seth Curry contributed 14 and 14 points , respectively . Deron Williams added nine assists , eight rebounds and three steals .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 102 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . It 's rare to see Memphis dominated in their home building , but that was just the case here in this near wire - to - wire win for Oklahoma City . The Thunder actually led by 9 after the first quarter and never relinquished the lead from there . Shooting was the difference in the game , with the Thunder shooting 48 percent , while they held the Grizzlies to just 48 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with the Thunder recording 21 assists to 20 turnovers , while the Grizzlies committed 12 turnovers to just 21 assists . Russell Westbrook led the way for Oklahoma City , as he accumulated 38 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists . Zach Randolph was second on the team , providing 16 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Marc Gasol was the only other Oklahoma City player in double figures , as he accumulated 31 points , four rebounds and eight assists . The Grizzlies will look to build off this win , as they host the Brooklyn Nets on Friday for their next game . The Thunder ( 29 - 22 ) have been dominant at home all season , with this win giving them their 23rd home victory of the year . Russell Westbrook was once again the catalyst , accumulating 38 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists . Mike Conley led the team in scoring , as he amassed 18 points , two rebounds and two assists . Zach Randolph was second on the team , providing 16 points and eight rebounds on 6 - of - 14 shooting .
The Sacramento Kings were able to score a road victory Sunday over the Toronto Raptors , knocking off the defending Eastern Conference runner - ups 96 - 91 at the Air Canada Centre . Recent results would indicate an easy Raptors win , but that simply was n't the case . This game was tight throughout , as no team led by more than 11 points . Toronto actually led for a 30 - minute stretch in this game , but the Kings hung around and pulled out the upset win . The key for Sacramento was their defense , as they held Toronto to 36 percent shooting from the field and 23 percent shooting from three - point range . The Kings also dominated down low , limiting the Raptors to 30 paint points , while scoring 52 on their end . The Kings ( 3 - 5 ) have been struggling recently , so a road win like this may change their fortunes going forward . Rudy Gay was n't expected to suit up for this game with a rib injury , but ended up suiting up while scoring a team - high 23 points against his former squad . DeMarcus Cousins was second on the team in scoring , tallying 22 points to go with 15 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in the win . Ty Lawson scored just five points on 0 - of - 6 shooting , but handed out 11 dimes in the victory . Kosta Koufos and Arron Afflalo both scored in double figures for the first time this year as well . Sacramento will return to action on Tuesday , when they host the winless New Orleans Pelicans . Toronto ( 5 - 2 ) looked as dominant as anyone coming into this game , but left Sunday looking very beatable . DeMar DeRozan failed to reach 30 points for the first time all season , as he dropped 23 on 7 - of - 20 shooting in the loss . Kyle Lowry was the only other player with more than 10 points , finishing the contest with 15 points , 10 assists and four rebounds . Patrick Patterson was a nice spark off the bench , as he amassed six points , nine rebounds and two blocks . On deck for the Raptors is a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday .

Many of the statistics were lopsided , but the biggest differential was in the blocks department , as the Suns swatted away 15 shots to the Nets two . Phoenix also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , as they assisted on 25 made baskets with nine turnovers , while the Nets assisted on 25 buckets with 17 turnovers . The rebounding is what won the game for Brooklyn though , as they brought down 58 boards to the Suns 45 . The Suns shot 45 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . The Suns ( 22 - 50 ) had to play this game without Eric Bledsoe and it really hurt them late when they needed a clutch basket . Brook Lopez did all he could for Phoenix , as he led the team with 19 points , six rebounds and three blocks . Tyler Ulis was the only other Phoenix player in double figures , as he accumulated 10 points , five rebounds and five assists off the bench . The Suns will look to play better on Sunday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game . The Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) 105 - 89 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Bulls were able to use a strong second - half where they out - scored the Clippers 53 - 30 to seal the victory in front of their home crowd . The Bulls shot 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers finished at 44 percent from the floor and 30 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Clippers , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Bulls got their biggest contribution from Crawford , as Jamal Crawford scored a team - high of 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , while also adding two steals in 27 minutes . It was his second straight impressive performance , combining for 59 points , 17 rebounds and 10 assists over that span . Jamal Crawford was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) in 27 minutes . The Heats ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday . The Bulls 's next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Thursday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday .

The Miami Heat defeated the Houston Rockets , 117 - 109 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . These two teams totaled nine ties and 17 lead changes , as there was swing after swing in this tightly contested battle . Defense was key for Miami , as they held Houston to 41 percent from the field ( 34 - of - 83 ) and 33 percent from three - point range ( 15 - of - 39 ) . The Rockets were killed in the assist - to - turnover ratio , with Houston committing eight turnovers to 22 assists , while the Heat committed 16 turnovers to their 22 assists . The Heat ( 25 - 32 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . James Harden carried the load , as he tallied 38 points , 12 rebounds and 12 assists en route to a triple - double . Dion Waiters was second on the team , finishing with 23 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 23 points and 2 rebounds on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , as he provided 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double , as he totaled 23 points and 14 rebounds .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 86 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . New Orleans was desperate for a win and this dominating victory inches them a little closer to the eight - seed in the west . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarter , as they outscored Detroit , 62 - 34 . The Pistons had one of the worst shooting games of the season , as they went 40 - of - 103 from the field , 8 - of - 17 from the free - throw line and 3 - of - 23 from three - point range . The Pelicans shot well on their end , hitting 50 percent of their shots , while going 22 - of - 23 from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with New Orleans winning that battle , 45 - 27 . The Pistons ( 29 - 32 ) had won three of four headed into this matchup , so this 23 - point loss is obviously disappointing . Jon Leuer led Detroit , as he collected 22 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Andre Drummond did get ejected , but still totaled 13 points and 17 rebounds , despite going 1 - of - 10 from the free - throw line . Tobias Harris led the bench with 15 points and six rebounds . The Pelicans ( 24 - 37 ) were 0 - 3 with DeMarcus Cousins and this marks their first win since the trade , despite the fact that Cousins was suspended for this matchup ( technicals ) . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 33 points , 14 rebounds and three assists on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 22 points , four rebounds and five assists . Dante Cunningham was a surprise , providing 16 points and five rebounds .
The Denver Nuggets ( 19 - 27 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 22 ) 93 - 85 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in New Orleans . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 28 - 17 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went 39 percent from the floor and 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were led by Tyreke Evans , who went 11 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding six rebounds and two assists . He 's picked up his scoring of late with so many injuries affecting this team , as he 's averaging just 4 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Jusuf Nurkic finished with 15 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , nine rebounds and two steals . He 's now pushed his season averages to 9 points and 10 rebounds on the year . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Eric Gordon , who recorded 11 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and six assists in 32 minutes . For the Pelicans , Anthony Davis did the bulk of the work offensively . He went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 8 - for - 10 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also nearing a triple - double with nine rebounds and 2 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 22 rebounds over his last two games . Arron Afflalo continued to come off the bench since returning from injury . He shot 7 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 20 points in 39 minutes . Faried shot a brilliant 11 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 14 points in the Nuggets victory . He 's now averaging nine points and 1 rebounds on the season . Eric Gordon had a solid showing as well , finishing with 11 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six assists . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The host Los Angeles Lakers handily defeated the Golden State Warriors on Friday , 117 - 97 . It was Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) coach Luke Walton 's first game against the Warriors since leaving the organization over the offseason . Walton coached the Warriors for the beginning of their historic 2015 - 16 regular season in place of an injured Steve Kerr , but later left to pursue the head coaching job in Los Angeles . Walton certainly got the best of his former team , as the Lakers were able to maintain their hefty halftime lead down the stretch . The team successfully capitalized on their size advantage , holding a 51 - 40 advantage in the rebounding column . Third-year forward Julius Randle led the team with 20 points and was a monster on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds . The Lakers also saw success from the line , hitting over 90 percent of their free - throws . For the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) , it was a tough night from beyond the arc . After showing dominant offensive flow on Thursday in a rout of the Thunder , the Warriors shot just 5 - for - 32 from three in Friday 's contest . This included 0 - for - 10 for Steph Curry , whose NBA-record streak of 157 games with a three - point make finally came to an end . The results were n't much better for Klay Thompson , who went just 1 - for - 10 . Kevin Durant , meanwhile , continued to perform with his new team , leading the game with 27 points . The Lakers will host the Suns on Sunday , while the Warriors will host the still - winless Pelicans on Monday .

In fact , neither team grabbed a double - digit lead , as it came down to the final seconds . Fastbreak points was also a glaring difference , with the Rockets winning that battle , 55 - 20 . Devin Booker was second on the team , scoring 18 points and dishing out two assists . Alex Len recorded a double - double , amassing 13 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Phoenix will host the Denver Nuggets for their next game on Tuesday . Portland came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Trail Blazers team . The biggest difference in the game was the play of the Blazers , as the Trail Blazers committed 18 turnovers to the Trail Blazers eight . Portland was playing their second game in as many days and took an unlikely deficit one to escape with a win . D'Angelo Russell had a nice game though , as he tallied 21 points , three rebounds and two assists in the defeat . Mason Plumlee also played great , as he totaled 13 points , eight rebounds and three blocks in the defeat . The New York Knicks defeated the host Chicago Bulls 117 - 106 at United Center on Friday . Recent results from these teams would indicate a different outcome , but the Knicks showed some resiliency here on the road . New York actually led by 16 at times in the first quarter , before allowing the Bulls to take their first lead in the second quarter . The Knicks responded by recapturing the lead in the third and kept it for the entirety of the fourth quarter . New York shot 52 percent from the field and assisted on 31 of their 46 made baskets . They did that dominating the turnover differential as well , committing just five , while forcing 12 from the Bulls . The Knicks ( 2 - 3 ) got some great performance from their starters here , as all five scored at least 15 points . Kristaps Porzingis led the team , scoring 27 points to go along with his five boards . Carmelo Anthony was n't far behind , tallying 25 points , seven rebounds and four assists of his own . Joakim Noah and Derrick Rose both played great in their return to Chicago . Noah tallied 16 points , nine rebounds and four assists , while Rose finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and a season - high 11 assists . The Bulls ( 3 - 2 ) had a tough task here against some former Chicago players and they simply did n't play well enough to win . Dwyane Wade did all he could though , scoring a game - high 35 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting . He also provided 10 rebounds and hit five more three - pointers in the loss . The Knicks return to action on Sunday when they host the Utah Jazz , while Chicago travels to Indiana on Saturday to play the Pacers .
The New York Knicks ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 0 - 1 ) 122 - 97 on Wednesday at the Madison Square Garden in Milwaukee . The Knicks caught fire real game in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 27 - 23 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Knicks shot the ball well , going 45 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 35 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Knicks 47 - 49 , they turned the ball over 18 times , which may have been the difference in this one . The Knicks were led by Derrick Williams , who went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding seven rebounds and an assist . He 's been a scoring machine thus far this season , averaging 27 points over his first 10 games of the season . Kristaps Porzingis also did his best to keep the Bucks in this game . He went 6 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 16 points , to go along with five rebounds and a steal . He 's turned it on offensively of late , averaging 28 points over his last five games . Coming off the bench , Greivis Vasquez had a solid game . He went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while adding four rebounds and three assists as well . The Knicks were led by Michael Carter-Williams , who went 6 - for - 17 from the field to score 20 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) while adding five rebounds and four assists in 34 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in four out of his last five games . Khris Middleton shot the ball well , going 4 - for - 10 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 16 points . He had shot less than 50 percent in two out of his last three games , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Langston Galloway added 16 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and three assists of his own . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 25 - 15 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 19 ) 106 - 103 on Monday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 33 percent compared to the Magic , who went 39 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Raptors did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Magic into 15 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Kyle Lowry had a very impressive performance , going 5 - for - 20 from the field to score 24 points , while also adding eight rebounds and six assists in just 45 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 10 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds on the year . Evan DeRozan was the other starter in double figures , as he posted 13 points ( 4 - 19 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and four assists in 40 minutes . Since joining the Magic at the trade deadline , he 's averaged 6 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals per game . DeMar DeRozan had a solid showing as well , going 8 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been on fire the last two games , combining to go 20 - for - 21 from the field and 5 - for - 2 from the three - point line over his last two games . He 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the season . DeMar DeRozan really struggled with his shot , as he went 4 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to finish with 13 points . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Miami Heat on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls opened their season Thursday with a 105 - 99 victory against the visiting Boston Celtics . Chicago ( 10 ) jumped out to an early lead , finishing the first quarter with a 30 - 20 lead . The Bulls new - look backcourt of Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo quickly made contributions , with Wade scoring 14 points in the first half . The group managed to combat concerns about poor floor - spacing , with Wade and Rondo contributing five combined three - point makes . Chicago was able to keep the Celtics off the glass extremely effectively , winning the rebounding battle 55 - 36 . The Bulls ' edge was particularly pronounced on the offensive end , as they earned 18 offensive rebounds compared to Boston 's three . Boston ( 1 - 1 ) , meanwhile , managed to keep the game close throughout . All-Star point guard Isaiah Thomas led the charge for the Celtics ' offense , scoring 25 points . With bench guard Marcus Smart sidelined by injury , sophomore Terry Rozier saw 22 minutes coming off the bench . He made the most of his time on the floor , scoring eight points and recording four rebounds and four assists while recording no turnovers . Boston had a solid shooting night , converting on half of their shots from the floor overall . However , struggles on the glass ended up weighing the Celtics down despite keeping Chicago to just 43 percent shooting . The Bulls will face the Pacers on Saturday , while the Celtics will take on the Hornets . The Bulls will play host on Friday in Charlotte .

It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 16 assists over those two games . Trevor Ariza had a solid showing as well , going 5 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while adding two rebounds .
