The Charlotte Hornets ( 39 - 29 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 39 - 29 ) 109 - 106 on Sunday . A short - handed Heat squad surprised the Hornets in the first half , mounting a 57 - 54 lead by intermission despite missing Nikola Vucevic ( groin ) and the sharpshooting Josh Walker , who sat out the game with a wrist injury . However , the tenor of the contest significantly changed in a crucial third quarter , which Miami won going away , 28 - 21 . As has often been the case during Chris Bosh 's extended absence due to blood clots , the duo of Kemba Walker and Al Batum stepped up with a pair of 21 - point efforts . Williams also had seven rebounds , five assists , and two steals , while Richardson rounded out the starting five 's productive night with 18 points , four rebounds and an assist . Dragic led the Hornets with 21 points , seven assists and seven rebounds , his third double - double in the last four games . Josh Richardson followed with a near double - double of 18 points , nine rebounds , an assist and a block . Marvin Williams rounded things out for the first unit with 12 points , five boards and an assist . Marvin Williams paced the Heat with 12 points , five rebounds , an assist and two steals . Miami remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division and currently has a hold of the sixth seed in the conference as well . They 're home again against the Magic on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 49 - 25 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 32 - 41 ) 119 - 106 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Boston . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went just 42 percent from the floor and 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were able to force the Celtics into 21 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Clippers were led by J.J. Redick , who went 11 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the 21 - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding five rebounds and three assists . He 's picked up his scoring of late with so many injuries affecting this team , as he 's averaging 10 points , 9 rebounds and 4 assists over his last five games . DeAndre Jordan was able to notch a double - double as he finished with 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 3 - 15 FT ) and 14 rebounds . He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 22 points , 12 rebounds and 18 assists over his last two games . Tyler Zeller also had a solid game off the bench , with 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds in 21 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Celtics will travel to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Tuesday .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Houston Rockets , 128 - 112 , at Smoothie King Center on Friday . The Pelicans were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run for them to prevail . In fact , the Pelicans went on a 29 - 13 run in a 21 - minute span between the third and fourth quarters to overcome a 13 - point deficit and eventually pull away . The game was relatively close up to that point though , as there were nine lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 13 points until the final five minutes . Houston really struggled with their shots , as they went just 41 percent from the field , 33 percent from three - point range and 78 percent from the free - throw line . Rebounding was also decisive , with the Pelicans winning that battle , 54 - 46 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 14 more assists and committing three less turnovers . The Rockets ( 47 - 22 ) had a tough task here against a hot Rockets team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . Solomon Hill led the way for Houston , as he tallied 30 points , six rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Jrue Holiday accrued 19 points , four rebounds and six assists . Lou Williams and Eric Gordon were huge off the bench , as they combined for 41 points , six rebounds , six assists , two steals and three blocks . The Pelicans will host the Phoenix Suns on Friday for their next game . The Rockets ( 28 - 41 ) are slowly climbing back to .500 , as they 've now won three of their last four games . Solomon Hill was the player of the game , as he accumulated 30 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Anthony Davis was n't far behind , accumulating 24 points , four rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Jrue Holiday was the only other Pelican in double figures , as he collected 19 points , four rebounds and six assists off the bench . The Rockets will be in action again on Saturday , as they play the Utah Jazz on the road for their next game .
The Orlando Magic ( 16 - 38 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 32 - 20 ) 97 - 98 on Wednesday . The Magic came into this game as a rare road favorite and couldn’t muster up enough for a win . The key for Orlando was their rebounding , as they brought down 45 boards to the Bulls 35 . The Bulls also shot over 48 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range in their win . The Magic have been terrible in the second half , but they can still play spoiler to teams fighting for playoff positioning . Rookie Pau Gasol was the player of the game , as he tallied 25 points and 15 rebounds . Victor Oladipo finished second on the team , totaling 18 points and four rebounds . Derrick Rose made his return from a knee injury to accrue 18 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals in the win . On deck for the Magic is a matchup against the Boston Celtics on Tuesday . The Sixers have been a much more competitive team recently and nearly pulled out a statement win against a potent Bulls team . Tobias Harris led the team with 15 points and went 6 - for - 17 from the field . Victor Oladipo also played well , as he amassed 18 points , six assists and four rebounds . Orlando has a tough task ahead of them , as they play the second half of a back - to - back against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday for their next game . Orlando is off until Wednesday , when they host the Milwaukee Bucks for their next fixture .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday night . The Bulls ( 14 - 15 ) checked in to Friday night on a downturn , as they 'd lost four of their last five . They were able to get off to a fast start , however , outscoring the host Hornets ( 17 - 13 ) by a 26 - 22 margin in the first quarter . Charlotte turned the table quickly in the second period , however , almost doubling up the visitors with a 26 - 14 advantage . Although the Bulls bounced back in the third , the Hornets were able to keep pace every step of the way throughout the second half , which resulted in their tenth home win of the season . While Chicago failed to find much scoring from their starting five outside of Jimmy Butler , Charlotte benefited from a balanced effort across their first unit . As customary , the effective backcourt duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum led the way , as they supplied matching 20 - point contributions . Butler 's 26 points led the Bulls , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and a block . Dwyane Wade was second , registering 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Taj Gibson supplied 10 points , three rebounds and a pair of blocks . Rajon Rondo mustered a modest seven points but also provided 10 assists , nine rebounds and two steals . Doug McDermott led the second unit with 15 points , while Nikola Mirotic managed an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double that also included a steal and a block in just 19 minutes off the bench . Walker added five rebounds , four assists and a steal to his co - leading point total , while Batum 's performance was a triple - double that also consisted of 11 rebounds , 10 assists , a steal and a block . Dwyane Wade was next with 20 points , four assists , five rebounds and a steal . Nikola Mirotic was next with a modest line of 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . With the loss , the Bulls remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They remain home for a showdown with the Miami Heat on Wednesday .
It took a lot of big shots to get to overtime , as there were 10 ties in this OT thriller . Devin Booker tied the game twice in the final 14 seconds , as his 34 points were a career - high . Many of the statistics were lopsided , but the biggest differential was in the blocks department , as the Suns swatted away 18 shots to the Hawks two . Phoenix also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 50 - 51 . The Hawks ( 46 - 32 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Paul Millsap carried the load , as he tallied 13 points , 17 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Paul Millsap went just 3 - of - 8 from the field , but finished with 13 points , 17 rebounds and eight assists . Ronnie Price led the bench in scoring , dropping 14 points and three rebounds . Mirza Teletovic was a huge spark off the bench , as he dropped 12 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals on 4 - of - 13 shooting . The Hawks ( 46 - 32 ) have now lost seven of their last eight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Devin Booker was the player of the game , as he accumulated 34 points , five rebounds and two assists . Al Horford finished with 16 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Kent Bazemore led the starters , dropping 17 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Tyson Len recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 10 points and 13 rebounds .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 129 - 109 at Target Center on Saturday evening . Karl-Anthony Towns imposed his will on this one , as he poured in a game - high 37 points to help the Timberwolves dominate , as they won every quarter on their way to the 20 - point win over the struggling Nets . The Timberwolves ( 18 - 29 ) shot 51 percent from the field , as all five starters scored in double digits to lead the way . Karl-Anthony Towns grabbed 13 rebounds and recorded four blocked shots , to go along with his game - high 37 points . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 23 points , while Zach LaVine chipped in 20 . Shabazz Muhammad came up big off the bench for Minnesota , as he finished with 18 points and seven rebounds . The Timberwolves will look to keep rolling , as they play host to the Magic on Monday . The Nets ( 9 - 38 ) outscored the T-Wolves 58 - 48 in the paint and 23 - 12 in fast - break points but were not able to compete as efficiently , as they shot 48 percent from the field , and 33 percent from deep , compared to the 45 percent the T-Wolves hit from deep . Brook Lopez was the high - point man for the Nets , with 25 points , to go along with seven rebounds . Three other players scored in double digits for Brooklyn , including Sean Kilpatrick , who added 14 points , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Nets will look to bounce back , as they visit Miami on Monday .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Houston Rockets 121 - 94 at Oracle Arena on Wednesday . The Splash Brothers , Steph Harden and Klay Thompson , took care of business leading the Warriors ( 3 - 1 ) in a rout over the Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) at home . Golden State scored 77 points in the first half , and the Curry-Thompson combination each scored 26 points . Harden went on to knock down 2 - of - 4 three - pointers , while Harden scored 18 points , to go along with 10 assists in 40 minutes . Thompson led all scorers with 23 points , to go with two rebounds and five assists on 8 - of - 15 shooting , while Iguodala added 22 points on 3 - of - 11 shooting from behind the arc . James Harden rounded out the box score with another explosive performance , as the Warriors point guard finished with 18 points , 10 assists , seven rebounds and seven steals . James Harden added 18 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists on 4 - of - 13 shooting . Dwight Howard added a double - double with 19 points and 15 rebounds , while Michael Beasley contributed 17 points on 1 - of - 12 shooting from deep . As for the Rockets , the game was out of reach from midway through the second quarter , and the defensive effort and game play focuses on Harden and Iguodala . Andre Iguodala led the Rockets with 22 points off the bench , while Draymond Green pitched in an impressive 19 points and 15 rebounds . Harrison Barnes added 12 points , and Harrison Barnes finished with 12 .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 3 - 4 ) 101 - 97 on Tuesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Cavaliers got out to a quick start in this matchup , out - scoring the Pacers 50 - 41 right away in the first half . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Pacers went just 43 percent from the floor and a meager 33 percent from beyond the arc . Despite being out - rebounded 47 - 48 , the Cavaliers forced the Pacers into 7 , while only committing 10 of their own . The Cavaliers were led by the duo of Paul George and Monta Ellis . George went 11 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding 11 rebounds , six assists and a block . It was a new season - high in points for him , along with a huge confidence boost , as he went scoreless just a game ago against the Miami Heat on Tuesday . Also coming off the bench , Mo Williams had a strong showing . In 38 minutes , he posted 14 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five assists , while Jarryd Williams recorded a double - double of his own with 10 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 5 rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Pacers will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Houston Rockets notched their ninth straight win as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 100 , at Toyota Center on Friday night . The Rockets made history in a couple of different ways in this contest , beginning with their nine - game win streak , which is their longest win streak in eight years . They also sank an NBA-record 24 three - pointers , while James Harden passed Hakeem Olajuwon , to become the Rockets ' all time triple - double leader , as he notched his second straight triple - double , for the fifteenth of his career . Harden finished with 29 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , along with 13 assists and 11 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Meanwhile , Eric Gordon notched a season - high 29 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , including 7 - of - 12 from deep , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) shot 24 - of - 61 from long distance and tallied 27 assists in the game . They moved to 10 - 2 at home and will head out to Minnesota to take - on the Timberwolves on Saturday , for their second game in as many nights . The Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) fell short on the second night of a back - to - back as they struggled shooting , going 41 percent from the field , 33 percent from long range and only 55 percent from the foul line . Anthony Davis scored 19 points before he was forced to leave the game in the third quarter with a leg contusion , and did not return . No player tallied more than 20 points for the Pelicans but five players scored in double figures , including Cheick Diallo who went 4 - of - 5 from the field , for 10 points , along with seven rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans fell to 3 - 10 on the road and will look to bounce back as they visit San Antonio on Sunday .
DeMarcus Cousins ' struggles in Tuesday 's game against the Kings were , in general terms , uncharacteristic of the All-Star center . However , when looking at Cousins ' history following a huge performance , it ends up not being too out of character . Cousins followed up Monday 's monster 46 - point , 18 - rebound performance with a bit of a dud , as he shot just 10 - of - 27 ( 53 percent ) from the field en route to scoring just 25 points . Going back as far as last season , in his last five games where he scored at least 42 points , Cousins followed up with a poor shooting performance the next game . Cousins never shot over 38 percent from the field in any of those five followups and shot as low as 5 - of - 25 ( 51 percent ) from the field . Then , in a game without Dwyane Wade and where his team needs him to come through once again , Parker lays an egg . The point guard went just 5 - of - 16 from the field and had no other only eight points in double figures . As for the Spurs , it was a fourth quarter to forget . More specifically , it was a fourth quarter to forget for the reigning two - time MVP DeMarcus Cousins . The center went 10 - of - 19 from the field and scored a team - high 25 points . He was able to get to the line six times and converting on eight of those attempts .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 97 - 90 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . It 's rare to see Memphis dominated at home so badly , but that 's just how things have been going for the Grizzlies over recent weeks . This one was over early , as San Antonio took an 6 - point lead in the first quarter and led by double - digits for the entirety of the second half . It ended up being a wire - to - wire win for the Spurs as well . Defense was key for San Antonio , as they held Memphis to 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The Spurs also took advantage of the whistle , taking 18 more free - throw attempts than the Grizzlies . Memphis ( 40 - 32 ) had to play this game without Chandler ( Parsons ) and they simply did n't have enough bullets to beat this hungry Spurs team . LaMarcus Aldridge did all he could for Memphis , as he led the team with 23 points and seven rebounds . Tony Parker was second on the team , as he scored 13 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting . Marc Gasol was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Patty Mills was a nice spark off the bench , providing 15 points , four assists , two rebounds and two steals . San Antonio will look to keep rolling on Monday in a home matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 104 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . These are two teams on the outside looking in for the playoffs and the Pelicans were able to escape with a huge win to get them closer to that eight - seed . Despite Dallas leading by nine points after the first quarter , New Orleans took care of business from there by winning the other three quarters by at least four points . In fact , the Pelicans outscored the Mavericks , 49 - 48 , in the second half . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with New Orleans winning that battle , 41 - 32 . They also stifled Dallas with their defense , holding the Mavericks to 49 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range . The Mavericks ( 9 - 22 ) are in a bit of a slump right now and they 'll hope this blowout loss is rock - bottom . Wesley Matthews led the team in scoring , as he tallied 24 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Deron Williams was second on the team , finishing with 24 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Dirk Nowitzki was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 10 points and two rebounds . Jrue Williams led the bench in scoring , dropping 24 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Buddy Hield was the only bench player with more than four points , as he dropped 14 points on 6 - of - 8 shooting .
The Miami Heat ( 16 - 21 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 25 - 13 ) 104 - 90 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Los Angeles . The Heat came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 30 - 29 in the first quarter alone . The Clippers were the superior shooters , going 48 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 45 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were able to force the Clippers into 13 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Heat were led by Chris Bosh , who went 13 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , to go along with seven rebounds and two assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Heat ' seven - game win streak . Paul on the other hand finished with 23 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and nine assists . It was his second straight night with 17 points , as he 's a combined 30 - of - 36 from the field over the last two games . He 's picked up his scoring of late with so many injuries affecting this team , as he 's averaging 13 points while shooting 27 percent from the field during that stretch . He 's now averaging 14 points and 2 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , J.J. Redick shot 6 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 14 points in 14 minutes . The Sacramento Kings ( 30 - 45 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 36 - 39 ) 120 - 111 at Sleep Train Arena on Wednesday . Sacramento started off strong , and jumped out to a 32 - 34 lead after the first quarter . They went on to win the remaining three quarters , continually building on their lead on their way to their third straight loss . However , Sacramento was able to pull away late in the fourth quarter and never looked back , outscoring the Wizards 28 - 28 in the final period . The Wizards were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who scored a game - high 29 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting , to go along with 10 rebounds , four assists and four steals in 32 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins led all scorers with 29 points , to go along with 10 rebounds and four assists on 11 - of - 18 shooting , while also pulling down 10 boards . Otto Porter added 20 points , while Otto Casspi added 15 points and eight boards . The Kings shot 48 percent from the field and knocked down 11 - of - 21 three - point attempts . The Wizards , meanwhile , had a solid offensive showing but simply could not stop the Thunder’s big three . Bradley Beal ( 24 points ) and Darren Collison ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Wizards . Otto Porter added 13 points , eight rebounds and two assists , while Darren Collison chipped in 13 points in 31 minutes . Next up , the Wizards play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday , while the Kings host the Jazz on Monday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 108 - 94 Tuesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge shining from start to finish . Leonard finished with a game - high 36 points on top of eight rebounds and four assists , while LaMarcus Aldridge shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 25 points and grabbing six rebounds of his own . With the pair accounting for over half of the Spurs ' points Tuesday night , no other San Antonio players managed to score in double figures , but six managed to score at least six points . For the Thunder , they could n't overcome a slow start to the game and one of their poorest shooting performances of the season . Overall as a team , Oklahoma City shot just 35 percent from the field and 25 percent from beyond the arc . Russell Westbrook managed to lead the way with a team - high 27 points on top of 14 assists and six rebounds , while the starting frontcourt of Steven Adams and Domantas Sabonis each recorded their own double - doubles , combining for 29 points and 22 rebounds . The Thunder have now dropped two straight against two of the NBA 's best teams by a combined 30 points . Up next , the Spurs will remain home Thursday to take on the 76ers , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Bulls .

Stephen Curry produced a near double - double with 20 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . Draymond Green was next with a 10 - point , 2 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds , three blocks and one steal . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 21 - 10 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 12 - 31 ) 122 - 112 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . This marked a big win for the Thunder , as they passed up the New Orleans Pelicans for the eighth and final projected seed in the Western Conference standings . The Pelicans are just a half game behind them though , with the Suns trailing by just three games as well , so it 'll remain a fight for the last seed all the way until the end of the regular season in the West . The Nuggets , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . They 're even with the Indiana Pacers , but hold the tie breaker , so they remain ahead of them for now . The Nuggets are also just a game behind the Miami Heat for the seventh spot . With both Kevin Durant and Serge Ibaka out due to injury , Russell Westbrook continued to put on a show . He did n't have the best night shooting the ball ( 11 - 18 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , but he went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 30 points . He was able to get to the line a wopping 1 - of - 6 from the free throw line , but still finished with 30 points and nine rebounds . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Thunder on the other hand received most of their production from the trio of Kevin Durant , Serge Ibaka and Gary Harris . Barton finished with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds , while Nelson added 15 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and five rebounds . With only three minutes left in Monday 's game , it was a nice bounce back game for him . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 27 - 38 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 14 - 52 ) 122 - 106 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 33 - 29 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Nets also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 58 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 47 percent from the floor and 60 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were led by the duo of Kevin Martin and Joe Bogdanovic . Martin went 7 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding three rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his second over his last four games , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 14 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Lopez finished with 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) , eight rebounds and a steal in just 22 minutes . It was his first time reaching double - digit points in his last nine games , while the double - double was his first since the middle of January , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction Wednesday . Coming off the bench , Jarrett Jack shot 6 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 16 points . It was his second strong performance in a row , as he 's combined for 51 points and 10 assists over his last two . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Gorgui Dieng , who scored 11 points and grabbed five rebounds . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 100 - 93 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . More often than not , the trio of LeBron James , Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving are essentially enough to overcome most opponents . It was a different story Sunday , however , as veteran Channing Frye actually led the way with a season - high 20 - point effort in 25 minutes off the bench . The aforementioned starters were n't necessarily underwhelming , as they combined for 55 points , including four total three - pointers from Love and James . Defense was also undeniably a factor , as Cleveland ( 8 - 1 ) held the Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) to 38 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 21 points , four assists , three rebounds and a steal . Marvin Williams posted 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum managed a near double - double with 15 points , nine boards , seven assists , two steals and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist did get there , supplying 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Frye added three rebounds and three blocks to his team - high scoring total . A pair of 19 - point efforts from James and Irving paced the starting five , with the former also filling out the stat sheet with eight rebounds , eight assists , a steal and a block and the latter dishing out four assists , posting three rebounds and recording a steal . Love was strong as well , pouring in 17 points and bringing in 11 rebounds , four assists and a steal . Tristan Thompson mustered a modest four points , but did bring in 12 rebounds . The Hornets move on to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Tuesday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to take on the Raptors on Monday evening as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Charlotte Hornets 105 - 90 at Spectrum Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) pulled out their fifth straight win behind a strong effort from Mike Conley . The floor general for the Grizzlies was an all around force from end - to - end , especially after losing James Ennis ( calf ) . The calf injury flared up after returning to the lineup on Monday , and is another blow to the front court for Memphis given Chandler Parsons ( bruised left knee ) inability to play for roughly two more weeks . Memphis controlled the pace of the game from start to finish and never let the Hornets ( 8 - 5 ) get close enough to make it a game . The game got blow fully open after Conley buried a 27 - foot three point shot to take a 69 - 45 lead with just a few seconds left in the third quarter . The Grizzlies point guard finished with 31 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals on 11 - of - 21 shooting . JaMychal Green had a great performance in the starting lineup with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist on 4 - of - 4 shooting in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker led the starting lineup in scoring for the Hornets , but failed to provide enough to get his team back in the game after contributing 17 points and two assists . Charlotte got strong productivity from the bench , where Frank Kaminsky dropped 23 points on 11 shots in 20 minutes , while Spencer Hawes added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Both teams play on Wednesday , as the Hornets host the San Antonio Spurs , while the Grizzlies head to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 88 - 79 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 24 - 16 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but they did a fine job lighting up the scoreboard on Saturday as well after falling behind early . All five members of their first unit tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Marc Gasol and Marc Gasol led the way with a pair of 17 - point efforts . Gasol also supplied four rebounds , an assist and three steals , while the latter supplied a 13 - point , 11 - rebound effort . Mike Hill provided 15 points , four rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . Trey Lyles led the bench with nine points and two rebounds . Marc Gasol 's 17 points paced the Grizzlies , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , an assist and three steals . George posted a 19 - point , 4 - rebound double - double that also included nine assists , a steal and a block . Zach Randolph totaled 13 points , 11 rebounds , an assist and three steals . Trey Lyles was productive off the bench as well , supplying 11 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Grizzlies head back home to tangle with the Phoenix Suns on Sunday afternoon , while the Grizzlies head to the Windy City for a Tuesday night date with the Houston Rockets . They also return to the Big Apple to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Monday night .
The Miami Heat ( 14 - 16 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 17 - 11 ) 101 - 91 on Sunday . Miami has won two straight , and they earned Saturday 's win without several of their frontcourt players . Brook Lopez remains out indefinitely with a lower back injury , while Mike Deng sat out a second straight game with a knee injury . Kyrie Irving paced the Heat with 25 points and three assists in 37 minutes . Dion Waiters had his best game since returning from injury . He finished with 25 points and three assists in 42 minutes . Cleveland shot a woeful 44 percent from the field and 23 percent from beyond the arc . They lost the first three quarters of the game , thoroughly taking their drubbing from the Heat . Kevin Love returned from a two - game absence due to knee soreness and played well , finishing with 14 points , three assists , three steals and one block in 29 minutes . The Cavaliers will return home to host the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . Cleveland has dropped two straight games . They could n't buy a shot from downtown Wednesday as they shot 23 percent from beyond the arc . Dwyane Wade put up a vintage performance , scoring 31 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting . Kevin Love contributed 14 points , five rebounds and three assists in 39 minutes . The Heat will go on the road to face the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday , while the Heat will travel to Boston to face the Celtics on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 28 - 36 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 39 ) 107 - 100 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Sacramento . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 27 percent compared to the Kings , who went 32 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Kings into 17 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . DeMarcus Cousins did everything he could to keep the Kings in this game . He went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding five rebounds and 14 assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Magic ' seven - game win streak . Oladipo on the other hand went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 12 points and 3 rebounds on the year . The only other starter to reach double - digit points was Rudy Gay , who had 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds in 21 minutes . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 44 - 17 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 38 - 26 ) in overtime , 120 - 103 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday . Kevin Love has struggled to find his place the Cavaliers ' offense so far this season , but he was the key cog for them Saturday as he put up 28 points and 11 rebounds in 36 minutes . Anderson Varejao sat out the game with a rib contusion . Jared Sullinger earned his second double - double of the season , putting up 17 points and 13 rebounds in 31 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 51 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc to secure the win . They 'll host the Orlando Magic on Monday . Boston has lost two straight games . They shot a woeful 46 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc . They were out - rebounded by the Cavaliers 47 - 37 , but they were able to overcome their deficiencies on the boards to grab the win . The Cavaliers begin a three - game road trip in Charlotte on Monday against the Hornets . Boston has dropped seven straight games and appear to be in a tailspin , but that could correct itself as they embark on an Eastern Conference road trip this week that could allow them to get back in the win column . While the Celtics have preached patience , questions about whether or not the pieces they have can fit together have already been getting tossed around liberally in NBA circles . Cleveland will go on the road to play the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 7 - 5 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 9 ) 88 - 86 on Sunday at the TD Garden in Detroit . The Suns got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 21 - 19 in the first quarter alone . The Suns were the superior shooters , going 49 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 28 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Suns also secured a 41 - 43 rebounding advantage . The Suns were led by the duo of Eric Bledsoe and Brandon Jennings . Bledsoe went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding six rebounds as well . He 's now pushed his season averages to 21 points and 6 rebounds per game . Bledsoe on the other hand recorded 18 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) of his own , to go along with six rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Eric Bledsoe was the other player to score 12 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 9 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , while also adding six rebounds and four assists . He continues to be very consistent , as he 's averaged 19 points and 7 rebounds over his last three games . Monroe received some help from P.J . Tucker , who added 16 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds . Like Drummond , he 's playing at a very high rate , averaging 23 points over his last three games . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Washington Wizards on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers on Wednesday .

Monta Ellis led the way for the Wizards , finishing with a team - high 21 points in 48 minutes . The Boston Celtics ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 2 - 2 ) 104 - 95 on Monday at TD Garden in Atlanta . The Celtics struggled from the field , shooting a paltry 37 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks finished at 37 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from deep . The Celtics also out - rebounded the Hawks 52 - 49 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Celtics were led by Isaiah Thomas , who went 11 - for - 23 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding six assists . He temporarily left the game in the first quarter after straining his hamstring , but he came back in the second and played through the injury to bring the Celtics to a huge win . Paul went 19 - for - 31 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 45 points , to go along with six rebounds and six assists . It was far - and - away his best game of the season so far , as it marked a new season - high in points for him . Marcus Smart had a strong showing as well , going 7 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 20 points in 42 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Smart , who had n't reached the 50 - point mark yet this season . Jeff Turner also had a solid showing , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , seven rebounds and six assists . It was his second straight game with 18 points , as he 's a combined 17 - of - 33 from the field over the last two games . Jeff Teague chipped in with 13 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and five assists as well . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Hawks will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 56 - 6 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 27 - 35 ) 119 - 113 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to an extremely fast start in this game , out - scoring the Magic 50 - 41 in the first half alone . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 44 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Magic into 36 turnovers , while committing only 24 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . The Warriors were led by Stephen Curry , who went 14 - for - 24 from the field and 7 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 41 points , while also adding 13 rebounds , three assists and four steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 24 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 15 points and 16 rebounds on the season . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 3 FT ) , but he still finished with 19 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 35 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Draymond Green struggled with his shot , but still finished with 1 - for - 3 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line for a team - high of 1 points , to go along with nine rebounds and three blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 6 points and 7 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , Jason Smith had 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds in 23 minutes . Coming off the bench , Jason Smith had 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds in 23 minutes . The Detroit Pistons ( 26 - 23 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 12 - 37 ) 105 - 100 on Monday . The game featured a showdown between two of the more offensive - minded centers in the NBA , Brook Drummond and Brook Lopez . The two big men did not disappoint , with each tallying or equaling the highest score on their respective teams . However , the frontcourt undercard was n't bad either , as Thaddeus Young and Ersan Ilyasova waged a fascinating battle of their own down low . When all was said and done , the Detroit tandem was able to claim victory , as the Pistons outscored the Nets 39 - 18 in the second quarter , which included a pair of nine - point efforts from Andre Drummond . Detroit proved too much for Brooklyn to handle the other two the first half , and finished the game with a 35 - point explosion over the third quarter . The Nets were led by Andre Drummond , who posted a game - high 27 points , along with five rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal . Reggie Jackson was right behind him with a 19 - point , six - assist double - double that also included three rebounds and a pair of blocks . Reggie Jackson was right behind him with 19 points , six assists and three rebounds . Ersan Ilyasova contributed 16 points , six rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Marcus Morris contributed 12 points , three rebounds , an assist and a block . Wayne Ellington paced the Detroit bench with 11 points and three rebounds . Detroit remains in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and are currently slotted in the fourth seed in the conference as well . They head to Philadelphia to face the Sixers on Saturday .

The Los Angeles Clippers ( 51 - 26 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 28 - 49 ) 107 - 92 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 29 - 15 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Clippers also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 43 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 38 percent from the floor and a meager 27 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Clippers also secured a 47 - 44 rebounding advantage . The Clippers had all five starters reach double figures in points . Chris Paul led the way , going 6 - for - 10 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding three assists and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for him and J.J. Reddick , who added 25 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and 13 rebounds . He 's now averaging 12 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host New York Knicks , 131 - 123 , at Madison Square Garden on Friday . Defense has been optional for these teams all season and the 254 combined points in this game show just where their priorities are . Denver really took control in the third quarter , outscoring New York , 36 - 22 , and never relinquishing the lead from there . Both offenses were scoring at ease , with both teams shooting over 55 percent from the field . The Nuggets feasted down low , as they won the rebounding differential , 44 - 33 , and outscored the Knicks , 68 - 52 , in the paint . The Nuggets ( 24 - 29 ) have been one of the best offenses in the league this season and this 131 - point outing shows just how efficient they can be . Nikola Jokic was the player of the game , as he dropped a career - high 40 points on 17 - of - 23 shooting , adding nine rebounds , five assists and two rebounds to his tally . Wilson Chandler finished second on the team , collecting 19 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Jameer Nelson started for Emmanuel Mudiay and accrued 16 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Will Barton was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 15 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . The Knicks ( 22 - 33 ) have had a ton of drama surrounding their team and losses like this show just why . Carmelo Anthony did all he could to carry New York , as he accumulated 33 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals on 13 - of - 20 from the field . Kristaps Porzingis was second on the team , finishing with 17 points , four rebounds and two assists . Brandon Jennings got a rare start and led the team with 13 assists , despite going just 2 - of - 10 from the field . Kyle O'Quinn led the bench , providing 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and four blocks .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 117 - 121 , at Pepsi Center on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows which way they 're heading . The second half is when Milwaukee really turned it on , as they outscored Denver , 69 - 30 , in the second and third quarters . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with Milwaukee recording 26 assists to 18 turnovers , while Denver committed 9 turnovers to just 31 assists . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Milwaukee winning that battle , 38 - 48 . The Nuggets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording four more assists , while committing three less turnovers . Nikola Faried was the lone bright spot for the Nuggets , as he led the team with 20 points and 12 rebounds . John Henson totaled 16 points and five rebounds . Gary Harris contributed 14 points , two rebounds and two assists . Wilson Chandler led the Nuggets in scoring , as he accumulated 23 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . John Henson was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 16 points and five rebounds . Darrell Arthur and Darrell Arthur came off the bench to score 10 a piece . On deck for the Bucks is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Saturday . The Bucks ( 21 - 28 ) had to play this game without Jusuf Nurkic ( knee ) , as they simply did n't have enough bullets to beat this hungry Bucks team . Nikola Jokic did all he could to keep Denver in this game , as he accumulated 23 points , eight rebounds and five assists on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Wilson Chandler finished second on the team , totaling 23 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Kenneth Faried recorded a double - double , totaling 20 points and 12 rebounds .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 109 - 87 Tuesday at American Airlines Center . Despite playing their second game in a row and their third game in four days , the Rockets ( 17 - 7 ) had very little trouble handling the Mavericks ( 5 - 18 ) after a slow start to the regular season . Houston ( 17 - 7 ) snapped a three - game losing streak with an impressive win Wednesday . Seven players scored in double digits for the Rockets , led by starting point guard James Harden , who finished with 18 points , nine rebounds and 17 assists . James Harden struggled to find his shot , but managed to get to the line enough to post 18 points , nine rebounds and 17 assists in 40 minutes . For the Mavericks , it was a fairly uninspired performance , and it started with their star big man James Harden . Harden shot just 4 - of - 12 from the field and finished with 18 points , 17 assists , nine rebounds and two steals , in 40 minutes . Trevor Ariza was solid with 17 points , seven rebounds and one assist , in 33 minutes off the bench . Eric Williams chipped in 18 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Rockets shot a steaming 56 percent from the field , including 51 percent from distance , while Houston shot 50 percent from the field . Five players scored in double digits for Dallas , including Harrison Barnes , who finished with 20 points , along with three assists and four rebounds , in 32 minutes . Patrick Beverley chipped in 15 points , while Dorian Finney-Smith added 11 points and four rebounds . Next , the Mavericks host the Bulls on Tuesday night .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 93 - 91 , at Wells Fargo Center on Sunday . The Sixers ( 9 - 24 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Timberwolves ( 11 - 24 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Embiid tally 23 points , 16 rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal . Philadelphia still has plenty of room for improvement despite notching their seventh win in nine games , as they turned the ball over a whopping 16 times . However , they played superb defense , limiting Minnesota to just 40 percent shooting and outrebounded them 48 - 47 . Minnesota was led by Zach LaVine , who tallied 28 points , four rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Ersan Ilyasova went for 19 points , five rebounds , an assist and a block . Robert Covington and Robert Covington contributed a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists , four steals and a block , and the latter supplying two assists , a rebound , and a steal . Andrew Wiggins supplied eight points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal . T.J. McConnell filled out the stat sheet with six points , eight assists , seven rebounds and two steals . Gorgui Dieng had a near double - double with 10 points , eight boards , two assists , a steal and two blocks . Shabazz Muhammad supplied 10 points , five boards and a steal . Ersan Ilyasova led the Sixers with 19 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Robert Covington totaled 13 points , five rebounds , an assist , a steal and two blocks . Robert Covington registered 13 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , four steals and a block . Gorgui Dieng pitched in with 10 points , eight rebounds , two assists , a steal and a pair of blocks . Shabazz Muhammad paced the bench with 10 points . The Sixers head back home to face off with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday evening , while the 76ers remain home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Sunday evening .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 111 - 104 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday . These are two teams on the outside looking in for the playoffs and the Mavericks were able to escape with a huge win to get them closer to that eight - seed . Despite Dallas leading by nine points after the first quarter , Dallas took care of business from there by winning the other three quarters by at least four points . In fact , the Mavericks outscored the Nets , 49 - 36 , in the second half . Defense was key , as they held Brooklyn to 43 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 15 turnovers . Dallas also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 33 - 41 . The Nets ( 13 - 56 ) have now won three of their last four games , as they continue to disappoint playoff contenders . Lopez was the star , as he hit the game - winning shot with six seconds left , en route to a 23 - point , nine - rebound performance . Harrison Barnes went just 8 - of - 15 from the field , but accrued 20 points , six rebounds and two assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was a nice spark off the bench , providing 11 points , six rebounds and two assists . Harrison Barnes was the player of the game , as he provided 19 points , six rebounds and two assists . Wesley Matthews scored 15 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting . Wesley Matthews scored 15 points , going 2 - of - 9 from the field .
Tim Hardaway Jr. is easily having the most productive season of his young NBA career this year , and he has had plenty of standout performances as a result . However , those performances have not always translated to wins for his team , and Wednesday was yet another example . Hardaway Jr. finished with a game - high 36 points on an efficient 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field , but his team fell short against the Hawks 130 - 33 . In the end , it was a night to forget for the Cavaliers , who continue to slide after a hot start to the season . Up next , the Hawks will look to extend their win streak to three games against the Raptors on Thursday , while the Cavaliers will look to end their three - game losing streak Saturday against the surging Charlotte Hornets . Cleveland ( 42 - 18 ) had won two - straight headed into this matchup , but this was a tough task against the Cavaliers . Dennis Schroder was the player of the game , as he tallied 36 points , two rebounds and two assists . Paul Millsap went just 9 - of - 16 from the field , but finished with 27 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 15 points and 10 rebounds . Kent Bazmore was a nice spark off the bench , dropping 14 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting . The Cavaliers will be off until Wednesday , when they host the Boston Celtics for their next game .

Klay Thompson led the way with a game - high 20 points in 34 minutes . Stephen Curry recored his second straight double - double to start the season . He finished with 16 points and nine assists in 34 minutes . David Lee missed his second straight game with a hamstring injury . Andre Iguodala returned to action after missing a slate of games with an ankle injury . He played 29 minutes off the bench and put up nine points and five rebounds . Stephen Curry ( ankle ) sat out Friday after returning to action Sunday . The Jazz will stay home and host the Golden State Warriors on Saturday . Utah has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Jazz will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Jazz have the right guys to build a winning team around . Klay Thompson paced the Jazz with 20 points in 34 minutes , finishing with an impressive double - double . Andrew Bogut played 27 minutes in his second game back from an MCL sprain which forced him to miss most of the preseason . Bogut chipped in 13 points and three rebounds in 27 minutes .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 25 - 33 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 46 - 12 ) 110 - 108 on Friday night . Most people would have expected the Warriors to be the better team at this point of the year , but this result shows just where these two teams are at right now . Brooklyn is one of the worst road teams in the NBA , as they are now 4 - 3 away from BMO Harris Bradley Center . What killed them here were the second and third quarters , in which they were outscored 80 - 20 . The benches were also a huge difference , as Brooklyn got just 16 points from Andrew Bogut and 22 points from their bench . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Nets recorded 20 assists and 15 turnovers , while the Nets committed 17 turnovers to their 20 assists . The Nets have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Deron Williams was the hero , as he hit the game - winning three with less than a second to go . What won the game for the Nets was the rebounding though , as they snatched down 50 rebounds to the Warriors 50 . The Nets have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these two franchises are going right now and Brooklyn is in a lot of trouble right now . The starters amassed just 54 points in this game and that simply wo n't get it done in the NBA . One bright spot is the strong play of Andrew Bogut though , as he tallied 16 points and eight rebounds in the win . This was a great team - win and it 's a fantastic sign to see them win with players like Klay Thompson and Klay Thompson . The Nets will look to break this one on Saturday against the Detroit Pistons .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 36 - 36 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 44 - 32 ) 110 - 93 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Miami . The Trail Blazers came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Heat 20 - 20 in the first quarter alone . The Trail Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 67 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat finished at 39 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Blazers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum , who combined for 62 of the team 's 110 points . McCollum finished with 24 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 6 - 6 3Pt ) and seven assists , while Whiteside had 211 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and 13 rebounds . Lillard nearly recorded a triple - double , as he posted 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 4 FT ) , four assists and six steals . He had had 12 or more points in each of his last three games , so it was good to see him return to form . The only other starter to reach double figures in scoring was Maurice Harkless , who finished with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 2 FT ) in 28 minutes . The only other starter to reach double - digit points was Josh Harkless , who finished with 22 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) . The Heat were led by the duo of Goran Dragic and Hassan Whiteside . McCollum shot 9 - for - 15 from the field and 6 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 24 points . He also added seven assists , giving him his eigth double - double in the last nine games . Gerald Henderson and Gerald Henderson had 17 and 17 points respectively . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Orlando Magic on Wednesday , while the Heat will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 8 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 7 - 11 ) 116 - 99 on Sunday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . Despite being out - rebounded 41 - 26 , the Suns shot 50 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Pacers shot 48 percent from the field and only 31 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Suns 41 - 41 , they were forced into 20 turnovers , which may have been the difference in an otherwise evenly played game . The Suns received a huge contribution from center Goran Dragic , who went 11 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , to go along with five rebounds and four assists . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise as he 's averaging only 9 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a double - double , Roy Hibbert finished with 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 31 minutes . It was his first time reaching double - digit points in his last nine games , while the double - double was his first since the middle of January , so it was good to see the added production from the forward . Coming off the bench , both Gerald Green and David West reached double figures in points . West had 10 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) and six rebounds , while David West had 10 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and six rebounds of his own . The Pacers ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday , while the Pacers will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Miami Heat , 97 - 85 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Russell Westbrook has been virtually unstoppable the majority of the season , but had been somewhat human the last three games after seeing a streak of six consecutive triple - doubles snapped against the Celtics on Dec. 1 . However , matched up Saturday against one of the most porous defenses in the league , especially against point guards , the perennial All-Star exploded for 14 points , a career - high 11 assists and five rebounds , his 50th career triple - double . He added two steals and a block as well . His spectacular performance helped negate a remarkable effort on the other side from Enes Kanter , who notched a career - high 21 - rebound double - double on the road . He also added ten rebounds and an assist . He led the way for the Thunder with 14 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . James was next with 18 points , two rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic was next with 17 points , two assists and two rebounds . Goran Dragic contributed 11 points , four assists and a rebound . Goran Dragic compiled 11 points , four assists and a rebound . Goran Dragic and Goran Dragic followed with a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former also contributing a pair of rebounds and four assists , and the latter registering four boards and four assists . Tyler Johnson was productive as a reserve as well with 10 points , four rebounds , an assist , three steals and a block . The Thunder head back home to face off with the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday evening , while the Thunder remain home and await the Phoenix Suns on Thursday evening .

The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Phoenix Suns , 111 - 106 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as Phoenix took a seven - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 49 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 48 - 49 . Anthony Davis did his best , leading the team with 34 points , nine rebounds and four steals . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 14 points , seven rebounds and five assists . The Pelicans ( 20 - 32 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Jrue Warren finished second on the team , accruing 30 points , four rebounds and three assists . Tyson Chandler recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 13 rebounds .

In a tight battle between two of the more experienced teams in the league , the Spurs were able to hold on in the fourth quarter to secure the five - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 109 - 103 Thursday at Target Center . The Pacers ( 23 - 22 ) came into Thursday 's matchup as one of the worst road teams in the NBA , boasting a 6 - 16 record away from home . They were , however , able to end a three - game losing streak and pull this one out , but it did n't come without a few heroic offensive performances . Paul George led the way with a team - high 32 points , five assists and four rebounds in 37 minutes , while young star Myles Turner an efficient 23 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting from the field on top of six rebounds . But in the backcourt , point guard Jeff Teague put together one of the best all - around performances of his first season with the Pacers , scoring 20 points , dishing out 13 assists and grabbing what ended up being a team - high eight rebounds . The three ended up accounting for 75 of the team 's 109 points , with no other Indiana player managing to score in double figures . In the end , the Pacers won the game through their play on the perimeter , with the team shooting an impressive 10 - of - 18 ( 56 percent ) from downtown . As for the Timberwolves ( 17 - 29 ) , the biggest issues they 've faced all season - - poor defense and lack of depth - - surfaced in Thursday 's contest . Despite getting three stellar performances from their three young stars , they got no help from any of their teammates , and no one could stop the Pacers ' offensive attack . Karl-Anthony Towns finished with a game - high 33 points on top of 10 rebounds and four assists , while Zach LaVine added 23 points and Andrew Wiggins posted 21 of his own . Their Minnesota teammates , however , managed to score just 26 points , causing them to fall just short and putting their three - game win streak to an end . Up next , the Pacers will head home Wednesday to take on the Kings , while the Timberwolves will look to get back on the right track Saturday against the Nets .

Utah has now lost three of their last four games . The Heat will look to keep it rolling on Monday against the Cleveland Cavaliers .

The Detroit Pistons defeated the Denver Nuggets , 103 - 86 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . A truly balanced offensive attack , superior ball security and stingy defense are a winning combination more often than not , and such was the case for the Pistons ( 4 - 2 ) on Saturday . All five members of Detroit 's starting five tallied double - digit scoring , and super - reserve Jon Leuer pitched in off the bench with a 15 - point , 3 - rebound double - double as well . The Pistons also committed only 13 turnovers while eliciting 16 from the Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) , and tallied a stellar 48 percent success rate from the field . The visitors also built themselves a cushion early , winning the first quarter by a 29 - 12 margin that would serve them well the rest of the way . Wilson Chandler totaled 21 points in 31 minutes as a reserve . Danilo Gallinari 's 16 points paced Denver , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal . Ish Smith was next with a bench - leading 11 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope registered 13 points , 1 assists , a rebound and a steal . Jusuf Nurkic contributed 10 points , five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Emmanuel Mudiay paced the second unit with 11 points , three assists , two rebounds and a steal . The Pistons continue on the road and head to Milwaukee for a Saturday night showdown with the Bucks , while the Nuggets are home against the Brooklyn Nets on Monday night .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 102 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 13 - 25 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Grizzlies ( 22 - 25 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Los Angeles forced the Rockets into 10 turnovers , including to the charity stripe 22 times from the Lakers to seal the win . Mike Conley 's 21 points led the Lakers , and he added four assists and a steal . Nick Young was just a rebound short of a double - double with 20 points , nine boards and two assists . D'Angelo Russell supplied 18 points , six boards and six assists . Timofey Mozgov posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double , and Vince Carter supplied a bench - leading 12 points . Tony Allen and Tony Allen followed with matching 8 - point efforts , while Vince Carter compiled 12 points in 21 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies ( 22 - 15 ) were led by Mike Conley 's 21 points , which he supplemented with seven assists and a rebound . Jordan Clarkson provided 16 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Timofey Mozgov posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . Andrew Harrison filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , eight assists and a rebound . Tony Allen and Luol Deng went scoreless over seven minutes , contributing eight points , two rebounds and a steal . The Lakers continue on their swing through the Deep South with a visit to the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday evening , while the Lakers remain home to face the Utah Jazz on Monday .

The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 3 ) 98 - 78 on Tuesday . This was a mismatch on paper and that ended up being the case on Saturday . The Warriors dominated in nearly every category , as they recorded more rebounds , assists , blocks and steals than the Grizzlies . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 31 combined turnovers between both teams . It was a much closer game than expected and the credit has to go to this winless Sixers team to put in a strong effort night - after - night despite losing every single game . Luckily for Memphis , this will be the only time they 'll have to face the Warriors in Golden State this season . This was probably the best performance from the Grizzlies all year , despite in a losing effort . They came into this game as a rare road favorite and ended up living up to those expectations . It was tight throughout , but they ended up scoring 23 points in the final quarter to pull away with the much needed win . Harrison Schroeder was the hero off the bench , as he scored 14 points in just 33 minutes . He 's been a force over his last two games , combining for 50 points , 17 rebounds and 4 blocks . The Toronto Raptors ( 41 - 19 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 33 - 30 ) 117 - 115 on Monday . The importance of the rather unlikely road victory for Toronto can not be underscored , as the Raptors had come in to the contest having dropped three of their previous four games and in tangible danger of losing their grip on the eighth seed in the conference . Further dampening their prospects was the Trail Blazers ' formidable defense , as well as the 15 - game home winning streak they carried into the Sunday night affair . Despite the rather long odds and a 61 - 51 halftime deficit , the visitors rallied on the strength of a typically remarkable effort from Damian Lillard , who poured in a season - high 38 points and supplemented it with five assists and three rebounds . The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 92 - 91 Monday at American Airlines Center . With just over three minutes remaining in Monday 's contest , the Thunder ( 42 - 31 ) looked dead in the water , as they were down 13 and the Mavericks ( 31 - 42 ) had control for majority of the game . Russell Westbrook , however , had other plans , as he led the team on a 140 run to end the game that was topped off by a game - winning jumper from the free throw line . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 37 points ( 16 of which came in the final quarter ) , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes , and he did so while shooting an efficient 15 - of - 30 from the field . And the MVP-candidate carried the load for Oklahoma City , as Victor Oladipo ( 15 ) and Taj Gibson ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Thunder . As for Dallas , they played a strong 45 minutes before collapsing down the stretch and missing their final six shots from the field . Six different Mavericks players managed to score in double figures , but overall , it ended up being a subpar offensive performance from the team , as they shot just 41 percent from the field . It was , however , one of the better performances from Nerlens Noel since he was traded to Dallas , as he recorded 15 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting and eight rebounds - - both of which were team - highs - - in 28 minutes . Up next , the Thunder will look to extend their win streak to three games at home against the Warriors on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will look to end their skid Thursday against the Bulls .

Joe Johnson played a season - high 36 minutes and shot 9 - of - 18 from the field , possessing a team - low negative 37 plus/minus . Even though he was unable to lead the Blazers in scoring , Brook Lopez was held to just 12 points . The Blazers will have a couple days off before traveling to Memphis to take on the Grizzlies on Wenesday . Brooklyn has hit the skids of late and has now lost six in a row . The Nets ' recent slide has put their hold on the sixth seed in jeopardy as they only lead the Heat by 5 games . A big problem Sunday was a lack of production from Brooklyn 's bench , which only contributed 16 points , seven rebounds , and two assists as a collective . The Nets will look to rebound on Tuesday with a crucial game against the Heat .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 1 - 7 ) 109 - 102 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Pelicans were able to out - score the Lakers 34 - 24 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Los Angeles . The Pelicans also out - rebounded the Lakers 44 - 38 , giving them even more of an advantage . After missing three games with a sprained toe , Kobe Bryant returned to the lineup after missing three games with a knee injury . He finished with seven points and five assists over 36 minutes . The Lakers were led by Tyreke Evans on Sunday . He went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding five rebounds and 11 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Jeremy Lin , who came off the bench to score 15 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and grab four rebounds in 34 minutes . Carlos Boozer and Jordan Hill had 10 points apiece . The Pelicans ' next game will be on the road against the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Lakers will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Miami Heat ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 4 - 4 ) 92 - 91 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Heat outscored the Jazz 26 - 25 in the fourth quarter , leading them to their second victory in as many days . Alec Burks led the way in scoring for the Heat , finishing with 24 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt ) , three rebounds , two assists and one steal in 35 minutes . Alec Burks had a big game , scoring 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) to go with four assists , three rebounds and two steals in 29 minutes . Hassan Whiteside had nine points ( 4 - 10 FG ) , 14 rebounds , one steal and five blocks in 29 minutes . Derrick Favors ( knee ) returned to the starting lineup after sitting out the rest of the season . He came off the bench and scored 14 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt ) , to go with four rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks in 35 minutes . The Heat will head to New Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Friday , in what will be the second night of a back - to - back for the home team . The Heat had all five starters score in double figures in this game . Gordon Hayward led the team with 24 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 10 - 12 FT ) , while also contributing three assists . He 's now combined for 56 points over the last two games , as he continues to stay hot on the offensive side of the ball . Alec Johnson also had a nice night off the bench , scoring 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and grabbing 3 rebounds . He 's now averaging 14 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Tuesday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Tuesday .
