Shabazz Napier led the way with 22 points and 0 - of - 2 three - point shooting night . The Magic were lead by Shabazz Napier , who put up 22 points , three assists , one rebound , and one three - pointer in 30 minutes off the bench . The Lakers shot 49 percent from the field and are now mired in a three - game losing streak . Nikola Vucevic recorded his 18th double - double , tallying 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 3 FT ) and eight rebounds in 28 minutes . Lou Fournier was close behind , scoring 16 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , to go along with three assists , one rebound and one steal in 42 minutes . D'Angelo Russell shot 6 - of - 15 from the field but finished with 14 points , six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block in 31 minutes . Next up for the Magic is a trip to Miami for a game on Friday , where they will look to break their current four - game losing streak . The Magic will have a quick turnaround , finishing up their second in four games in a row against the Kings . The Magic begin a three - game road trip Monday against the Golden State Warriors .

Teauge did a lot of his work at the free - throw line , connecting on all 13 of his attempts there . Josh Smith was the lone starter to record double - digits in points . The Clippers have fallen into seventh place in the Western Conference standings , and the absence of Paul might have been sidelined with the lingering back injury . Chris Paul had a double - double , putting up 46 points and nine assists in 38 minutes . It was his first double - double since the beginning of January , and it 's a bright spot in what has been a disappointing season for the Clippers . Clippers will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 111 - 103 , at Wells Fargo Center on Monday . The Spurs ( 40 - 12 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Monday . However , that did n't deter them from notching their sixth road victory of the season on the strength of standout efforts from Davis ' replacement Kawhi Leonard and the surging Kawhi Leonard off the bench . The two combined for more than half of the Spurs ' points on the night , and San Antonio also shot 53 percent from the field overall . Leonard added five rebounds and five assists to his team - high scoring total . Parker complemented his aforementioned scoring total with six rebounds and a block . Tony Parker contributed a 18 - point , 5 - assist double - double , while Robert Covington produced 18 points and 11 boards . Dewayne Dedmon supplied 10 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and a block . T.J. McConnell filled out the stat sheet with six points , five assists , three rebounds and three steals . T.J. McConnell supplied six points , five assists , a rebound and three steals . Gerald Stauskas led the bench with 6 points and seven rebounds . The Sixers continue their trek through the Northeast with a Monday night visit to Philadelphia to face the Sixers , while the 76ers remain home to tangle with the inter - city rival Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening .
In a game with 11 ties and 11 lead changes in total , neither team led by more than eight points in this overtime thriller . Defense carried the Spurs , as they held the Pelicans to 39 percent shooting , while committing 16 turnovers . San Antonio 's bench was huge as well , outscoring New Orleans ' bench , 35 - 16 . Kawhi Leonard carried the Spurs , as he accumulated 31 points , seven rebounds , six assists and three steals . LaMarcus Aldridge finished second on the team with 21 points , 15 rebounds and three blocks . Patty Mills provided 15 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals off the bench , while Pau Gasol amassed 12 points and eight rebounds off the pine as well . Anthony Davis led the Spurs with 29 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 26 points , seven rebounds and five assists . DeMarcus Cousins accumulated 19 points , 24 rebounds and four assists . Patty Mills was huge off the bench , providing 15 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Spurs will host the Miami Heat for their next game on Monday . The Pelicans ( 47 - 13 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 18th win in 32 games at home . Jrue Holiday was the star , as he scored a game - high 31 points en route to becoming the sixth player in NBA history to reach 30,0 points . He also added eight rebounds on 7 - of - 18 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge finished second on the team with 21 points and 14 rebounds . Pau Gasol recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 9 rebounds .
The Indiana Pacers ( 29 - 34 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 21 - 44 ) 118 - 86 on Wednesday . A tightly - contested affair neverthless featured a fair share of mistakes from both teams , and the victorius Pacers were actually more of a guilty party . Indiana committed 13 turnovers , 13 of which came from the starting five . However , four players from the first unit also managed double - digit scoring , as did two reserves , providing the visitors with a balanced attack . The Pacers also managed a 53 percent success rate from the field overall , and played solid defense on Victor Oladipo 's three - point attempt in the closing seconds to prevent the go - ahead basket . Rookie Nikola Vucevic subsequently hauled in a pair of rebounds and an assist , while Nikola Vucevic contributed an 13 - point , 5 - rebound double - double . The Pacers are in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is 11 games behind the eighth - seeded Detroit Pistons . They head home to take on the Indiana Pacers on Monday night . Indiana was paced by Rodney Stuckey , who managed a game - high 34 points , and added seven rebounds , seven assists , a steal and a block . Harris followed with 22 points , six rebounds and a pair of assists . Elfrid Payton tallied 14 points , six rebounds , six assists , a steal and a block . Nikola Vucevic endured a tough shooting night against the Hornets on Friday , managing 14 points , five rebounds , six assists and a pair of steals . The Pacers remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Philadelphia to face the Sixers on Saturday .
Bradley Beal has been playing like an offensive juggernaut since returning from a hamstring injury that held him out for three games , and his 31 - point performance on Wednesday continued that trend . Since returning , Beal has been averaging 24 points while shooting 67 percent from the field overall . And while those numbers jump off the page , what may jump even higher off the page is the number of minutes he has been playing . Beal , who already has a rich injury history in this young season , has played at least 38 minutes in his last six games with the 41 he played against Sacramento being the highest he 's played all season . Head coach Scott Brooks has said that he needs Beal on the floor to give the Wizards a chance of winning the game , but with Beal failing to put together anything close complete NBA season in his career , the wear and tear on an already fragile body could be dangerous for a struggling Washington team . The Kings shot just 41 percent from the field , a dubiously low shooting percentage that seldoms come accompanied with a win . Only two Kings players scored in double figures , as Otto Porter , Otto Porter , Jr. led the team with 15 points . Beal shot 12 - of - 24 from the field , including 7 - of - 7 from three - point range , while also providing six rebounds and three assists . The Kings will host the Wizards on Saturday , while the Wizards will host the Portland Trail Blazers .
Bradley Beal 's season - high 41 points on 13 - of - 23 shooting led the way for Washington , which shot 53 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range in the high - scoring affair . Markieff Morris was second with 23 points , 12 of which came in the fourth quarter , while John Wall registered an 18 - point , 11 - assist double - double . Otto Porter and Marcin Gortat had nine points apiece . The Wizards finished the game on a 22 - 8 run to key the comeback victory at home . Blake Griffin 's 26 points paced the Clippers , while J.J. Redick checked in a rather distant second with 7 points . Chris Paul and DeAndre Jordan both tallied double - doubles , with the former also dishing out 12 assists and the latter hauling in 17 boards . Marreese Speights and Austin Rivers were highly productive off the bench , turning in 14 and 13 points , respectively . The Clippers next game will be on Tuesday , when they play the Los Angeles Clippers , while the Clippers play a day off before visiting the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday . The Clippers play in the second half of a back - to - back , as they host the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday , while the Wizards host the 76ers for their next game on Friday . The Clippers ( 20 - 8 ) had won four of their last five games headed into this matchup , so a road win is just what the doctor ordered . Bradley Beal was the player of the game , as he tallied 41 points , three rebounds and three assists on 13 - of - 23 shooting . John Wall finished with 18 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points , 17 rebounds and two blocks . Marreese Speights got the start at point guard and scored 14 points in 12 minutes of action .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 11 - 11 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 16 - 11 ) 98 - 94 on Sunday . Damian LIllard ( foot ) sat out a fourth consecutive game , but the all star point guard was not needed , as the Blazers won the second game of a difficult back - to - back . Coming off a blowout performance against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday , Portland turned to C.J . Thompson to carry the weight at Sleep Train Arena . Lillard fell one assist shy of a triple - double and rounded out the box score to the tune of 22 points , six rebounds , five assists and three steals on 6 - of - 22 shooting . Wesley Collison added 13 points , three rebounds and one assist on 7 - of - 20 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge scored 10 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting across 14 minutes for the last time in 33 minutes . The Blazers have the fourth - worst record in the league and are still in danger of losing their top - 1 protected draft pick this summer . They’re two games behind the Philadelphia 76ers , the team the Kings would convey their pick to , for third - worst record . Omri Casspi , who returned to action Wednesday , led the way with 26 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting , including 1 - 2 from three - point range . Portland will continue their road trip with a visit to Memphis on Saturday as they return home to face the Portland Trail Blazers .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Orlando Magic , 111 - 92 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 23 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Orlando 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 54 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while Orlando went 43 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as the Hawks recorded more assists than the Magic , while committing less turnovers . The Hawks ( 19 - 16 ) are starting to rebound after a terrible December and dominant road wins like this show just how good they can be . Dennis Schroeder ran the offense at ease , accumulating 18 points , six rebounds and seven assists in the win . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 12 rebounds . Paul Millsap tallied 16 points , six rebounds , four assists and four steals . Kent Bazmore was second in scoring , dropping 17 points and handing out four assists . The Hawks will play again on Thursday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 118 - 103 , at Spectrum Center on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 36 - 28 ) have shown drastic improvement this season , often giving teams all they can handle even on nights when they come up short . Their fighting spirit was on full display Saturday , as they came back from an 10 - point deficit in the fourth quarter to take a 118 - 103 lead with a 1 - 103 advantage in the final minute of the third quarter . That set up a nip - and - tuck fourth period that was decided in the final minute , when Charlotte outscored the visitors ( 33 - 32 ) by a 28 - 22 margin in the final period to seal the road win . Charlotte shot 51 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while seeing six players hit double digits in the scoring column . The visitors also shot 51 percent overall , while holding the Pistons to sub - 27 percent success rates from the field and three - point range . Tobias Harris was second on the visitors with a 20 - point , five - rebound double - double that also included one assist and three steals . Courtney Lee matched Lee 's point total and added six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Cody Zeller totaled 10 points , four boards , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Andre Drummond provided a modest five points as well , adding nine rebounds , one assist and one block . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope paced the starting five with 24 points , two rebounds , one block and one steal . Kemba Walker tallied 16 points , eight assists , one rebound and one steal . Al Jefferson was productive as a reserve as well with 12 points , four rebounds , one block and one steal . The Pistons head back home to tangle with the Phoenix Suns on Sunday afternoon , while the Hornets head to the Nation 's Capital to tangle with the Washington Wizards on Tuesday evening .
The New York Knicks defeated the Indiana Pacers 87 - 81 Tuesday at Madison Square Garden . It was a rough start for the Knicks ( 27 - 41 ) , who scored just 24 points in the first quarter . Those struggles carried into the second quarter , and the team found themselves down by 10 at the half and they appeared ready to earn their fourth straight loss . A big second half , however , helped turn this around , and they managed to outscore the Pacers ( 34 - 33 ) by 16 in the second half en route to the victory . Carmelo Anthony led the way for New York , recording a double - double of 22 points and 13 rebounds in 41 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis struggled in the outing , shooting just 5 - of - 17 from the field en route to scoring 11 points , and to make matters worse , he left the game early in the fourth quarter and did not return due to a thigh bruise . As for Indiana , it was a forgettable shooting night for them in every aspect of the game . As a team , the Pacers shot just 37 percent from the field , 28 percent from behind the arc and 60 percent from the free throw line - - although they only attempted 15 shots at the charity stripe . Paul George led the way with over a quarter of the team 's points , finishing with 22 points on a rough 9 - of - 22 shooting performance from the field . Myles Turner was the only other Indiana player to score in double figures , with the big man notching a double - double of 17 points and 12 rebounds in 31 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will have a rematch with the Nets on Thursday , while the Pacers will head home Wednesday to play the Hornets .
Houston 's James Harden has been phenomenal as the Rockets have surged to third in the Western Conference , and the All-Star guard does not seem to be letting up . On Wednesday , Harden scored 19 points to go along with seven rebounds and 13 assists . The numbers were far from abnormal for Harden , however , as `` The Beard '' ranks fifth in the NBA in scoring and first in assists . The Rockets shot over 52 percent from the field , and , unsurprisingly , drained 17 three - pointers . Under coach Mike D'Antoni , Houston has become the top three - point shooting team in the NBA . Of course , this is due in part to the arrival of free agents Ryan Anderson and Cameron Payne . On Tuesday , Williams combined for 30 points , eight rebounds and nine assists . The Bulls ( 31 - 34 ) have now droppped three straight games and look poised to finish in seventh place in the Western Conference . The team shot 38 percent from the field and just 14 percent from three - point range . Overall , it was a fairly poor shooting night for Houston , as the team shot just 39 percent from the field and 14 percent from three - point range . Surprisingly , though , those issues did not stem from notoriously inefficient point guard Jimmy Butler . Butler shot 6 - of - 12 and scored 16 points , the most of any Bulls ' starter . Sophomore big man Rajon Rondo added 17 points , five rebounds , and four assists .
Kawhi Leonard finished with a game - high 24 points on efficient 9 - of - 12 shooting , to go along with two rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , in 31 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge added 16 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , along with six rebounds in 30 minutes in 30 minutes . Khris Middleton chipped in 19 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting , along with four assists and three rebounds , in 34 minutes . Five other players scored in double digits for the Spurs , including Jonathon Simmons , who added 18 points and Boris Diaw , who chipped in 14 points . Patty Diaw chipped in 14 points on 3 - of - 7 shooting , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Bucks were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 16 points , four rebounds , two blocks , two assists and one steal , in 30 minutes . The Spurs will look to keep it rolling as they play host to the Nets on Monday . Meanwhile , the Bucks ( 14 - 22 ) have now dropped two straight and fall to 6 - 14 at home with this victory on the road . Only two players scored in double figures for San Antonio , led by Kawhi Leonard , who finished with 24 points on 9 - of - 12 shooting , including 3 - of - 5 from long range , along with two rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 31 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge followed up with 16 points and 11 rebounds , while LaMarcus Aldridge added 16 points , four rebounds and six assists .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 59 - 19 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 36 - 42 ) 114 - 111 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 33 - 26 in the first quarter alone . The Nets were n't going to let that phase them though , and they slowly closed the gap throughout the second quarter and into the fourth . The Nets then went on a 90 run to start the fourth quarter to bring the score within five points , but the Hawks were able to hold off the comeback , and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this one , going 50 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets finished at 47 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Brook Lopez backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 26 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , to go along with 2 rebounds and two assists . Horford has really struggled with his shot of late , averaging 15 points over his last three games , while shooting 55 percent or higher from the field in four of his last five games . The Chicago Bulls ( 18 - 12 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 18 - 13 ) 102 - 100 on Wednesday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Aaron Brooks returned to the starting lineup after missing the previous three games with a hip injury and had seven points in 13 minutes off the bench . The Bulls were without Derrick Rose ( hamstring ) , but Bobby Portis stepped up for the Bulls ' starting lineup , scoring 16 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting in 26 minutes . The Miami Lakers ( 17 - 21 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 27 ) 78 - 75 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers were down 81 - 78 following the third quarter , but were able to make a run in the final quarter , out - scoring the Lakers 17 - 22 to finish off the game and secure the six - point victory on the road . The Lakers were the superior shooters in this game , going 32 percent from the field and 13 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 32 percent from the floor and just 17 percent from beyond the arc . The Lakers were also able to force the Lakers into 20 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Lakers were led by Mario Chalmers , who went 7 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Lakers ' seven - game win streak . Chalmers on the other hand finished with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , three rebounds and eight assists of his own . Considering he 's only averaging 8 points on the year , it was a nice suprise for the Lakers despite the loss . Coming just shy of a double - double , Kobe Bryant finished with 12 points ( 3 - 19 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds . He 's now averaging 12 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Utah Jazz ( 24 - 35 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 42 - 17 ) 93 - 82 on Saturday . Utah came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Jazz team . The key for Utah was their shooting , as they shot 45 percent from the field and 60 percent from three - point range , while the Grizzlies shot 40 percent from the field and 27 percent from long distance . Memphis really buckled down in the fourth quarter though , as they held the Grizzlies to 21 points , while scoring 29 on their end . The key in this game was the Utah defense , as they held the Grizzles to 40 percent shooting and forced 11 turnovers . Another huge key was the low - post defense , as the Jazz combined for 17 blocks in their win . Memphis had to play this game without Marc Gasol , Zach Randolph , Mario Chalmers and Mike Conley and those injuries are just too difficult to overcome . Derrick Favors did step up in his absence though , as he accumulated 21 points , six rebounds and three assists . Marc Gasol tallied 17 points , eight rebounds and three assists of his own . Memphis will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . This is a downright bad loss for the Grizzlies and they continue to fall deeper and deeper out of the playoffs . Gordon Hayward led the team with 21 points , while also dishing out five assists . Marc Gasol had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 17 points , eight rebounds and three blocks . Up next for the Jazz is a favorable matchup against the Phoenix Suns on Thursday .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 119 - 108 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . Turnover have plagued these two teams all season and 45 combined turnovers in this game shows just that . The third quarter was the difference for Golden State , as they outscored Philadelphia , 34 - 24 . Rebounding was also decisive , with Golden State winning that battle , 45 - 42 . The Warriors also won the shooting differential , hitting 45 percent of their shots to the 76ers 45 percent . The Warriors ( 50 - 9 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and losses like this are devastating for that pursuit . Klay Thompson led Philadelphia , as he tallied 21 points , three rebounds and two assists . Draymond Green went just 5 - of - 23 from the field , but finished with 14 points , six rebounds and 11 assists . The Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 51 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 15 - 56 ) 119 - 107 on Friday at the Pepsi Center in Phoenix . The Suns got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 16 - 16 in the first quarter alone . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 42 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns also forced the Lakers into 10 turnovers , while committing 10 of their own . The Suns were led by the duo of Kobe Bryant and Devin Booker . Booker went 12 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's been scoring at a high rate lately , averaging 27 points over his last five games . He 's had a nice three - game stretch , combining for 31 points and 56 rebounds over that span . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 56 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .

They finished at 52 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 42 percent from the floor and 36 percent from deep . Smith finished with 15 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 2 - 11 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds as well . The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 113 - 95 , at American Airlines Arena on Monday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Miami blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 24 - 8 run spanning between the second and third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Pacers into a 12 - point lead for the Heat . Despite there being just two ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 15 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 40 minutes . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Miami going 14 - of - 29 from long range , while Indiana went just 8 - of - 15 . The Heat also dominated the fastbreak points , winning that battle , 16 - 3 . Goran Dragic was the player of the game , as he tallied 21 points , two rebounds and four assists . Myles Turner totaled 18 points , seven rebounds , three blocks and three steals . Jeff Teague accrued 16 points and six assists . Paul George was the Heat best player , accumulating 21 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Dion Waiter was just as good , collecting 22 points , three rebounds and three assists . James Johnson led the team in scoring off the bench , collecting 21 points , two rebounds and four assists . Indiana will look to play better on Saturday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans .

The All-Star point guard posted 26 points , 14 assists , six rebounds , a steal and a block . Markieff Morris followed with 19 points , five rebounds , two assists and three steals . Jerian Grant provided nine points , six rebounds , six assists and a steal . Jerian Grant provided nine points , two rebounds , six assists and a steal , while Jerian Grant generated nine points , two rebounds , six assists and one steal in 25 minutes off the bench . The Atlanta Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 3 - 6 ) 100 - 97 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their second straight loss Wednesday . The Hawks were led by the duo of Jeff Teague and Kyle Millsap in this one . Millsap shot 13 - for - 23 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding 17 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a career - high in both points and blocks for Millsap , as he continues to make his case for a larger role come next season . Starting alongside Favors , Derrick Favors had a solid outing as well , recording 20 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds and two steals . Like Millsap , he 's turned it on offensively of late , scoring 9 or more points in four out of his last five games . Kyle Korver really struggled with his shot in this one , as he went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 17 points . It was his third straight double - double , as he 's averaged 27 points and 11 rebounds over that span of games . The Jazz ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .

He said he could have played if the game was a must - win but that it 's more important to make sure he does n't injure himself further at this time of the season . San Antonio has been flying slightly under the radar all season due to the remarkable success of the Golden State Warriors in their very same conference . However , the gap between the two teams continues to close , with the Warriors beginning to amass a few losses and the Spurs upping their already impressive level of play even further . Augustin paced all scorers with 22 points , which he supplemented with six assists and three rebounds . The Chicago Bulls ( 30 - 17 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 36 - 7 ) 113 - 111 on Sunday . The importance of the rather unlikely road victory for Chicago can not be underscored , as the Warriors had come in to the contest having dropped three of their previous four games and in tangible danger of losing their grip on the eighth seed in the conference . Further dampening their prospects was the Warriors ' formidable defense , as well as the 12 - game home winning streak they carried into the Sunday night affair . Despite the rather long odds and a 61 - 51 halftime deficit , the visitors rallied on the strength of a typically remarkable effort from Klay Thompson , who poured in a season - high 30 points ( 4 - 33 FG , 4 - 12 3Pt , 0 - 12 FT ) . Steph Curry was right behind him with 21 points ( 9 - 23 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , nine rebounds and nine assists , in 43 minutes . Pau Gasol tallied a double - double with 18 points and 16 rebounds , along with eight assists and four blocks , in 41 minutes . Joakim Green shot a convincing 4 - 12 from the field on his way to 18 points , along with seven rebounds and four assists , in 39 minutes . The Warriors shot a poor 43 percent from the field but managed to hold the Warriors to an even lower 43 percent , which allowed them to storm off with their 18th road win . The Warriors entered this game 3 games out of eighth spot in the East and this loss only dampens their chances of catching up , however they did see a huge plus - side in the performances of young stars David Lee and David Lee . Lee was fantastic in the win , scoring 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) to go with nine rebounds , six assists and a block . Harrison Barnes added 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 40 minutes .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 21 - 21 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 21 - 45 ) 96 - 99 on Sunday at the Smoothie King Center in Oklahoma City . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 21 - 21 in the first quarter alone . The Thunder were the superior shooters , going 43 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 43 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . While they may not have had the shooting advantage , the Thunder did it elsewhere , as they out - rebounded the Thunder 54 - 37 and forced them into 12 turnovers , while committing only 24 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . With the win , the Thunder remain a half game ahead of the streaking San Antonio Spurs for the fifth projected playoff seed in the West , while the Portland Trail Blazers still own a game lead over the Clippers for the fourth spot in the West . The Thunder got the bulk of their production from their backcourt duo of Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook . Westbrook went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding six rebounds and a blocked shot . Over his last five games , he 's now boasting averages of 29 points , 8 rebounds and 4 blocks , while shooting 44 percent from the field . Karl-Anthony Towns was another big reason the team had some decent production . He went 8 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also grabbing nine rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Dieng and a nice surprise for the Thunder , as he 's averaging only 13 points per game so far this season . Gorgui Kanter added a double - double of his own , adding 25 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 14 rebounds . It was his fifth double - double of the season . Coming off the bench , Enes Kanter recorded 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 21 minutes .

The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 113 - 95 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Mavericks ( 19 - 30 ) steamrolled their way to a fourth straight victory as they continue to be much - improved since the start of the new year . They have now won five of their last six games and boast a 9 - 6 record in 2017 . A major part of this run has been the play of Seth Curry , who scored a game - high 22 points Wednesday on top of six assists , four steals and three rebounds . It was his ninth game since the start of the new year with at least 15 points . The surprise performance of the night , however , came off the bench from Salah Mejri , who played just 21 minutes as a reserve but recorded 16 points and a game - high 17 rebounds in that time . Devin Harris also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 14 points in just 19 minutes . As for the 76ers ( 18 - 30 ) , they 've cooled off a bit since their hot start to January , as they have now lost three of their last four games after Wednesday 's defeat . Jahlil Okafor put together a solid offensive performance in the loss , scoring 16 points in 24 minutes , but it 's clear that Philadelphia is missing the inside presence of Joel Embiid , who has now missed five of the last six games with a knee contusion . Ersan Ilyasova added a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds , but overall for the 76ers , it was a forgettable night offensively . The team ended up shooting just 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from behind the arc while committing 21 total turnovers . Up next , the Mavericks will look to continue their winning ways against Portland on Friday , while the 76ers will travel Thursday to San Antonio .

The Indiana Pacers ( 1 - 4 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 4 - 1 ) 94 - 96 on Tuesday at the Verizon Center in Washington . No matter the record , games will always be close between teams of the same division . In this battle between Southeast Division foes , the Pacers stole a victory on the road in Washington . John Sloan was able to put up a game - high of 31 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , to go along with six rebounds , 10 assists , three steals and one block in 43 minutes . Garrett Temple also had a solid game , posting 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt ) , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals in 43 minutes . Marcin Gortat had a double - double of his own , finishing with 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) and 10 rebounds . He 's now averaging 14 points and 4 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double - digit points was Louis Miles , who came off the bench to score 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) , including 4 - 7 from deep . As a team , the Pacers shot just 39 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line . They were able to outscore the Wizards in the paint 48 - 37 , but it was n't enough to make up for the lackluster efforts from the Wizards . The Wizards ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday , while the Wizards will travel to Philadelphia to play the 76ers on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 10 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 2 - 13 ) 108 - 96 on Sunday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Lakers had a monster first half where they out - scored the Lakers 70 - 48 , allowing them to coast to an easy victory against the Lakers . They were the superior shooters in this one , going 49 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 44 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum , who combined for 62 of the team 's 108 points . Lillard led the team with 29 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 5 - 11 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also contributing seven assists and four steals . It was his fifth double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 24 points and 19 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Jordan Clarkson was the only other player to reach double - digits , scoring 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) to go along with three rebounds and four assists . Coming off the bench , Jordan Clarkson added a 19 - point , 3 - rebound double - double . He came off the bench for an extremely efficient 19 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) in 30 minutes . Coming off the bench , Jordan Clarkson added 19 points , going 8 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line . The Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 121 - 114 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Rockets ( 31 - 9 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Houston forced the Hornets into an uncharacteristic 11 turnovers and hit the free - throw line 38 times to the Rockets ' eight . However , they forced the Hornets ( 20 - 19 ) to 48 percent shooting overall and inducing 11 turnovers . Charlotte was led by Frank Kaminsky III in a reserve role , as he totaled 22 points and three rebounds over 27 minutes . Jeremy Lamb was next in a reserve role as well , tallying 16 points , six rebounds , four assists and a block . Houston remains in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They head home to face the Toronto Raptors on Sunday . Houston ( 20 - 9 ) appeared intent on not allowing that to transpire again , and their focus on limiting Charlotte 's best all - around player was effective enough to insure themselves a home victory . Kemba Walker paced the visitors with 25 points , 10 assists , six rebounds and a steal . Marvin Williams posted 16 points , eight rebounds , three assists and a steal . Ryan Anderson produced a near double - double with 13 points , nine boards , an assist and two steals . Ryan Anderson was next with 13 points , two rebounds , an assist and two steals . Jeremy Lamb was next with 13 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Jeremy Lamb matched Lamb 's point total while leading the bench and added five rebounds , four assists and a steal . Jeremy Lamb paced the second unit with 11 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Hornets are currently in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Monday night .
Youngsters were on display in this matchup of struggling teams and Andrew Wiggins shined the brightest . Wiggins finished the game with 36 points and eight rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . He 's on quite the tear right now , as he has scored 111 points across his last three games . Karl-Anthony Towns played well too , as he accumulated 21 points and seven rebounds on 8 - of - 15 shooting . That shooting percentage was especially encouraging , considering he was just 15 - of - 45 across his last two games . Gorgui Hollis-Jefferson was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . Sean Kilpatrick was demoted to the bench , but collected 14 points , five rebounds and three assists in a motivated performance . Tyus Jones also got a double - double off the bench , totaling 12 points and 5 rebounds . Brooklyn will look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game . The Nets ( 3 - 4 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Andrew Wiggins continued his great form , as he led the team with 36 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Karl-Anthony Towns was n't far behind , amassing 21 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Trevor Booker recorded a 15 - point , 9 - rebound double - double . On deck for Minnesota is a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday . The Nets ( 3 - 5 ) had their first primetime game in awhile and they did n't disappoint . Andrew Wiggins was especially impressive , as he scored a game - high 36 points on 13 - of - 29 shooting . He also added eight rebounds and two assists in 41 minutes of action . Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double in the win , totaling 21 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Trevor Booker scored 15 points , but grabbed nine rebounds and had one assist .
Klay Thompson has become an x - factor for this Warriors team , as while his up - and - down start to the regular season has n't really had a huge impact on the team 's overall performance , when he 's hitting his shots , the team is nearly unbeatable . As of late , Thompson 's shot has really come together , as he has now , after Monday 's 34 - point performance , led the team in scoring in two of their last three games . They 've also won those games by a combined 53 points . The Thunder , on the other hand , are going in a much different direction , as they are now 7 - 30 on the season . It 's been due in large part to their lack of bench production , as they currently rank in the bottom 10 of the NBA . The return of Klay Thompson , who is averaging 22 points and 15 rebounds over his last 11 games , and this is the defense 's worst performance of the season . In fact , he shot just 4 - of - 14 from the field en route to scoring just two points . It was not an aberration for the point guard , as he pulled down 2 - of - 2 from the free - throw line . Russell Westbrook was the only other Oklahoma City player in double figures , as he accumulated 15 points , eight rebounds and seven assists . The only other Thunder player in double figures was JaVale McGee , who had 10 points in 13 minutes off the bench .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 115 - 111 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers took a 30 - 21 lead after the first quarter , as they never trailed after that . The Indiana offense was as efficient as ever , going 45 percent from the field , 50 percent from three - point range and 72 percent from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Pacers winning that battle , 50 - 20 . Russell Westbrook added another triple - double to his tally , accumulating 31 points , 11 rebounds and 15 assists . Thaddeus Young led the Pacers in scoring , as he dropped 20 points to go along with his 11 boards . Thaddeus Young was second on the team , totaling 20 points and 11 rebounds . Myles Turner totaled 15 points , nine rebounds , two blocks and two steals . Monta Ellis was a huge spark off the bench , dropping 30 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting . The Thunder ( 7 - 6 ) have been unlucky in terms of results this season and a win over the Thunder shows just how good they can be . Thaddeus Young led the team in scoring , as he provided 20 points , 11 rebounds and two steals on 9 - of - 18 shooting . Victor Oladipo was second on the team , accumulating 14 points , five rebounds and six assists on 6 - of - 14 shooting . Steven Adams was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 15 points and nine rebounds . Aaron Brooks led the bench by dropping 10 points .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 100 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . It was n't lopsided throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 22 lead changes in the first half . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Sacramento , 47 - 22 , in the second half to pull away . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Warriors winning that battle , 44 - 30 . Draymond Green added another triple - double to his tally , collecting 23 points , 4 rebounds and eight assists . Buddy Hield was the only other starter with more than four points , as he dropped 22 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . Draymond Green went just 8 - of - 17 from the field , but still accrued 23 points , four rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Skal Labissiere finished with 10 points and 10 rebounds en route to a double - double . On deck for Golden State is a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . The Warriors ( 58 - 14 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Buddy Hield led the way for Sacramento , as he tallied 20 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and two steals on 7 - of - 14 shooting off the bench . Skal Lawson finished second on the team , totaling 10 points , four rebounds and two assists . Klay Thompson scored just eight points , but dished out seven assists in the win .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 30 - 40 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 34 - 36 ) 85 - 94 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 41 percent from the floor and just 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Bucks were able to force the Jazz into 19 turnovers , while only committing 23 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Bucks were led by Gordon Hayward who finished with 18 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 3 FT , 3 - 3 FT ) , four rebounds and two steals . The 13 assists were a new season - high for him , as he was able to get his teammates involved in the blowout win . Giannis Antetokounmpo had a solid all - around game . He scored 19 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and grabbed eight rebounds in 35 minutes of action . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Gordon Hayward was dialed in with his shot , going 6 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 18 points . He also chipped in with four rebounds , three steals and a blocked shot , in 36 minutes . Trey Lyles was another big contributor off the bench , as he posted 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and four rebounds . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Oklahoma City Thunder , 110 - 108 , at America Airlines Arena on Tuesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 22 - 9 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Oklahoma City 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 55 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Oklahoma City also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 15 more assists than Oklahoma City , while committing six less turnovers . The Hawks ( 16 - 14 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Russell Westbrook continued his ridiculous form , as he tallied 46 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists . Paul Westbrook was n't far behind , accumulating 30 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists of his own . Andre Millsap was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 14 points and five rebounds . Jerami Grant was a nice spark off the bench , providing 15 points and one rebound . Jerami Grant , Jerami Grant and Jerami Grant each scored 15 points a piece off the bench . The Hawks will look to keep rolling on Wednesday , when they host the Washington Wizards for their next game .

The shooting was terrible from both teams , as they both shot 31 percent from the field . The difference for the suns was the play of their starters , as they outscored the Bulls starters 80 - 31 . In fact , no Clippers starter scored in double figures for the first time in over a decade . This now gives Los Angeles four wins in their last five games , with Chris Butler leading the team with 28 points . Chris Paul was the player of the game though , as he scored 28 points and snatched down five rebounds . Jamal Crawford was the only other player in double figures , as he amassed 16 points and four assists off the bench . On deck for the Bulls is a matchup with the Utah Jazz on Sunday . The Clippers have been struggling mightily recently and they were walking into a buzz saw here . This game was decided early , as no starter played more than 31 minutes to spare some minutes for a game on Thursday . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , as he amassed 16 points , three assists and three blocks in the defeat . Los Angeles has now lost eight of their last 13 and they are starting to look like a bad team . The good news is that the defense has been the problem all year and that really wasn’t the issue today . The Bulls will look to bounce - back against the Denver Nuggets on Sunday . The Clippers are one of the hottest teams in the NBA and they showed why on Sunday . They didn’t play well , but knuckled down defensively to pick up an impressive win . The team was led by Nikola Mirotic , who tallied 29 points , nine rebounds and four blocks in the loss . Nikola Mirotic also had a nice game off the bench , as he scored 13 points while grabbing 11 boards . The Clippers have a quick turnaround , as they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday in a back - to - back set . The Clippers played one of their best defensive games of the season in a statement win . Nikola Mirotic had a nice game off the bench , as he scored 29 points and grabbed 11 rebounds in the win . Joakim Jordan tallied nine points and 26 rebounds in his first game back from an ankle injury . The Clippers will look to bounce - back against the Denver Nuggets in their next game on Sunday .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets ' lead to two points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter . Matthews ' heads up defense forced a turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season . Matthews continued to put the team on his shoulders after draining a 27 - foot three pointer to tie the game at 92 with four seconds left in the game , but he also committed a shooting foul on James Harden’s ensuing drive to the hoop with just one - tenth of a second left to play . Harden missed the first free throw but sank the second and that was all that needed to ice the game for Houston . Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . Eric Gordon and Ryan Anderson joined Harden in double figures with 14 points each , while Clint Capela was strong on the glass , totaling 10 rebounds . Wes Matthews struggled from behind - the - arc , but not when it mattered most for Dallas . Matthews finished with 25 points , four boards and three assists on 9 - of - 25 shooting ( 3 - of - 15 from three ) . Harrison Barnes started 3 - of - 5 from the field but ended up missing his next six attempts on his way to a lowly 10 points in 38 minutes of action . The Rockets will head to Cleveland to visit the reigning champion Cavaliers on Tuesday , while the Mavericks will visit the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .
The visiting San Antonio Spurs defeated the Boston Celtics , 109 - 103 , at TD Center on Friday . The Spurs ( 13 - 3 ) put together a strong effort over the final three quarters after falling in a first - quarter hole to keep their road record unblemished . The Celtics ( 9 - 7 ) jumped out to a 32 - 32 advantage after the first 12 minutes , but San Antonio outscored their hosts by an 87 - 71 margin over the final three periods . Kawhi Leonard led the way with a 25 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , while the Spurs ' second unit combined for 56 points , over half of the team 's scoring total . The visitors were solid all the way around offensively , tallying respective 47 and 46 percent success rates from the field and three - point range . Leonard added four assists and two blocks to his team - high scoring total . Next among the starters was Danny Green , who posted 11 points , seven rebounds , two assists and four blocks . His final rejection of the afternoon was the most important , as he stuffed an Isaiah Thomas 25 - foot three - point attempt with 12 seconds left to insure the Celtics were kept at bay . LaMarcus Aldridge totaled 10 points , four rebounds , four assists and a block . Pau Gasol notably went scoreless over 17 minutes , but he did contribute five rebounds , two assists and a block . The bench more than made up for any scoring void on the part of the starting five , however , as Patty Mills led the way with 19 points , a rebound , an assist and a steal . Meanwhile , David Lee and Davis Bertans combined for a pair of 15 - point efforts , with the former also hauling in 12 rebounds and dishing out three assists . The Celtics were led by Thomas ' 24 points , which he supplemented with eight assists and a rebound . Avery Bradley contributed 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Jae Crowder supplied 18 points , five assists , three rebounds and a steal . Al Horford registered a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and and two blocks . Kelly Olynyk and Danny Smart paced the bench with a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former also supplying four rebounds , two assists , three steals and a block , and the latter posting three assists , eight rebounds and three blocks . The Celtics head to Philadelphia to take on the Sixers for a Monday night showdown , while the Celtics head west to Portland to take on the Trail Blazers .

The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Brooklyn Nets ( 5 - 7 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 11 ) 94 - 92 on Friday . Russell Westbrook underwent surgery to repair his broken right hand Saturday and will be reevaluated in four weeks to set a more firm timetable . With several other players sidelined with injuries as well , the Thunder had just eight healthy bodies to use and were still able to come away with a win . Lone healthy point guard Joe Johnson suffered in his return to the starting lineup after sitting out the team 's last game . He played a team - high 31 minutes , illustrating that he appears to be healthy enough to continue playing going forward . Brooklyn shot 46 percent from the field and 20 percent from beyond the arc , decimating a Sixers defense that has found it 's way of late and that should n't be looked at as an easy puzzle to crack . Brooklyn will have a couple days off before hosting the Toronto Raptors on Friday . Oklahoma City has lost three straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Thunder will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Thunder have the right guys to build a winning team around . Reggie Jackson paced the Thunder with 21 points , eight assists and four rebounds . The Thunder will host the Houston Rockets on Monday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 16 - 27 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 19 - 27 ) 116 - 99 at Oracle Arena on Wednesday . The Bucks continued to pursue perfection on their home court and keep the NBA record for most wins in the regular season alive and well after holding off the Bucks . A series of strong runs to end each of the second , third and fourth quarters made up for a motivated Milwaukee team . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee , and had 22 points , 11 rebounds , and one assist in 30 minutes . Khris Middleton added 22 points on 8 - of - 20 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds and five assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo was close behind with 22 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . Jrue Holiday chipped in 13 points , four rebounds and nine assists on 6 - of - 11 shooting . Alonzo Gee pitched in 12 points , four rebounds and three assists , while Norris Cole contributed 11 points , three rebounds and three assists on 4 - of - 10 shooting . Ryan Anderson was effective in his 27 minutes off the bench and finished with 11 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal in 27 minutes . Greg Monroe and Ryan Anderson both contributed 23 points off the bench , while Holiday added 13 points . Next up , the Bucks play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Thursday , while the Pelicans host the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 19 - 17 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 15 - 22 ) 91 - 78 on Friday . Memphis came into this game as a double - digit underdog , but walked away with a huge win . Zach Randolph returned from a seven - game absence and was clearly the star , as he recorded his first career triple - double . The key for the Grizzlies was the rebounding , as they snatched down 52 rebounds to the Trail Blazers 42 . That marks the 10tth - straight game that the Trail Blazers have been outrebounded , with nine of those being by at least seven boards . The Trail Blazers shot 39 percent from the field , while holding Portland to just 39 percent shooting . The Grizzlies had a nightmare game from three - point range , as they went just 3 - for - 11 . The ball movement was a huge factor as well , with the Grizzlies handing out 21 assists to the Trail Blazers 21 . The Grizzlies have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these two franchises are going right now and Portland is in a lot of trouble right now . The starters amassed just 54 points in this game and that simply wo n't get it done in the NBA . One bright spot is the strong play of Al-Farouq Aminu , who tallied 15 points and six rebounds in the loss . This is a very talented team and they are still feared no matter how bad their record looks . The Grizzlies have now won two - straight and they 'll look to add to that winning streak on Wednesday in a rematch with these Grizzlies .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Sacramento Kings 114 - 104 Tuesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Tyreke Evans and Tyreke Evans scoring a team - high 26 points each . Lee was able to shoot an impressive 9 - of - 10 from the field and 3 - of - 4 from three - point range and recorded 26 points in just 29 minutes . Evans , on the other hand , scored a game - high 26 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting from the field , and four assists in 29 minutes off the bench . It was the first time since late - November that the 39 - year - old Argentinian played 25 minutes in a single game and just the third time all season . More importantly , though , is the idea that when Ginobili is productive in his role off the bench , the Spurs are extremely hard to beat . In the six games where Ginobili has scored at least 14 points , the Spurs are 5 - 1 . And they are n't just beating their opponents in those situations , they 're dominating them , as they won those five games by an average margin of 15 points , with their one loss coming by just three points .

The Golden State Warriors ( 20 - 2 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 17 - 8 ) 105 - 98 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 39 - 18 in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Warriors also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 45 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks finished at 40 percent from the floor and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors had all five starters reach double figures in points . Stephen Curry led the charge , going 9 - for - 22 from the field and 3 - for - 11 from the three - point line to finish with 29 points , while also adding three rebounds and eight assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Warriors ' seven - game win streak . Curry on the other hand finished with 29 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , three rebounds and eight assists of his own . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Monta Ellis was dialed in with his shot , going 8 - for - 22 from the field and 5 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding five assists . He 's been on a hot stretch of late , averaging 24 points and seven assists over his last three games . DeMare Jefferson was the only other starter in double figures for points , recording 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 35 minutes . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Harrison Barnes , who scored 12 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) in 34 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be at home against the Chicago Bulls on Thursday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

Kelly Olynyk came up big with 19 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds , in 27 minutes off the bench . Six other players scored in double digits for the Jazz , including Gerald Green , who added 16 , and Gerald Green , who poured in 16 points off the bench . The Celtics go on to host the Mavericks on Sunday , in what will be the second game of a three - game road trip . San Antonio came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Spurs team . The Golden State Warriors defeated the Houston Rockets , 127 - 132 , in Game 4 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Oracle Arena . It was a fair and foul game for reigning MVP Steph Durant . Though the superstar scored 29 points and nailed five three - pointers , he did so in just 46 minutes due to an early exit with an ankle injury . Curry also got into an early scuffle with opposing point guard Patrick Beverley , resulting in a double technical . This only seemed to fuel the noise in Oracle Arena , however , as the Warriors with and without Durant were able to breeze by the 9 - seeded Rockets . Forward Draymond Capela was dominant on the boards , coming away with a team - high 15 rebounds to go with 20 points . Former MVP Stephen Curry scored a team - high 28 points while also grabbing three rebounds and dishing out five assists . Former MVP Draymond Green recorded a double - double with 20 points and 15 rebounds , while point guard Klay Thompson had 23 points and five assists . The team protected the ball respectably , turning it over only 17 times on the night . The Rockets will visit the Lakers on Friday , while the Warriors will take on the Warriors on Friday in Nerlens Noel 's return to the lineup after missing two games in Toronto . The Rockets ' next game is on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Monday . The Rockets ' next game is at home against the Bucks on Saturday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 25 - 34 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 13 - 46 ) 94 - 74 on Monday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . With both teams having already been eliminated from the playoffs , this game was more about giving the young and inexperienced players a chance to make an impression on the coaching staff in hopes of coming back with their team next season in a bigger and better role . As a team , the Pacers went a stellar 41 percent from the field and 17 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers finished at 35 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . The Pacers were led by the duo of George Hill and George Hill . Hill shot 8 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Pacers ' seven - game win streak . Hill on the other hand finished with 17 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in four out of his last five games . Rodney Stuckey had a strong game as well with 12 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) in 32 minutes . The only other Sixer to reach double figures in points was Jason Richardson , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes . The Pacers ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday , while the Sixers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 25 - 20 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 22 - 22 ) 108 - 98 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Cavaliers were able to bounce back with a convincing 14 - point victory in game two . The Cavaliers got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Thunder 20 - 26 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 44 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 39 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were led by Kevin Durant , who went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 32 points , while also adding six rebounds and nine assists . He 's picked up his scoring of late with so many injuries affecting this team , as he 's averaging just 16 points per game over his last five outings . Westbrook , on the other hand , finished with 22 points ( 7 - 26 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , nine rebounds and 11 assists , coming just shy of a triple - double . James James added 22 points ( 7 - 26 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 10 - 13 FT ) , seven rebounds and five assists , coming just shy of a triple - double . Like Durant he 's been on fire of late , averaging 39 points and 14 assists over his last three games . The Thunder also received some solid contributions from their bench with both Dion Waiters and Tristan Thompson reaching double figures . Smith finished with 15 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , N/A - 0 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while Ibaka recorded 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) and 10 rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 102 - 95 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Thursday . The Timberwolves ( 27 - 33 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Bucks ( 27 - 33 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Milwaukee forced the Cavs into an uncharacteristic 9 turnovers and made the difference in the final period . They also tallied an 46 percent success rate from the field , and a 40 percent tally from three - point range . A 26 - 20 edge in the fourth quarter propelled the Bucks to victory , after they 'd entered the period facing an 85 - 76 deficit . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with a 35 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , two blocks and a steal . Matthew Delladedova supplied 16 points , 1 assists and a rebound . Andrew Wiggins tallied 11 points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . Khris Middleton matched Rubio 's scoring total and added nine rebounds , four assists and a steal . Greg Monroe led the second unit with 12 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Towns paced the Timberwolves with a game - high 35 points , which he complemented with 14 rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Tony Snell tallied 19 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Rashad Vaughn registered 10 points , two assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Greg Monroe led the bench with 12 points , six boards , two assists and one steal . The Timberwolves head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Timberwolves head down to South Florida to take on the Miami Heat on Sunday evening as well .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 35 - 40 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 45 - 31 ) 114 - 109 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . Using a big second quarter , where they outscored the Nets 15 - 27 , the Nets were able to pick up a large enough lead by halftime that they could coast to an easy 20 - point victory on the road in Toronto . They shot 52 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors shot 51 percent from the field and only 31 percent from deep . Despite turning the ball over 8 times , the Nets made up for it with their rebounding , as they finished with a 41 percent effort as a team . Louis Williams went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also handing out three assists . He 's now averaging 8 points , 3 rebounds and 9 assists on the season . Jonas Valanciunas came one rebound shy of a double - double , posting 21 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) and nine rebounds in 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 14 points and 3 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double - digit points was Louis Johnson , who came off the bench to score 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 36 minutes . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Pacers on Friday .
Win or lose , Anthony Davis has been posting historic numbers left and right this season . On Tuesday , that translated into 38 points and 16 rebounds en route to a shattering blowout of the visiting Charlotte Hornets . The game marked Davis 's third 38 - point outing in just 16 this season , a league - high . It was also Davis 's eighth double - double of the season . Davis has now scored 39 or more points in three of his last four comments , only failing to do so in a blowout in which he sat due to a minor injury . Thanks in large part to Davis 's 56 percent shooting , the Pelicans shot just 44 percent , but the team hit just 41 percent of its shots from the field . Superstar Kemba Walker had a strong showing , leading the team with 25 points on 10 - of - 25 shooting . The backcourt of Anthony Holiday and Nicolas Batum each had 13 points each , but the remainder of the Hornets ' starting five combined for just 0 - of - 19 . For the Hornets , the backcourt duo of Nicolas Batum and Nicolas Batum struggled , as the two combined for just 10 points on 2 - of - 30 shooting . Once again , Davis still scored a team - high 38 points to go with 7 - of - 8 from the free - throw line . However , the Pelicans came back with a vengeance in the second , more than doubling up their hosts , 25 - 25 . The final score made things look a bit closer than they were , as Jrue Holiday drained a 29 - foot three - point jumper to put the Grizzlies up by two . On the ensuing possession , Davis was able to hit a jumper to bring the Pelicans within one with 1:55 to play . After Davis was able to drain a 29 - foot three - point jumper with two seconds remaining that would have given the Pelicans the win . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Clippers have the right guys to build a winning team around . Rookie point guard George Hill scored nine points on 4 - of - 11 shooting to go with four rebounds and three assists in 31 minutes . The Nets will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday , as the Pacers will travel to Boston for a date with the Celtics .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 25 - 26 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 22 - 27 ) 108 - 104 on Friday at the Wells Fargo Center in Charlotte . With both teams having already been eliminated from the playoffs , this game was more about giving the young and inexperienced players a chance to make an impression on the coaching staff in hopes of coming back with their team next season in a bigger and better role . As a team , the Hornets went a ridiculous 47 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Nicolas Batum backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 26 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , nine assists and one steal , in 37 minutes . Nicolas Wall also had a strong showing , finishing with 23 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , 11 assists and six rebounds in 40 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists on the year . Coming off the bench , Otto Porter shot well , going 4 - for - 6 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while grabbing four rebounds . It was the most points he 's had in the last four games . In Williams 's third game with the team , he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , 10 rebounds and one block in 29 minutes . Both Spencer Hawes ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 1 3Pt ) and Jared Dudley ( 4 - 8 FG , 5 - 10 FG ) also had 14 points apiece . The Hornets ' next game will be on the road against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Wizards will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 22 - 31 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 45 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . After coming out of the third quarter down 71 - 64 , the Kings were able to out - score the 76ers 39 - 23 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Philadelphia . The Kings also out - rebounded the 76ers 44 - 44 , giving them an even greater advantage in the victory . DeMarcus Cousins did his best to keep the 76ers in this game . He went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 12 - for - 17 from the free throw line to score 28 points , while also adding 12 rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line 17 times and converted on 12 of those attempts . He 's combined for 43 points in the last two games , pushing his season averages to 23 points and 6 assists . Notching a double - double of his own , Rudy Gay finished with 22 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds . He 's now averaging 22 points and 2 rebounds on the year . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Nik Stauskas , who came off the bench for 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 0 3Pt ) in 31 minutes . Nik Stauskas was the only other player in double figures for Philly , posting 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt ) in 31 minutes . The only other Sixer to reach double figures in points was Nik Stauskas , who came off the bench for an efficient 16 points in 31 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Thursday , while the 76ers will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .
