The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 49 percent from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Monta Ellis . Green went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 5 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding two assists . He 's combined for 39 points in hist last two games and is now averaing 19 points per game . Monta Ellis also had a strong showing , going 10 - for - 21 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been on fire the last two games , combining to go 19 - for - 21 from from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line over his last two games . He 's now averaging 19 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Tyson Chandler had a solid showing , posting 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with 23 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his fifth double - double of the season , pushing his season averages to 14 points and 5 rebounds per game . The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 14 - 40 ) 109 - 90 on Friday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Grizzlies road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Nets had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 12 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , Memphis had managed a paltry three wins in 31 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 0 points by the first two games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for Memphis , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Grizzlies roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Nets ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 50 percent shooting from the field . Brooklyn was paced by Mike Conley 's 20 points , which he supplemented with five assists , four rebounds and a steal . Zach Randolph was right behind him with a 15 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , three steals and a block . Zach Randolph was productive in a reserve role as well , registering 13 points , nine rebounds and two assists . The Grizzlies remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Indiana to take on the Pacers on Monday night .
The Wizards ( 11 - 5 ) extended their winning streak to three games , defeating the Heat ( 9 - 8 ) 107 - 86 on Wednesday night . Washington , which trailed by six at the end of the first quarter , pulled away in the second half , outscoring Miami 17 - 17 in the third period and 26 - 26 in the fourth . The Wizards were led by 23 points and eight rebounds from Rasual Butler , who added 20 points and three boards . Dwyane Wade came off the bench to score 20 points ( 9 - 13 FG ) to go with three rebounds and three steals in 28 minutes . Marcin Gortat scored 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and grabbed 10 rebounds , and D.J . Chalmers scored 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 3PT , 2 - 5 FT ) to lead the Heat . The Heat shot 54 percent from the floor and knocked down 14 three - pointers as a team . Rasual Butler was the high - point man for Miami , finishing with 20 points ( 9 - 13 FG ) in 28 minutes . Dwyane Wade chipped in 20 points ( 9 - 13 FG ) of his own , along with seven assists and three steals , in 28 minutes . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double with 15 points and 10 rebounds , along with two blocked shots , in 27 minutes . The Heat shot 54 percent from the field but struggled from long range , where they shot only 9 - 21 ( 53 percent ) from the three - point line . The Heat continue their road trip Friday in Cleveland . The Heat continue their homestand Wednesday against the Hawks .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 114 - 80 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 14 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but their thorough domination of the Thunder ( 20 - 13 ) was significantly helped by the ejection of Russell Westbrook for back - to - back technical fouls after 23 minutes for arguing a referee 's call . However , Memphis did earn the victory through their own strong offensive play as well , as they tallied superb 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Meanwhile , without their MVP , the Thunder 's offense was largely neutered , as only two reserves , Enes Kanter and Alex Abrines , managed to get into double digits in the scoring column . Westbrook led OKC in scoring despite the early exit , supplying 21 points to go along with five rebounds and two steals , although he notably did not record any assists . Kanter totaled 19 points and five rebounds , while Abrines managed 10 points and three boards . Steven Adams mustered only six points but did haul in 15 rebounds and added two assists and two blocks . However , Andre Roberson , Domantas Sabonis and Anthony Morrow could only register two points apiece . The Grizzlies were paced by Marc Gasol , who compiled 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists , a steal and five blocks . The next two highest point totals came from the bench , as Troy Daniels posted 22 points , along with three rebounds and two assists , and Zach Randolph went for 21 points , eight boards and two assists . JaMychal Green produced 17 points , four rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , and Andrew Harrison , drawing another start for Mike Conley , tallied 10 points . Chandler Parsons returned after taking off the last game for rest purposes and produced two points , three assists and two steals over 15 minutes . The Thunder return home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on New Year 's Eve , while the Grizzlies are at Sacramento on Saturday afternoon as well .
The Indiana Pacers ( 39 - 34 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 36 - 38 ) 104 - 101 on Wednesday . The Pacers were unsuccessful in their bid to garner a playoff spot , but entered Sunday trying to finish the season off on a positive note . With the postseason out of reach , John Wall sat out a third consecutive game with his knee injury . Monta Ellis led the way for the Pacers with 23 points , seven assists , six rebounds and three steals in 34 minutes . Ian Mahinmi pitched in with 14 points , two rebounds , a steal and a block in 39 minutes on the court . C.J . Miles continued his strong play with 10 points and three rebounds in 15 minutes off the bench . The Rockets improved to 39 - 34 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They head home for a date with the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday . The Rockets were unable to keep pace with the Pacers , however , as all five starters scored in double figures . Paul George led the way with 25 points , 11 rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block on 8 - of - 17 shooting . The UConn product was also lethal from behind the arc , as he buried 1 - of - 8 shots from three - point territory , helping extend the Pacers ' double - digit lead in the fourth quarter . The Rockets do n't have much time to nurse their wounds with a matchup with the Warriors on the slate for Friday . It 's unclear whether Myles Turner or Clint Capela like this week . Indiana will return to action Monday in Charlotte .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 112 - 109 , in overtime at Amway Center on Monday . This was a tale of two halves , as these lottery contenders left it all on the floor . The Sixers actually took a 15 - point lead into the half , but the Magic responded by sending the game into overtime . It was tight throughout , as there were 11 ties and 10 lead changes in total . The difference for Orlando was their ability to get to the free - throw line , as they finished the game 38 - of - 46 from the charity stripe . Both teams really struggled shooting , as they both failed to crack 39 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . The Sixers ( 26 - 44 ) had to play this game extremely shorthanded and they did n't have enough to hold on to a big lead . Richaun Holmes got the start and had the game of his career though , totaling 24 points , 14 rebounds and four assists . Robert Covington was just as good , accruing 24 points , 13 rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Dario Saric finished with 16 points and five rebounds before fouling out in regulation . T.J. McConnell amassed 16 points , 11 assists and three steals . Nik Stauskas was the only bench player with more than four points , as he provided 20 points and five rebounds . On deck for Philly is a road matchup versus the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday . The Magic ( 26 - 45 ) have been struggling mightily , but this overtime win may give them some momentum for the final few weeks . Nikola Vucevic led the way for Orlando , as he collected 26 points and 13 rebounds . Evan Fournier finished second on the team with 19 points , four rebounds and three assists . Elfrid Payton tallied 10 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and three steals . Aaron Gordon produced 17 points , three rebounds and four assists before fouling out . Orlando 's next game will be a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .

It did n't take long for the Kings to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 5 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 100 points , Sacramento led 45 - 19 after the first quarter . He also has grabbed at least 10 rebounds in 10 of those 21 games . For the Celtics , Isaiah Thomas led the way with his team - high 36 points and shot 9 - of - 14 from the field . The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 125 - 120 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 14 ) may have looked like somewhat easy prey to the hometown Hornets , considering they came in with a 5 - 14 record despite their solid talent . The first quarter did nothing to dissuade those beliefs , as Charlotte ( 11 - 9 ) jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , Minnesota clawed back to trail by only three , 52 - 49 by intermission . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Hornets ' way in the closing seconds , until an Andrew Wiggins 31 - foot three - point jumper with eight seconds remaining knotted the score at 106 . He then sunk a pair of clutch free throws with 11 seconds remaining in overtime to give Minnesota some crucial breathing room at 123 - 118 . That five - point margin was the final separation between the two teams , as the Timberwolves secured only their third road win of the season . Wiggins totaled 29 points overall while leading the visitors , and he added four assists , a rebound and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with 27 points , 15 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine supplied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest nine points but did dish out 12 assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts , and also totaled eight rebounds between them . The Timberwolves were paced by Kemba Walker , who posted 22 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Frank Kaminsky III got another start at power forward in place of Marvin Williams and tallied 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist registered 15 points , six rebounds and an assist . Nicolas Batum matched his point total and made it a double - double with 15 assists , while also hauling in eight rebounds , recording three steals and posting a block . Marco Belinelli led the second unit with 15 points . The Timberwolves head back home to face the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday evening , while the Hornets travel to Dallas to face the Mavericks on Monday night .

The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went just 37 percent from the floor and 48 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were also able to force the Lakers into 19 turnovers , while only committing 17 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of D'Angelo Russell and Lou Williams . Williams shot 6 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding six rebounds and five assists . He was able to get to the free throw line five times and converted on all eight attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him after struggling with his shot against the Pelicans on Sunday . Jeff Teague shot just 5 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while adding five assists . In fact , neither team grabbed a double - digit lead , as it came down to the final seconds . Fastbreak points was also a glaring difference , with the Rockets winning that battle , 55 - 20 . Shooting was key , with Brooklyn hitting 53 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . Memphis only shot 44 percent from the field and 40 percent from three . The Phoenix Suns defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 137 - 101 Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena . It did n't take long for the Suns to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 8 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 17 points , Phoenix continued to pile it on and effectively ended the game by halftime . The Suns ' backcourt was efficient and dominant offensively in the victory , with Eric Bledsoe leading the way with a triple - double of 25 points , 13 assists and 10 rebounds . Devin Booker added 23 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting from the field and 4 - of - 7 shooting from behind the arc . In the end , all 13 Phoenix players managed to score against a struggling Lakers ( 19 - 39 ) defense . Those Lakers have now dropped two games in a row and three of their last four following Wednesday 's embarrassing defeat that ended with the team shooting just 38 percent from the field . Lou Williams was one of the lone bright spots for Los Angeles , as he increased his trade value yet again with 21 points off the bench on 7 - of - 13 shooting from the field . D'Angelo Russell added 21 points of his own , but he shot a subpar 7 - of - 20 from the field Wednesday . With the loss , the Lakers sit just a half - game behind the Suns for the worst record in the West but remain nine games behind the Nets for the worst record in the NBA . The teams will now both head into the All-Star break , with both resuming play on Friday , Feb. 24 .
The Boston Celtics ( 21 - 19 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 13 - 28 ) 117 - 103 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 36 - 29 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 39 percent from the floor and 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics also forced the Suns into 14 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own . The Celtics were lead by their starting backcourt of Isaiah Thomas and Isaiah Thomas . Thomas went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Celtics ' seven - game win streak . Thomas on the other hand went 5 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Jae Crowder also had a very strong showing , posting 17 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and three steals . It marked his fourth double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 17 points and 16 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , TJ Warren added 13 points and three steals . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Suns will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 115 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday . Even though Miami trailed by 19 at times in the second quarter , they rallied to pull out a much needed win . The third and fourth quarters is when Miami did their damage , as they outscored Los Angeles . 62 - 47 in that stretch . The Heat 's offense was efficient as ever , as they shot 54 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding and assists were lopsided as well , as Miami won the rebounding , 47 - 40 and the assist differential , 25 - 18 . The Heat 's first lead did not come until there was a minute left in the third quarter . Los Angeles ( 11 - 21 ) is in their worst stretch of the season right now and they continue to falter against bad teams . Lou Williams was once again the best player for the Lakers , as he dropped 27 points off the bench . Nick Young led the starters in scoring , as he scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . D'Angelo Russell had his bets game in weeks , accumulating 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday . Miami ( 10 - 20 ) have been playing better than results would show , so a win here is just what the doctor ordered . Justise Winslow was the Heat 's most valuable player , as he accrued 23 points , 13 rebounds and four steals in 42 minutes of action . Hassan Whiteside matched Winslow , as he provided 23 points and 13 rebounds of his own . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 21 points and seven assists . James Johnson continued his great form , leading the bench with 19 points , eight rebounds and six assists . The Heat return to action on Friday , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on the road .
Paul George 's 34 point - effort paced Washington , which managed what was only their fourth road victory of the season . All five members of the starting five posted double - digit scoring , and the Wizards shot 49 percent overall , while holding the Pacers to sub - 50 percent success rates from the field and three - point range . Otto Porter , Jr. posted a 22 - point , 1 - rebound double - double and CJ Miles matched Miles ' scoring total while C.J . Miles had a bench - leading 15 points . Thaddeus Young totaled 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and a pair of steals . Bradley Beal registered 12 points , while Thaddeus Young stepped up with a 11 - point , 6 - rebound double - double . Bradley Beal compiled 12 points in 18 minutes before exiting with a sprained right ankle . Markieff Morris chipped in with 10 points . Paul George nearly matched Wall point for point with 34 of his own , including a 6 - of - 10 tally from three - point range . Jeff Teague provided a 19 - point , 11 - assist double - double . Myles Turner registered 15 points and eight boards , while Thaddeus Young registered 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and a game - high six steals . C.J . Miles had a productive game with 15 points and three boards . Paul George 's 34 points led the Pacers . C.J . Miles checked in with 15 points , while CJ Miles poured in 15 . C.J . Miles led the bench with 15 points .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the visiting Los Angeles Lakers , 118 - 110 , on Friday night at United Center . The Bulls made a statement once again by defeating another formidable conference rival and defending their home court for the second time in a row , to remain undefeated at home and in their 2016 - 27 season . The Bulls have defeated the Celtics and now the Lakers , after many people questioned how this new look team would gel . Chicago ( 15 ) came ready to play in this one as they poured in 62 points in the first half , while holding Los Angeles to only 41 percent shooting from the field . Lou Williams was the high - point man for Chicago , with 25 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , including 5 - of - 6 from long range , in 30 minutes off the bench . Four other players scored in double digits for Chicago , including Isaiah Canaan , who chipped in 17 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . All five starters scored in double digits for the Bulls , led by Isaiah Canaan , who finished with 25 points , on 8 - of - 14 shooting , in 30 minutes . Nikola Mirotic followed up with 18 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , along with six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 26 minutes . The Bulls will look to snap a three - game losing streak , as they go on to host the 76ers on Monday .
The Warriors once again showed off their stars ' scoring ability on Monday night . Former MVPs Kevin Durant and Steph Curry scored 25 points each , with Curry knocking down four three - pointers . All-Star Klay Thompson , meanwhile , scored 20 and hit three threes on the night . The team hit 12 three - pointers in total on 34 percent shooting from beyond the arc , blowing away Atlanta 's seven threes on 25 percent . The Warriors also held the advantage in assists , where they beat the Hawks 25 - 20 . Atlanta , meanwhile , saw strong play from their big men . Both Dwight Howard and Paul Millsap notched double - doubles , and the duo combined for 30 rebounds . The Hawks ended with a large advantage on the glass , out - rebounding Golden State 51 - 41 . Howard and Millsap each finished with 14 points , tying for the second - highest on the team behind guard Dennis Schroeder 's 24 . The five assists combined to go just 5 - of - 14 from the field , and the team hit just 42 percent of its shots from the field . The loss snaps a five - game win streak for Atlanta , a team that has forced its way back into the Western Conference playoff picture . The team struggled to find offense on Tuesday with star center Dwight Green leading the way . He recorded 14 points and six rebounds while hitting two three - pointers . The Hawks will play in Portland on Tuesday , while the Warriors will host the Warriors on Sunday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 6 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 7 ) 96 - 89 on Sunday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Thunder had a very strong first half defensively , as they out - scored the Thunder 14 - 33 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Pistons shot the ball well , going 43 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 40 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were also able to force the Thunder into 14 turnovers , while committing only 16 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Pistons were led by Brandon Jennings , who went 10 - for - 18 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding five rebounds and five assists . After shooting just 41 percent ( 3 - 11 FG ) from the field during Sunday 's game against the Rockets , it was a nice bounce - back game for him . While Reggie Jackson had a very impressive outing , scoring 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , while adding 12 assists and a pair of blocks . After struggling with his shot in Friday 's game against the Nets , it was a nice bounce back game for him . The six steals were also a season - high , as he was productive on both sides of the ball Friday . Josh Smith had a strong showing as well , posting 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds over 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 14 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double - digit points was Louis Morrow , who also chipped in with 10 points ( 4 - 15 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) in 18 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Wednesday , while the Thunder will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .

The Milwaukee Bucks ( 41 - 40 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 63 ) 107 - 97 on Sunday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . With both teams riding their respective five - game losing streak , each were looking to get things turned around with a victory on Friday . In a surprising effort , the Bucks were able to come out victorious and end their drought . While they did n't necessarily have the best game shooting the ball , finishing at 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , the Bucks shot only 49 percent from the floor and a meager 21 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Bucks also secured a 39 - 40 rebounding advantage . Leading the way for the Bucks was Robert Covington , who went 6 - for - 13 from the field and 12 - for - 13 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four blocked shots . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games , where he 's averaging 30 points and 17 rebounds . Carter-Williams , on the other hand , finished with 30 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 8 - 13 FT ) , five rebounds , five assists and three steals in 30 minutes . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Hollis Thompson was dialed in with his shot as well , going 7 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 19 points . The 19 points matched a season - high for him , while the double - double was his first since the end of January . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Sixers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 16 - 4 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 9 - 11 ) 103 - 87 on Friday . Memphis has won three straight games , and in their last two games , they 've scored at least 118 points . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used Dwyane Wade as the point guard . The Grizzlies have two days off before hosting the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday . Miami has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Heat will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Heat have the right guys to build a winning team around . Dwyane Wade paced the team with 25 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting to go along with six assists and two rebounds in 37 minutes . Courtney Lee was the only other Miami player to score in double figures , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting in 37 minutes . Offensively , it is clear the Heat miss Mike Conley , who sat out with a knee injury . Mike Conley scored a team - high 18 points , but Mike Conley was forced to leave the game with a sprained ankle and did not return . The Grizzlies will return to action Friday against the Magic .
The Orlando Magic defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 95 - 83 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . While this scoreline looks moderately close , the Magic had this game well in hand early on . In fact , they led by 31 points at the half , as they took a 20 - point lead into the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with Orlando dishing out 25 assists to just 13 turnovers , while San Antonio committed 18 turnovers to just nine assists . The Magic shot 45 percent from the field , while San Antonio shot just 37 percent . Kawhi Leonard led the way for Orlando , as he tallied 21 points , two rebounds and two steals . Evan Fournier finished second on the team , accruing 13 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Nikola Vucevic totaled 12 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Evan Fournier led the bench with 13 points , three rebounds and seven assists . The Magic ( 7 - 11 ) have been unlucky in terms of results this season and a win over the Spurs shows just how good they can be . Serge Ibaka led the team in scoring , as he totaled 18 points and seven rebounds on 7 - of - 11 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge finished second on the team with 16 points , six rebounds and three assists before fouling out in the overtime . LaMarcus Aldridge was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and six rebounds . Aaron Gordon and Manu Ginobili came off the bench to score 11 points a piece .
The New York Knicks ( 5 - 27 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 13 - 17 ) 129 - 135 on Sunday at Madison Square Garden in Sacramento . The Knicks had a strong first half where they out - scored the Kings 70 - 48 , allowing them to coast to an easy victory against the Kings . They were the superior shooters in this one , going 50 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 55 percent from the floor and 50 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were able to force the Kings into 18 turnovers , while only committing 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who went 13 - for - 29 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 36 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 23 points and 4 rebounds per game . DeMarcus Cousins did everything he could to keep the Kings in this game . He went 14 - for - 27 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 39 points , to go along with 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . The 36 points were a new season - high for him and also the third straight game scoring in double figures , despite averaging only 5 points per game this season . The Knicks ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Kings will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Boston Celtics defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 107 - 102 , at TD Center on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 33 - 18 ) came in to Friday fresh off a big victory over the Houston Rockets on Wednesday night , a win spearheaded by an explosive 27 - point effort from Isaiah Thomas . Their offensive momentum carried over into Friday and generated even better results overall , as Boston posted success rates of 42 and 31 percent from the field and three - point range , respectively . Instead of Wednesday 's top - heavy scoring effort , the Celtics saw six players hit double digits in the scoring column , and played superbly on the defensive end as well , holding the Clippers ( 31 - 20 ) to just 65 points through three quarters . The Clippers were paced by Blake Griffin , who posted a 23 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and a steal . Raymond Felton was right behind him with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . Jae Crowder and Jae Crowder contributed a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds , two assists , three steals and a block , and the latter furnishing six rebounds , six assists , three steals and a block . Marcus Smart drew another start in place of Avery Isaiah ( Achilles ) and posted 13 points , three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Jaylen Brown led the second unit with 11 points , three boards and an assist , while Marreese Speights was productive off the bench as well with 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . Boston remains in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division , and are currently slotted in the fourth seed in the conference as well . They head to Philadelphia to take on the Sixers on Sunday night . Thomas paced the Celtics with 28 points , eight assists , two rebounds and two steals . Griffin supplied 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and a steal . Al Horford turned in a 13 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , two blocks and a steal . Jaylen Brown led the second unit with 11 points , three rebounds and an assist . The Clippers head back home to take on the Los Angeles Lakers on Saturday night , while the Clippers remain home to face the Detroit Pistons on Friday evening .

Golden State will have a couple days off before hosting the Toronto Raptors on Friday . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Jazz have the right guys to build a winning team around . The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves by a 112 - 100 score at Moda Center on Saturday night . The Trail Blazers ( 34 - 38 ) came into Saturday 's contest trying to keep the pressure on eighth - seeded Denver , which they could come within one game of catching with a win against the Timberwolves ( 28 - 44 ) . Portland was able to take advantage of what was likely a tired Minnesota squad that had just given up 130 points on Friday night in an overtime loss to the Lakers . The dynamic duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum once again led the way for the Blazers , which collectively shot an outstanding 63 percent from the floor and 50 percent from three - point range . Their offensive proficiency and 35 - 27 rebounding advantage helped them overcome 14 turnovers to cruise to a relatively comfortable home victory . The Utah Jazz defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 28 points , along with five rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 14 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . George Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 23 points , six rebounds , eight assists and a steal . Rodney Hood was right behind with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing eight rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal , and the latter supplying six boards . Joe Johnson , who headed to the bench with Hayward 's return , tallied 10 points to pace the bench . The Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) were co - led by a pair of 28 - point outputs for Carmelo Anthony and Kristaps Porzingis . Anthony also registered nine rebounds and three assists , while Porzingis supplied eight boards , an assist and two blocks . Derrick Rose continued his strong stretch of play to open his tenure in the Big Apple , totaling 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Courtney Lee was the fourth member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting 10 points , six boards and three steals . The Jazz continue their trek through the Northeast with a Monday night visit to Philadelphia to face the Sixers , while the Knicks remain home to tangle with the inter - city rival Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 127 - 107 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . It was n't lopsided throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in the first half . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Detroit , 67 - 49 , in the second half . The Warriors offense was on point , shooting 56 percent from the field , 51 percent from three - point range and recording 39 assists . Three-point shooting really killed Detroit , as they went just 6 - of - 28 from long distance . The Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) have struggled on the road all season and a matchup against Golden State is the last thing they wanted to see . Marcus Morris was Detroit 's best player , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Andre Drummond recorded another double - double , totaling 12 points and 10 rebounds . Tobias Harris got the start and amassed 18 points and four rebounds . Boban Marjanovic was the only bench player in double figures , amassing 13 points and 11 rebounds on 5 - of - 7 from the field . The Warriors ( 34 - 6 ) have been taking it to teams all season and this blowout win was no different . Kevin Durant led the team in scoring , accruing 25 points , six rebounds and nine assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Steph Curry was just as good , collecting 24 points , six assists and five steals . Klay Thompson dropped 23 points of his own . Draymond Green failed to hit a shot , but he provided nine rebounds and 2 assists . Ian Clark and Shaun Livingston each scored in double figures off the bench .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 107 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday . The Sixers ( 7 - 20 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Nets ( 7 - 19 ) , which were come in to Tuesday 's contest , as they had won four of their last six games . That included a hard - fought road victory for a Sixers ' balanced attack from both teams , as the team tallied a solid 43 percent success rate from the field . They also battled back from a 54 - 37 halftime deficit to score 70 points in the second half . However , two clutch free throws by Joe Harris with six seconds remaining gave Philadelphia a lead they would n't surrender . Ersan Ilyasova added a 22 - point , 4 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Ersan Ilyasova went for 22 points , while Robert Covington and Robert Covington followed with matching 15 - point efforts . The Nets were paced by Ersan Ilyasova , who supplied 22 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . Joe Harris posted 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Gerald Henderson provided 10 points , two rebounds and three steals . Jahlil Okafor led the second unit with 15 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Joel Embiid paced the Sixers with a 33 - point , nine - rebound double - double that also included eight assists , four blocks and one steal . Joe Harris led the bench with 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Gerald Henderson was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , two rebounds and three assists . The Sixers remain on the road and head to the Lone Star State to do battle with the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday night , while the 76ers remain home and await the Toronto Raptors on Friday evening as well .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday . These are two teams on the outside looking in for the playoffs and the Pelicans were able to escape with a huge win to get them closer to that eight - seed . Despite Dallas leading by nine points after the first quarter , New Orleans took care of business from there by winning the other three quarters by at least four points . In fact , the Pelicans outscored the Mavericks , 49 - 40 , in the second half . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with New Orleans winning that battle , 44 - 38 . They also stifled Dallas with their defense , holding the Mavericks to 48 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range . The Mavericks ( 31 - 43 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and losses like this are devastating for that pursuit . Harrison Barnes led Dallas , as he scored 19 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting . DeMarcus Cousins was n't far behind , as he accumulated 29 points , 16 rebounds and six assists . Seth Curry was the only other starter with more than four points , as he provided 18 points , two rebounds and three assists . Jordan Crawford was huge off the bench , providing 15 points and four assists . The Mavericks ( 31 - 43 ) have been dominant at home this season and a win like this shows just how scary of a team they can be . Anthony Davis was the player of the game , as he tallied 30 points , 13 rebounds and two blocks in the win . Dirk Nowitzki finished second on the team , totaling 23 points and seven rebounds . Jordan Ferrell was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 18 points and five rebounds . New Orleans will look to get out of this slide on Saturday against the Oklahoma City Thunder .
Kawhi Leonard finished with a game - high 24 points on efficient 10 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 37 minutes . Seth Curry followed up with 17 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . LaMarcus Nowitzki added 15 points on 5 - of - 14 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench , while David Lee chipped in 14 points to go along with three rebounds , four steals and one assist . The Spurs will look to get back on track as they play host to the Jazz on Monday . Meanwhile , the Mavericks ( 36 - 11 ) struggled from the field , shooting only 47 percent . Dirk Nowitzki was the high - point man for San Antonio , with 15 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , while Wesley Matthews followed up with 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 15 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting . San Antonio shot 47 percent from the field , while holding the Spurs to 47 percent shooting from the field . Meanwhile , Seth Curry led the way for the Spurs , with 19 points on 8 - of - 20 shooting , to go along with three rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge added 16 points and 10 rebounds , while Manu Matthews chipped in 10 points on 3 - of - 7 shooting , in 24 minutes off the bench .
The Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 16 ) beat the Toronto Raptors ( 24 - 10 ) 125 - 109 on Friday . Phoenix has won four straight games and five of their last six . After starting the season 2 - 1 , it looked like the Raptors were headed for the lottery again next offseason , but they righted the ship over the last week . The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 97 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . Turnover have plagued these two teams all season and 45 combined turnovers in this game shows just that . The third quarter was the difference for Oklahoma City , as they outscored Philadelphia , 32 - 20 . Rebounding was also decisive , with Oklahoma City winning that battle , 54 - 25 . The Thunder also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording two more assists and Philadelphia failing to swat away a single shot from the field . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Thunder recording 26 assists to 16 turnovers , while the 76ers committed 9 turnovers to 19 assists . Philadelphia ( 26 - 45 ) had won three of four headed into this game , but this was a tough task against a potent Oklahoma City offense . Russell Westbrook was the star , as he recorded yet another triple - double late in the second quarter . He finished the game with 18 points , 11 rebounds and 14 assists . Victor Oladipo made his return from a lengthy wrist injury to accrue 18 points , two rebounds and two assists . Enes Kanter led the team in scoring , as he totaled 24 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Nik Stauskas had a nice game off the bench , totaling 13 points , three rebounds and one assist . On deck for Philadelphia is a road matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday . The Thunder ( 41 - 30 ) had lost six - straight headed into this game , so to say this win was needed would be a drastic understatement . Enes Kanter was the lone bright spot for Philadelphia , as he tallied 24 points , 11 rebounds and three blocks off the bench . Victor Oladipo was second on the team , finishing with 18 points , three rebounds and three assists . Dario Saric was huge off the bench , providing 12 points , two rebounds , two assists and three blocks . The Sixers will look to play better on Sunday in a road matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers in overtime , 103 - 93 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 9 - 6 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Pacers ( 6 - 6 ) jumped out to a 19 - point lead after the first quarter . However , Indiana roared back to outpace the visitors by a 59 - 41 margin over the second and third periods , before seeing the Pacers make a comeback over the final 9 minutes . Both teams saw their first units come through , as each boasted four double - digit scorers among their respective starting five . Irving led the way with 24 points , seven assists , two rebounds and a steal . He was next with a 24 - point , 2 - rebound , five - assist triple - double that also included two steals and a block . The Charlotte Hornets ( 26 - 26 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 27 - 24 ) 108 - 91 on Monday at the United Center in Chicago . In a high scoring game , both teams really struggled to get much going offensively . The Hornets shot 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls finished at 39 percent from the floor and just 40 percent from deep . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who went 8 - for - 19 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding eight rebounds and eight assists in just 36 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 13 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 19 points and 13 rebounds on the year . Nicolas Batum was the only other Hornets ' player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , eight assists and 13 rebounds . It was the first time he failed to reach double figures in points since December fifth , although he made up for it with a new season - high in rebounds . E'Twaun Moore chipped in 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and two steals off the bench . The Hornets ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Charlotte Hornets ( 21 - 27 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 31 - 18 ) for the second time this week , winning 92 - 88 on Thursday . They say that familiarity breeds contempt , and though these two teams had n't met this season until Monday , two games in a span of four days caused things to get chippy Thursday at the Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The game was physical throughout , most notably when John Wall knocked Gerald Roberts to the floor on a hard screen in the first half . Tensions boiled over in the fourth when Nene Hilario and Nene Hilario got tangled up , drawing a double technical . The Wizards point guard finished with 16 points , 10 assists and one rebound on 4 - of - 14 shooting . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist returned to the lineup after a hamstring injury sidelined him shortly before the break . In other injury news , Kemba Walker is targeting a mid - March return date as he recovers from surgery on his torn meniscus and Bismack Biyombo has been cleared to resume basketball activities and should miss just three more games . The Wizards will return home to host the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday . Washington has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Wizards will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Wizards have the right guys to build a winning team around . Bradley Beal paced the Wizards on Friday , finishing with 18 points and five assists in 39 minutes , while Al Jefferson scored 18 points and grabbed 12 rebounds in 31 minutes . The Hornets will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday . The Wizards will finish off their back - to - back set Friday in Minnesota .

The Houston Rockets defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 129 - 99 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday evening . The Rockets ( 41 - 18 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Rockets ( 23 - 18 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Houston forced the Rockets into an uncharacteristic 20 turnovers and made the difference in the game when it counted most to emerge as surprising victors . DeMarcus Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 27 points , 13 rebounds , five assists , five steals and four blocks . He led the Rockets ( 41 - 18 ) with 27 points , nine of which came in the first quarter . Cousins added nine rebounds , an assist , two steals and four blocks to his team - high 27 points . Cousins followed with a 13 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included eight rebounds , five blocks and a steal . Clint Capela chipped in with a 15 - point , 8 - rebound double - double , while Omri Casspi provided 12 points and two boards in a reserve role as well . The Rockets were led by Anthony Davis 's 29 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks . Eric Gordon supplied 19 points , two assists , a rebound and two steals . Clint Capela followed with a 15 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of blocks . Montrezl Harrell led the bench with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Pelicans continue on the road and visit the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday evening , while the Rockets visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening as well .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 29 - 12 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 12 - 29 ) 113 - 93 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Thunder did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 22 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 42 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Thunder did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Timberwolves into 12 turnovers , while committing just six of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Andrew Wiggins had his way with the Timberwolves in this one . He went 10 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now combined for 57 points over his last two games , so he continues to ride the hot hand . He 's had two solid showings in a row , combining for 29 points , 12 rebounds and 10 assists over that span . He went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 20 points in 28 minutes . He shot a combined 5 - for - 11 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Zach LaVine added 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , six rebounds and four steals in 33 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Thursday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 50 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 35 - 37 ) 113 - 91 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . This marked a big win for the Thunder , as they passed up the New Orleans Pelicans for the eighth and final projected seed in the Western Conference standings . The Pelicans are just a half game behind them though , with the Suns trailing by just three games as well , so it 'll remain a fight for the last seed all the way until the end of the regular season in the West . The Jazz , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . They 're even with the Indiana Pacers , but hold the tie breaker , so they remain ahead of them for now . The Jazz are also just a game behind the Miami Heat for the seventh spot . With both Kevin Durant and Serge Ibaka out due to injury , Russell Westbrook continued to put on a show . He did n't have the best night shooting the ball ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , but he got to the free throw line at will and converted on 4 - of - 3 three - pointers to finish with 20 points and eight rebounds in just 27 minutes . Steven Adams was the only other Thunder player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 14 points and seven rebounds . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies 115 - 106 at Staples Center on Monday . The banged up Clippers ( 24 - 14 ) have gone through a brutal stretch of games , but erased a six game losing streak with a needed win at home . J.J. Reddick and DeAndre Jordan led Los Angeles in a variety of ways and staved off a late Grizzlies ( 22 - 16 ) rally . A tight knit first half saw Los Angeles start to pull away in midway through the second quarter , but Marc Gasol and Jamal Crawford hit a pair of free throws apiece to seal the win . Crawford paced the way for the Clippers with 22 points , which he supplemented with four assists and one rebound . Conley was right behind him with 17 points , seven rebounds and a pair of blocks . Raymond Felton drew another start in place of Avery Paul ( Achilles ) , posting 11 points , four rebounds , six assists and four steals . Vince Carter led the second unit with 11 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a block . Marc Gasol , James turned in a remarkable effort with 23 points , six rebounds , six assists , two steals and a block . Zach Randolph was productive as a reserve as well with 13 points , three rebounds and one block . James led the way for the Clippers with a near triple - double of 8 points , six assists , four rebounds , two steals and a block . Jamal Crawford paced the bench with 22 points , four assists and one rebound . JJ Conley managed a 17 - point , 2 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and a block . Zach Randolph was productive as a reserve as well with 13 points , three rebounds and one block . The Clippers head to Charlotte to take on the Hornets on Friday night , while the Clippers remain home to tangle with the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday evening as well .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 94 - 86 , at Air Canada Center on Wednesday . Both of these teams have been struggling mightily headed into this matchup , but Toronto prevailed in a near wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Raptors led for the final 42 minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of that stretch . That 's evident by the first quarter , in which Toronto outscored Dallas , 30 - 22 . Despite all the statistics being close , the Raptors won nearly every one , as they led in shooting , rebounding , assisting , steals , blocks and turnover differentials . The Raptors defense was huge , as they held the Mavericks to 38 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The Raptors also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording five more assists , while committing three less turnovers . Serge Ibaka was the lone bright spot for Dallas , as he tallied 18 points and eight rebounds . Serge Ibaka totaled 18 points and eight rebounds . Serge Ibaka was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 18 points and eight rebounds . Patrick Patterson and Patrick Ferrell each scored 10 points a piece off the bench . DeMar DeRozan was the player of the game , as he scored 18 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , while adding three rebounds and five assists . Harrison Barnes and Serge Ibaka were the only other Mavericks players in double figures , as they scored 18 points a piece .
Kevin Durant led the way for a 30 - point effort with Kevin Durant 's matching 30 points , five rebounds , five assists and five blocks . DeAndre Jordan had a monster game by his standards , posting 20 points , 18 rebounds , two blocks and a steal . J.J. Redick was next with 18 points , a rebound and three assists . Serge Ibaka supplied 11 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and a steal in 33 minutes . Westbrook dished out 12 assists , hauled in six rebounds and recorded a steal . Jamal Crawford supplied 12 points , two assists , two rebounds and a steal in 32 minutes . Westbrook paced the Clippers with a 24 - point , 6 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of assists and a steal . JJ Paul went for 16 points , four boards , two assists and a steal . Wesley Johnson registered 11 points , four rebounds , two assists , five steals and a block . Enes Kanter led the bench with 11 points , three rebounds , two assists and a steal . Durant paced the Clippers with 30 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and five blocks . Paul Paul tallied 21 points , 13 assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Serge Ibaka totaled 11 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jamal Crawford and Jamal Crawford were productive as reserves with matching 12 - point efforts . The Clippers head back home to tangle with the Golden State Warriors on Monday night , while the Clippers remain home and await the Phoenix Suns on Thursday evening .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Miami Heat , 91 - 82 , at Spectrum Center on Thursday . The refrain is a familiar one for the Hornets ( 19 - 14 ) , but does n't seem to get old : The dynamic duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum supply a significant portion of the offense , and the complementary pieces around them step up in support as needed . That formula equaled another home victory for Charlotte on Thursday , their 11th of the season in 17 home games . Walker scored a game - high 22 points , while Batum provided 16 . The hosts also played superior team defense , holding the Heat ( 10 - 23 ) to 40 percent shooting overall and inducing 16 turnovers . Miami was paced by Josh Richardson , who followed up a 22 - point outing against the Thunder on Tuesday with another 20 points on Thursday , along with four rebounds , two assists , a block and a steal . Tyler Johnson came off the bench to supply 18 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block . Wayne Ellington provided 12 points , two boards and an assist in a reserve role as well . The returning Goran Dragic could only muster five points on 2 - of - 11 shooting , although he did add eight assists , three rebounds and a steal . Hassan Whiteside went for eight points , 10 rebounds and two blocks , notably taking only seven shots on the night . Walker complemented his aforementioned scoring total with seven rebounds , four assists and a steal . Batum filled out the stat sheet with 13 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and a block . Marvin Williams registered 13 points , two assists , a rebound and a steal . Cody Zeller offered nine points , seven rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , while Jeremy Lamb led the second unit with 10 points , nine rebounds and a block . The Heat next head to Boston for a Friday night battle with the Celtics , while the Hornets host the Cleveland Cavaliers for a New Year 's Eve showdown on Saturday night .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 97 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . Turnover have plagued these two teams all season and 45 combined turnovers in this game shows just that . The third quarter was the difference for Oklahoma City , as they outscored Philadelphia , 32 - 20 . Rebounding was also decisive , with Oklahoma City winning that battle , 54 - 25 . The Thunder also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording two more assists and Philadelphia failing to swat away a single shot from the field . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Thunder recording 26 assists to 16 turnovers , while the 76ers committed 9 turnovers to 19 assists . Philadelphia ( 26 - 45 ) had won three of four headed into this game , but this was a tough task against a potent Oklahoma City offense . Russell Westbrook was the star , as he recorded yet another triple - double late in the second quarter . He finished the game with 18 points , 11 rebounds and 14 assists . Victor Oladipo made his return from a lengthy wrist injury to accrue 18 points , two rebounds and two assists . Enes Kanter led the team in scoring , as he totaled 24 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Nik Stauskas had a nice game off the bench , totaling 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Philadelphia will look to play better on Sunday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers . Oklahoma City ( 41 - 30 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the NBA and they fell just shy in this close loss . Russell Westbrook carried the load , as he tallied 18 points , 11 rebounds and 14 assists en route to a triple - double . Nik Stauskas came off the bench to drop 20 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Victor Oladipo scored 18 points of his own , adding three rebounds and an assist . Dario Saric was second on the team , totaling 12 points , two rebounds and two assists on 4 - of - 14 shooting .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 100 - 92 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . Despite the final scoreline being close , the Jazz were in control for the majority of the game . The third quarter was when Utah made their mark , as they outscored the Cavaliers , 19 - 26 . All the statistics were close , with the Jazz winning the shooting , rebounding , assisting and turnover differentials . Kevin James was the only starter with more than 12 points , as he tallied 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , accumulating 28 points , nine rebounds and two assists . LeBron James was the player of the game , collecting 29 points , six rebounds and five assists . Rodney Hood was second on the team , finishing with 18 points , five rebounds and three assists . Tristan Thompson totaled 12 points and 12 rebounds . Gordon Hayward had to carry the load for Cleveland , as he led the team with 28 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Rudy Gobert double - doubled in a 11 - point , 14 - rebound outing . On deck for Utah is a matchup with the Houston Rockets on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 24 - 16 ) have been dominant at home this season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . Gordon Hayward was the player of the game , as he collected 28 points , nine rebounds , two assists and a steal . Rudy Gobert was huge down low , as he amassed 11 points and 14 rebounds . Tristan Thompson recorded a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double . The bench was huge as well , as Rodney Hood , Trey Lyles and Rodney Lyles combined for 25 points and 16 rebounds .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 116 - 96 , at United Center on Saturday . The dynamic duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Jabari Parker were at it again for the Bucks ( 16 - 16 ) , as they posted over half of the team 's scoring total while each played at least 40 minutes . Their combined 23 - of - 34 effort from the field spearheaded a red - hot Milwaukee offense that drained their buckets at a 57 percent clip , and that also was successful on 60 percent of their 15 attempts from behind the arc . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 16 - 18 ) could only get one such standout effort , which came from Jimmy Butler . The offensive imbalance ultimately left them unable to keep pace as the game wore on , and accordingly , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin in the second half . Antetokounmpo tallied a game - high 35 points , and added nine rebounds , 2 assists , seven blocks and two steals in a remarkable performance . Parker followed with 27 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Malcolm Brogdon continued his rapid development , as he managed 15 points , 12 assists and 11 rebounds , his first career triple - double . Greg Monroe led the bench with 15 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Butler 's 26 points paved the way for Chicago , and he complemented them with eight assists , seven boards and two steals . Robin Lopez provided a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Taj Gibson contributed 11 points , five rebounds , an assist and a block . Michael Carter-Williams , who drew the start for the struggling Rajon Rondo , and Dwyane Wade both struggled , as they only supplied four and eight points , respectively . Doug McDermott ( 13 points , three assists , a rebound and a steal ) and Nikola Mirotic ( 10 points , four rebounds ) helped make up for some of the scoring void off the bench . The Bucks head back home to host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday night , while the Bulls remain home to face the Charlotte Hornets on Friday evening as well .
The Miami Heat ( 35 - 26 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 15 - 46 ) 108 - 92 on Monday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . Down 78 - 68 coming out of the third quarter , the Heat started playing with some urgency and out - scored the Suns 24 - 24 to pull it even and force a nine - point victory . The Heat shot very well in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 40 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Suns into 9 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own . The Heat were led by Devin Booker , who went 11 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding three rebounds . He 's picked up his scoring of late with so many injuries affecting this team , as he 's averaging just 10 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a double - double , Alex Len finished with 12 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 23 points and 46 rebounds over those two games . The only other Suns player to reach double figures in points was Luol Deng , who recorded 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds in 29 minutes . The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Suns will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 10 - 19 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 14 - 15 ) 108 - 101 on Tuesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Charlotte . The Hornets were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 48 percent from the floor and a meager 38 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Hornets 40 - 43 , they turned the ball over 25 times , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hornets were led by a big game from Brandon Knight , who went 13 - for - 21 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding five assists . He temporarily left the game in the first quarter after straining his hamstring , but he came back in the second and played through the injury to bring the Hornets to a huge win . Gerald Henderson was the other big contributor , as he went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also handing out four assists . The 34 points were a season - high for Knight . Gerald Henderson had 20 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) as the starting point guard . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 12 - 33 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 33 - 13 ) 116 - 106 on Friday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Oklahoma City , as they shot 46 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Nets really turned it on , as they outscored the Thunder 31 to 29 . The Thunder was led by Kevin Durant , who tallied 32 points and 10 rebounds in the victory . They also got some nice contributions off the bench , as all five players off the bench had at least five points and two rebounds . It 's a rough time in Oklahoma City right now , but they have to look at performances like these as victories and take them with a grain of salt . They 'll look to build off this loss when they host the Dallas Mavericks on Monday . Coach Greg Popovich is probably not very happy with this performance , but he 'll take the win . The Nets came in as 15 - point favorites and never really seemed close to covering that spread . Oklahoma City was led by Russell Westbrook , who recorded yet another triple - double in a fantastic performance . Westbrook tallied 27 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists in the win . Kevin Durant led the team with 32 points and also grabbed 10 rebounds in the win . Thaddeus Young also had a nice game off the bench , totaling 14 points and 14 rebounds in just 39 minutes of action . Kevin Durant led the team with 32 points , while also snatching down 10 rebounds in the win . Thaddeus Young flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 14 points , 14 rebounds and three assists in the victory . The Thunder will look to keep this momentum going against the Indiana Pacers on Monday .
Paul George 's 39 point - effort paced Indiana , which managed what was only their fourth road victory of the season . All five members of the starting five posted double - digit scoring , and the Pacers shot 41 percent overall , while holding the Lakers to sub - 20 percent success rates from the field and three - point range . Monta Ellis was productive in a reserve role as well , generating 11 points , six assists and three rebounds . Kobe Bryant led the way for Los Angeles with 13 points , which he supplemented with 10 rebounds and six assists . Monta Ellis was next with 15 points , three rebounds , six assists and one block . Julius Randle totaled 11 points , 12 rebounds , one assist and one block . Rodney Stuckey submitted 11 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals in 27 minutes off the bench . Kobe Bryant put together a 13 - point , 4 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Kobe Bryant did a little bit of everything as well , managing 13 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks . The Raptors were led by their All-Star point guard , Kyle Lowry , who recorded a triple - double of 22 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and three assists . He also chipped in three rebounds , two assists and a steal . Kyle Lowry was the only other Memphis starter to score in double figures , finishing with 22 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting in 36 minutes . Valanciunas also had four rebounds and two assists , while Randolph had a double - double with 16 points and 4 rebounds . Zach Randolph led the way for Memphis , scoring 16 points on 6 - 18 shooting , to go along with four rebounds and three assists , in 29 minutes off the bench . No one else scored in double digits for the Grizzlies , who shot a horrid 42 percent from the field on the game . JaMychal Green was the high - point man for the Grizzlies , with 10 points , along with four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 31 minutes . The Grizzlies shot only 41 percent from the field but turned the ball over 19 times , compared to Charlotte’s five . Up next , the Grizzlies take on the Warriors on Saturday . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 28 - 12 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 22 - 18 ) 108 - 89 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . This marked a big win for the Thunder , as they passed up the New Orleans Pelicans for the eighth and final projected seed in the Western Conference standings . The Pelicans are just a half game behind them though , with the Suns trailing by just three games as well , so it 'll remain a fight for the last seed all the way until the end of the regular season in the West . The Thunder , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . They 're even with the Indiana Pacers , but hold the tie breaker , so they remain ahead of them for now . The Mavericks are also just a game behind the Miami Heat for the seventh spot . With both Kevin Durant and Serge Ibaka out due to injury , Russell Durant and Kevin Durant were the big story . Durant led the Thunder with 29 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , 10 rebounds and four assists , while Ibaka posting 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , 11 rebounds and three blocked shots . Durant has been on an absolute tear of late , posting four double - doubles in a row , while averaging 18 points and 18 rebounds over that span . He 's averaging 14 points and 14 rebounds on the season . Serge Ibaka played a big factor in the win as well , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his fifth double - double of the season . Salah Mejri had a huge contribution off the bench with 17 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and nine rebounds . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday .
The New York Knicks ( 18 - 19 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 21 - 14 ) 98 - 90 on Tuesday at Madison Square Garden in Miami . The Knicks got out quickly in this game , out - scoring the Heat 22 - 21 in the first quarter alone . The Knicks were the superior shooters , going 56 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 45 percent from the floor and just 12 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were also able to force the Heat into 13 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own . The Knicks were led by the duo of Carmelo Anthony and Chris Bosh . Bosh went 12 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding five rebounds . He 's now combined for 52 points over his last two games , as he 's been on fire of late . Dwyane Wade also had a strong showing , posting 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and six assists . It was his second straight night with 18 points , as he 's a combined 26 - of - 34 from the field over the last two games . Coming off the bench , Derrick Williams finished with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and four steals in 18 minutes . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Heat will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Saturday .

Despite the Pacers leading for nearly the entirety of this game , this fixture was closer than it looks . In fact , there were 11 ties and 5 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as Miami recorded eight more assists than the Pacers , while committing five less turnovers . Hassan Whiteside continued his torrid start , as he led the team with 19 points , 18 rebounds and three blocks . Dwyane Wade was second on the team , as he accrued 16 points , five rebounds and three assists . Josh McRoberts was a nice spark off the bench , collecting 10 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for Miami is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 30 - 24 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to climb up the Eastern Conference ladder . Goran Dragic led the team in scoring , as he provided 24 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Goran Dragic was n't far behind , accruing 24 points and eight rebounds .
