Hassan Whiteside was a beast down low , amassing 16 points and 5 rebounds on 8 - of - 13 shooting .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a four - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony Towns . After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 37 minutes . The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of five rebounds and five steals . The two helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field . As for the Mavericks , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . Harrison Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , five rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 20 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points . And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 46 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 7 - of - 9 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home Wednesday to play the Rockets , while the Mavericks will head home to take on the Suns on Thursday .
The Washington Wizards ( 28 - 13 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 17 - 24 ) 99 - 90 on Saturday . The game was an entertaining back - and - forth affair , with both teams playing at superior levels at different points throughout the contest . Washington looked prepared to dominate in the first 12 minutes , jumping out to a 23 - 23 lead after the first quarter . The visitors systematically went about their business the rest of the way however , and their top - ranked defense began to exert its will over Washington . Washington elicited 10 turnovers from the Nets , while only committing 13 of their own . The Nets were paced by Brook Lopez 's 15 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , an assist and a block . Joe Johnson was next with 15 points , three rebounds , five assists and three steals . John Wall followed with a trademark double - double , posting 11 points , six assists , six boards , three steals and a block . Mason Plumlee was next with a near double - double , amassing 10 points , nine rebounds , two assists and a block . Kris Humphries paced the reserves with 13 points , four rebounds and a block . Brooklyn remains in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head back home to face off against the Houston Rockets on Wednesday night . Washington was led by a pair of 17 - point efforts from their starting backcourt of Bradley Beal and Brook Lopez . The former also supplied five assists , five rebounds and a steal , while the latter supplied four rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Joe Johnson continued his resurgent play with a near double - double , supplying 15 points , eight assists , nine boards and a steal . Marcin Gortat was a force on the boards once again , totaling 15 points , five rebounds and an assist . Kris Humphries led the bench with 13 points , four rebounds and a steal . The Nets remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home again Sunday for a date with the Charlotte Hornets .
The Boston Celtics ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 5 - 16 ) 111 - 93 on Monday at the Smoothie King Center in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 25 - 25 in the first quarter alone . The Celtics were the superior shooters , going 49 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went just 41 percent from the floor and a meager 31 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Celtics also secured a 46 - 44 rebounding advantage . The Celtics were led by the duo of Isaiah Thomas and Isaiah Thomas . Thomas went 9 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding five assists . The 22 points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his second in the last three games . Coming off the bench , Kelly Olynyk went 8 - for - 13 from the floor and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 21 points in 27 minutes . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only eight points against the Orlando Oklahoma City Thunder . The Pelicans ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will travel to Philadelphia to play the Sixers on Wednesday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 39 - 7 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 25 - 23 ) 130 - 99 on Monday at the Toyota Center in San Antonio . The Spurs came out of the third quarter down 75 - 69 , but absolutely exploded in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Rockets 28 - 26 to steal the victory . The Spurs were led by the duo of LaMarcus Aldridge and Kawhi Leonard . Aldridge went 9 - for - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also grabbing 10 rebounds . Continuing to show himself as one of the best centers in the league , it was Aldridge 's third straight double - double . Harden on the other hand , added 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , three rebounds and two assists , while Leonard had 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and a steal . The only other Rocket to reach double figures was Josh Smith , who scored 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) to go along with seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Rockets will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday after one game off in the Golden State Center .

San Antonio trailed by five after an uninspired first half , but the team came out of the break with some fire . The Spurs would continue their dominance over the final 13 minutes to easily dispatch the Celtics , relying on a rather balanced scoring attack to accomplish that feat . The Chicago Bulls defeated the Toronto Raptors , 105 - 94 , at United Center on Monday evening . The Bulls ( 27 - 29 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Bulls ( 27 - 29 ) built a 62 - 48 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Chicago eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Bulls managed to shoot 48 percent from the field overall , as well as a superb 41 percent on their 32 attempts from behind the arc . The Nets had a strong first half where they out - scored the Kings 70 - 48 , allowing them to coast to an easy victory against the Kings . The Pacers continue on their road trip , with their next stop being the Nation 's Capital for a Wednesday night tussle with the Washington Wizards . The Bulls remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening as well .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 40 - 8 ) stifled the Philadelphia 76ers ( 10 - 38 ) en route to a 91 - 85 win on Wednesday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated this result , as these two are going in opposite directions . While the score looks lopsided , the game was close throughout and it was a late run by the Hawks that really opened up the scoreline . The three - point shooting was the key for Atlanta , as they went 32 - for - 32 from long distance . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Hawks recorded 20 assists and 12 turnovers , while the Hawks committed 14 turnovers to their 20 assists . The Hawks have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Al Horford was the player of the game , as he tallied 23 points and 11 rebounds in the win . Dennis Schroder also played great , tallying 15 points , five rebounds and six assists . Philadelphia will look to get out of this slide on Wednesday against the Charlotte Hornets . This loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the 76ers , but what really killed them was a 12 - point second quarter . One bright spot in the loss were the 8 - point shooting team for the Hawks , as they went 22 - for - 23 from long distance . The Sixers have been a revived team recently , but couldn’t muster up much here . The worst offense in the NBA showed it 's true colors tonight and couldn’t get anything going . The only player who played well was Al Millsap , who collected 23 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in the win . Both teams are off until Tuesday , when they host the Washington Wizards for their next fixture .

The Denver Nuggets ( 24 - 37 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 50 ) 117 - 107 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 27 - 29 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Nuggets also shot better than the Lakers , going 44 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 44 percent from the floor and a meager 36 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Nuggets also secured a 42 - 31 rebounding advantage . The Nuggets had four players reach double figures in points . D'Angelo Russell led the charge , going 9 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding six assists and a pair of rebounds . His points total was a season - high for him , as he was able to get his teammates involved in the blowout win . Julius Randle had a big double - double with 18 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and seven rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 50 rebounds over his last two games . Gary Harris was the other starter in double figures , as he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds in 40 minutes . He 's had a strong stretch of three games where he 's averaging 22 points and 11 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Coming off the bench , Jordan Clarkson was the only other player in double figures , fininshing with 13 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , three rebounds and two blocked shots in 23 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 6 - 7 ) 91 - 80 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Raptors took control in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Clippers 59 - 62 to finish the game and steal the victory on the road . The Raptors shot 37 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers finished at 39 percent from the floor and 22 percent from deep . With the win , Toronto moves into a tie with the Chicago Bulls ( who lost to the Hornets Friday ) for the third projected playoff seed in the Eastern Conference standings , while the Raptors drop to a half game behind the Hornets ( who beat the Bulls Friday ) for the eigth and final projected playoff seed . Giving the Raptors their biggest contribution was DeMarre Carroll , who scored a season - high 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , while also adding eight rebounds . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Raptors ' seven - game win streak . DeRozan on the other hand went 4 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding three assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Scola had just eight points , but he was able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Raptors should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . DeMar DeRozan had a relatively quiet night . He went 5 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , J.J. Redick shot 5 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 17 points in 17 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Miami Heat , 106 - 94 , at America Airlines Arena on Tuesday . While Miami got out to an early lead , that was the only one they 'd have all game . In fact , the Thunder led for the final 40 - plus minutes , as they pulled out a near wire - to - wire win . Rebounding was the biggest factor to the Thunder 's success , as they won that battle , 46 - 32 . Fastbreak points and points in the paint were also decisive , as Oklahoma City outscored Miami , 58 - 32 in the paint and 16 - 4 in fastbreak points . The Thunder finished the game shooting 51 percent from the field , while holding the Heat to just 44 percent . Westbrook notched his 15th triple - double of the season , as he accumulated 29 points , 17 rebounds and 11 assists in the win . Josh Richardson had been struggling this season , but he was a nice bright spot in this loss , tallying a career - high 22 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Johnson 's once again led the bench in scoring , as Josh Johnson accrued N/A points and five rebounds , while Tyler Johnson dropped 15 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Heat will look to play better on Thursday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

The Houston Rockets ( 7 - 1 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 2 - 5 ) 113 - 101 on Saturday . Houston has won three straight games , and the deeper they get into the season , the more believable the Rockets ' turnaround under coach Jason Kidd appears to be a sustainable change . The Rockets will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Minnesota has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Timberwolves will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Timberwolves have the right guys to build a winning team around . The visiting Dallas Mavericks upset the powerhouse Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , 90 - 88 . Dallas ( 9 - 21 ) has now won four of its last seven games after a horrendous start to the season that had seated them at last in the Western Conference . On Friday , the team saw the return of star forward Dirk Nowitzki ( Achilles ) . Despite only playing 15 minutes , Nowitzki was a difference - maker for the Mavs , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Forward Harrison Barnes , meanwhile , led the team with 24 points . The Mavericks played tough defense , forcing 20 Clippers turnovers on the night . Los Angeles ( 22 - 9 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs in a major win on Thursday , but saw a fourth quarter collapse against the Clippers . Despite leading by as much as eight early in the fourth , the Clippers walked away with a loss at the end of the day . LA is missing star forward Blake Griffin , who recently underwent surgery and is expected to be sidelined until mid - January . Griffin 's absence was felt , as the Clippers ' starting five combined for just 34 points . Sixth man Jamal Barnes led the team with 26 points . The real strength of the rebounding came from DeAndre Jordan , who snatched 17 rebounds to go along with seven points . The Clippers will visit Phoenix on Thursday , while the Mavericks will see the Lakers on Sunday . Los Angeles , meanwhile , will be visiting the equally - hot Raptors in Toronto .

While delivering this incredible offensive output , Gobert maintained the defensive excellence for which he is known . On the night , Gobert blocked four shots and stole the ball once while pulling down a team - high 13 rebounds . The Jazz as a whole shot 46 percent from the field but hit just 7 - of - 28 from beyond the three - point arc . On the Knicks ' end , things were a little bleaker . The team committed four more turnovers and 15 more personal fouls than its opponent , a slate of errors that ultimately cost them the win . Sophomore big man Kristaps Porzingis had six of those fouls , but still managed a team - high 24 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . The Knicks have now lost four straight games , and will have to jockey for position in the Eastern Conference playoff race . Utah , meanwhile , is struggling to remain healthy despite the season having barely begun . Star forwards Gordon Hayward and Dante Exum were sidelined with injuries , as well as bench guard Alec Burks . New York will host the Nets on Wednesday , while the Knicks will visit Phoenix to take on the Suns .

The Pistons ( 10 - 2 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Pistons ( 6 - 7 ) , managing a 48 percent success rate from the floor and 44 percent mark from three - point range . Four members of the first unit scored at least 12 points , led by Kyrie Irving , who posted a game - high 25 points . Irving was right behind him with 25 points , 11 assists , two rebounds and a steal . Kevin Love turned in a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Jon Leuer got the start at small forward and posted 15 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope posted nine points , while Tobias Harris and Tobias Harris turned in matching nine - point efforts . Kyrie Irving contributed a 25 - point , 11 - assist double - double , while Jon Leuer led the bench with 15 points . Tobias Harris paced the second unit with 15 points , seven rebounds and one block . Detroit remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Los Angeles to face off against the Lakers on Wednesday . James supplemented his team - high total with 21 points , three assists , three rebounds and a steal . James finished with 21 points , three assists , three rebounds , a block and a block . Kevin Love was next with a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Tristan Thompson was next with a modest eight points but did haul in 14 boards and dished out two assists . The Pistons head to Indiana to tangle with the Pacers on Friday night , while the Cavs are home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening as well .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 137 - 112 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday evening . The Bucks turned in their highest point total of the season , as they ran past the struggling Suns . The Bucks ( 22 - 28 ) shot a blistering 63 percent from the field , as they scorched the Suns ' defense . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 30 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and four blocks to stuff the stat sheet . Mirza Teletovic followed up with 19 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , to burn his former team . Jabari Parker added 18 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , and nine rebounds , as he was solid in 31 minutes . The Bucks are still stuck outside the top eight in the East but will look to continue to claw their way back , as they play host to the Heat on Wednesday . The Suns ( 16 - 35 ) shot only 42 percent from the field , and were dominated in the paint , where they were outscored 74 - 42 . However , Phoenix saw some great performances from some of it 's youngsters , as Marquese Chriss tallied a career - high 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , in only 24 minutes . Devin Booker went off for 27 points in the second quarter alone , but cooled down , as he finished with 31 points in the contest . Tyson Chandler grabbed 13 rebounds , while Eric Bledsoe and P.J . Tucker chipped in 13 points each . The Suns remain last place in the West but will continue to fight , as they go on to visit New Orleans on Monday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Sacramento Kings , 122 - 118 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday afternoon . Afternoon matinees seem to agree with the Thunder ( 25 - 17 ) , who notched their second consecutive early Saturday win by dominating the Kings ( 16 - 24 ) to the tune of a 63 - 46 first - half lead . That allowed them to essentially cruise in the second half and provide plenty of playing time to recent acquisition Darren Collison off the bench , who enjoyed his best game since arriving in OKC . Russell Westbrook led the way as usual for the Thunder with 23 points , 10 assists , 11 rebounds and four steals . Oklahoma City also imposed their will down low , as they outrebounded their visitors by a 44 - 44 margin . Alex Kanter followed with a 22 - point , 3 - rebound double - double off the bench . Darren Collison and Darren Collison supplied a pair of 21 - point efforts , while Alex Abrines 's 13 points led the bench . Anthony Tolliver posted 10 points in 27 minutes off the bench . DeMarcus Cousins was limited to a 31 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . Darren Collison tallied 21 points and Darren Collison posted a 21 - point , 2 - assist double - double . Alex Abrines and Alex Abrines paced the reserves with matching 13 - point efforts . The Kings return home to face off with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Christmas Night , while the Kings head to the Big Apple to take on the Knicks for a Christmas Day showdown .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 103 - 86 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Tuesday . The two teams square off again Wednesday night in Memphis in the second game of a home - and - home series , so the Grizzlies ( 17 - 9 ) opted to rest Marc Gasol on Tuesday . That left them even more short - handed than usual , given that star point guard Mike Conley is also out for the foreseeable future . That played right into the Cavs ' hands , as they were able to put together a relatively comfortable home win despite sitting Kyrie Irving for rest purposes themselves . LeBron James and Kevin Love turned in their typical quality of performance , but the story was J.R. Smith , who 'd essentially been mired in a month - long slump . The veteran guard posted a season - high 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , including a stellar 6 - of - 10 tally from beyond the arc . Cleveland ( 18 - 5 ) shot 46 percent from the field overall , which helped them overcome 17 turnovers . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who started at center for Gasol . He posted 18 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Troy Williams and Andrew Harrison turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and an assist , and the latter posting four assists , three rebounds , three blocks and a steal . Tony Allen contributed eight points , a rebound , an assist and three steals , while JaMychal Green only poured in two points but brought down eight boards . Jarell Martin supplied eight points , 10 rebounds and an assist . Love led the way for Cleveland with 29 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two steals . James registered 23 points , 6 assists , six rebounds and three steals . DeAndre Liggins compiled three points , five rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block while drawing the start for Irving , while Channing Frye led the second unit with eight points , a rebound and an assist . The Grizzlies and Cavs meet again on Wednesday evening at FedEx Forum in Memphis .

Houston actually led by 10 at times in the third quarter , but they outscored the Suns by nine in the fourth quarter and overtime . James Harden carried Phoenix , as he accumulated 27 points , five rebounds and 14 assists . Eric Bledsoe was second among starters , finishing with 16 points , two rebounds and six assists . Trevor Ariza was the only other starter in double figures , tallying 10 points , three rebounds and four assists . Montrezl Harrell was a beast off the bench , dropping 18 points on 8 - of - 25 from the field . Devin Booker was the player of the game , scoring a career - high 28 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting . James Harden recorded a triple - double , accumulating 27 points , five rebounds and 14 assists . Patrick Beverley collected 18 points , nine rebounds and nine assists . Montrezl Harrell was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 17 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting . The Rockets will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Thursday for their next game . The Rockets ( 22 - 8 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 16 tries . James Harden led the way with 27 points , five rebounds and 14 assists . Patrick Beverley was second among starters , totaling 19 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Trevor Ariza amassed 10 points and three rebounds . Nene Hilario was a nice spark off the bench , providing 12 points and two rebounds . Phoenix will return to action on Monday in a road matchup against the Chicago Bulls .

DeMarcus Cousins ( ankle ) returned to the lineup after missing just one game with a sprained ankle . The start came as no surprise , seeing that Cousins participated in the team 's shootaround earlier on Wednesday . The hottest shooting big man throughout the month of January has continued his hot streak into February and finished with 33 points , 17 rebounds and three assists , but committed six costly turnovers , including a lane violation while on the free throw line in the waning seconds of the fourth quarter . Thomas added nine rebounds and seven assists to his team - high 26th game scoring high . Isaiah Canaan added 13 points on 5 - of - 10 shooting . Nerlens Noel added another double - double to his double - double of 14 points and 10 rebounds . The Kings finished the game shooting 36 percent from the field and an underwhelming 46 percent from beyond the arc . Up next , the Kings travel to Boston to take on the Celtics on Friday . Philadelphia plays host to the Knicks , also on Friday . The Kings head to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder , also on Monday . Each game has massive playoff implications . The Sixers have two days off before hosting the Sacramento Kings . The Kings continued their strong stretch of late and fourth quarter in their fourth game back from a four - game homestand .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 104 - 97 , at American Airlines Center on Tuesday . These are two teams on the outside looking in for the playoffs and the Mavericks were able to escape with a huge win to get them closer to that eight - seed . Despite Cleveland leading for the majority of the first quarter , Dallas took control in the second half , outscoring the Cavaliers by a score of that margin . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Mavericks , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 28 - plus minutes . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with Dallas recording 19 assists to nine turnovers , while Cleveland committed 17 turnovers to just 17 assists . Cleveland ( 18 - 30 ) had a tough task here against a desperate Mavs team and they fell just short in this tight battle . LeBron James carried the load , as he tallied 23 points , nine rebounds and nine assists en route to a triple - double . Wesley Matthews was second on the team , as he scored 21 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , tallying 18 points and five assists . Dwight Powell was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 14 points and eight rebounds . Jordan Frye led the bench with 11 points , while also providing seven rebounds . Jordan Frye led the bench with 11 points , seven rebounds and two blocks .

The refrain is a familiar one for the Suns ( 19 - 42 ) , but does n't seem to get old : The dynamic duo of Kemba Walker and Kemba Walker supply a significant portion of the offense , and the complementary pieces around them step up in support as needed . Williams was next with a 19 - point , 4 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . The Golden State Warriors defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 144 - 98 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday . The Warriors came into this game as a monster favorite and they left very little doubt in who the better team was . Not only did they win all four quarters , they never relinquished the lead after the first quarter . Golden State were lights - out shooting , as they went 49 - of - 78 from the field and 13 - of - 16 from three - point range . Ball movement was key , as the Warriors assisted on 48 of their 49 made baskets . Many statistics were lopsided , as Golden State dominated the paint scoring , fastbreak points and points off turnovers . Los Angeles ( 30 - 18 ) had to play this game without Paul Pierce and they simply did n't disappoint . Stephen Curry was Steph Curry , but scored a team - high 43 points on 15 - of - 23 shooting . Blake Griffin was n't far behind , as he accumulated 20 points , four rebounds and two assists . Raymond Felton was the only other starter in double figures , tallying 10 points , seven rebounds and five assists . On deck for the Clippers is a road matchup against the Phoenix Suns on Tuesday . The Clippers ( 30 - 18 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Stephen Curry led the way for Golden State , as he collected 43 points , nine rebounds and six assists . Blake Griffin was n't far behind , accumulating 23 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Blake Griffin was a nice spark off the bench , providing 20 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Clippers will look to play better on Thursday in a road matchup versus the Chicago Bulls .
The Washington Wizards ( 45 - 33 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 61 ) 119 - 90 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Philadelphia . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 35 - 24 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Wizards also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 65 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the 76ers went 35 percent from the floor and a meager 33 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Wizards also secured a 45 - 36 rebounding advantage . The Wizards were led by the duo of Robert Covington and Bradley Beal . Covington went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding three rebounds and two steals . He 's combined for 100 points in the last three games , as he 's been on fire of late . Marcin Gortat added 18 points ( 8 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 2 rebounds , while Thomas notched 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) and seven assists . The Sixers ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the 76ers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers were led to victory by their stars on Friday , as they narrowly edged out the Miami Heat . All-Star forward Chris Bosh had 22 points and five rebounds while also dishing seven assists . All-Star shooting guard Dwyane Wade , meanwhile , led the team with 20 points and knocked down two three - pointers . The team shot a stellar 46 percent and had nine three - pointers on the night . Miami , meanwhile , shot under 40 percent and had just six threes . Forward Chris Bosh scored a team - high 22 points while knocking down two three - pointers . As a team , the Cs shot over 46 percent from the field and dished out 17 team - highs . The Heat , meanwhile , saw struggles from their stars . Paul Pierce scored 7 points to go with five rebounds and five assists . Miami ( 29 - 23 ) , meanwhile , has been surging lately , pushing their way to the playoff picture after a dismal 15 - 28 start to the season . On Sunday , the Clippers showed the intensity that led them to their playoff push . All-Star point guard Chris Paul led the team with 22 points and seven assists . However , center DeAndre Jordan pulled down 11 rebounds in what was a duel on the glass between him and Jordan . The team protected the ball exceptionally , turning it over just four times as a unit , but could not find the basket enough for the win . Both teams will enjoy a few days of rest carrying into the New Year .

In a battle between two middling Eastern Conference teams , the Pistons were able to prevail , thanks to a big fourth quarter . Detroit outscored Los Angeles 32 - 32 in the fourth quarter to take an eight - point lead . The Pistons went just 7 - of - 31 from three - point range and shot 53 percent from the field . Detroit did most of their damage in the first half , as they led 53 - 25 , headed into the locker room . Three-point shooting was decisive as well , with Detroit going 19 - of - 21 , with Los Angeles hitting just 13 - of - 32 from long range . The San Antonio Spurs ( 43 - 8 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 42 ) 106 - 102 on Sunday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . In a tight battle between two of the more experienced teams in the league , the Spurs were able to hold on in the fourth quarter to secure the five - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Spurs shot 44 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers finished at 40 percent from the floor and 33 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Lakers , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Spurs got their biggest contribution from Jordan Clarkson , who went 9 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding six rebounds and three assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Spurs ' seven - game win streak . Leonard on the other hand finished with 20 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 12 - 15 FT ) , 13 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was his second straight game with 25 points , as he 's a combined 17 - of - 25 from the field over the last two games . Julius Randle had a double - double of his own , as he finished with 16 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and 16 rebounds . It was his first double - double of the season , and he 's now combined for 55 points and 30 rebounds in his last two games .

The Boston Celtics ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 0 - 1 ) by a score of 121 - 105 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Brooklyn . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 32 - 23 in the first quarter alone . The Celtics were the superior shooters , going 56 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 49 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics were able to force the Nets into 30 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . This win marks a league - leading eigth straight victory for the Celtics . Deron Williams led the way for the Nets , recording 19 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , eight assists and two steals in 39 minutes . Surprisingly it was his first double - double since the end of January , but he 's still been scoring at a high rate lately , averaging 16 points over his last four games . Jeff Green chipped in with 17 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) and six rebounds as well . Doing his best to keep the Nets in this game was Deron Williams , who went 6 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while adding three rebounds , eight assists and two steals . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . With Serge Ibaka sitting out with a knee injury , Jared Sullinger got the start at point guard and posted an efficient 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) in 28 minutes . The Celtics ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Wednesday , while the Nets will travel to Philadelphia to play the 76ers on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 114 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 18 - 7 ) came in to Wednesday hoping to extend their recent stellar run in rather comfortable fashion against what would have seemed like an overmatched Sixers squad . However , Philadelphia ( 6 - 19 ) came ready to defend their home court , and rolled out Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor together as starters for the first time this season . While both big men played relatively well , it was Robert Covington who exploded for a season - high 26 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Sixers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Philadelphia actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 50 percent to 47 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Philadelphia with 31 points , five boards and three assists . Lowry was next with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured an assist , two steals and a block . DeMarre Carroll supplied 10 points , three boards , an assist and a steal , while Terrence Ross and Cory Joseph tallied a pair of 13 - point efforts to lead the bench . Okafor was second behind Covington with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and a pair of blocks . Sergio Rodriguez and Gerald Henderson put forth a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists and a rebound and the latter also posting two assists and a steal . Embiid had a quiet night by his standards , registering nine points , six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal . Cory Joseph led the bench with 13 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again Sunday to face the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Orlando Magic 93 - 89 at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , the Milwaukee offense played as well as they have all season . The Bucks actually held the Magic to 42 percent shooting from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . The rebounding was a huge difference as well , with Milwaukee winning that battle , 37 - 17 . The Bucks also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording four more assists , while committing three less turnovers . The Bucks ( 6 - 7 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Giannis Antetokounmpo continued his great form , as he tallied 21 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists . Serge Ibaka was second among starters , finishing with 21 points and nine rebounds . Bismack Biyombo got the start and collected 13 points and 10 rebounds . Evan Fournier was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Elfrid Payton , Matthew Green and Jeff Green each scored 11 points a piece off the bench . Milwaukee is off until Monday , when they host the Brooklyn Nets for their next game . The Bucks ( 6 - 7 ) got some great efforts from their stud players , but fell just short when it mattered the most . Giannis Antetokounmpo did n't let up though , as he scored a game - high 21 points , while adding 11 rebounds and three assists to his tally . Serge Ibaka was second on the team , as he totaled 21 points and nine rebounds off the bench . Nikola Biyombo recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 10 rebounds . On deck for Milwaukee is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 110 - 94 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start early and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers led by 16 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held Charlotte to 33 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The Pacers also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 42 - 19 and the points in the paint differential , 52 - 35 . The Pacers ( 14 - 11 ) have now won three - straight games , as they appear to be out of the slump that ailed them just last week . Nicolas Batum picked up the slack , as he led the team with 13 points and five rebounds . Nicolas Batum was the only other starter with more than four points , as he totaled 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Indiana will look to build off this win in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday . The Hornets ( 14 - 11 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Paul George continued his good form , as he tallied 22 points , five rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner was second on the team , finishing with 22 points and seven rebounds . Jeff Teague started at point guard and provided 16 points , five rebounds and 11 assists .
The Orlando Magic ( 19 - 13 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 9 - 23 ) 100 - 93 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 35 percent compared to the Nets , who went 15 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Nets into 12 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Brook Lopez had a big game , finishing with 24 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 10 - 12 FT ) , 15 rebounds and three steals . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 17 rebounds . The only other Net in double figures was Tobias Harris , who finished with 12 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Nets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Friday . The Magic will go on the road to Toronto to take on the Raptors on Wednesday .

The Raptors were able to win their fifth straight game on Monday , as they slipped away with a four - point victory over the Raptors . Ellis finished with 30 points ( 12 - 25 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and six assists , while Lowry had 25 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Dallas Mavericks ( 41 - 24 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 16 - 61 ) 100 - 93 on Monday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Lakers 25 - 24 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Mavericks also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 46 percent from the floor and a meager 14 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Mavericks also secured a 33 - 47 rebounding advantage . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Monta Ellis and Monta Ellis . Ellis went 12 - for - 22 from the field and 5 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now combined for 67 points over his last two games , as he continues to be the team scoring leader . Carlos Boozer was the other starter in double figures , finishing with 17 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and eight rebounds . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise as he 's averaging only 9 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a double - double , Dirk Nowitzki finished with 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and four rebounds . It was his first time reaching double - digit points in his last nine games , while the double - double was his first since the end of January . The Lakers ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 5 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 1 - 8 ) 93 - 80 on Sunday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Spurs came out strong in the third quarter and out - scored the Lakers 59 - 31 to finish the second half and steal the victory on the road . The Spurs shot 41 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers shot only 37 percent from the floor and a meager 17 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Spurs also secured a 44 - 46 rebounding advantage , only furthering their dominance in this one . The Spurs were led by the duo of Carlos Boozer and Jeremy Lin . Boozer went 8 - for - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also grabbing eight rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Boozer and a nice surprise for the Spurs , as he 's averaging just 6 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Kobe Leonard finished with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and two steals . It was the first time he failed to reach double figures in points since December fifth , although he made up for it with a new season - high in rebounds . Jordan Hill added 10 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and three rebounds as well . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 90 - 85 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The game came down to starkly contrasting third and fourth quarters , with the Raptors ( 33 - 24 ) catching fire at the right time and making a memorable comeback for the victory . Toronto got things off on the right foot , building a 31 - 20 lead after one quarter . However , the Hornets ( 24 - 32 ) put together a stellar defensive effort over the middle periods , limiting their hosts to just 27 points in the second and third quarters combined , while scoring 34 themselves in the third quarter alone . That surge gave them a seemingly dominant 75 - 58 edge heading into the final period , but the light went on for the Raptors at that point . They turned the tables on their visitors by limiting Charlotte to just 10 points in the fourth quarter and putting up 32 themselves , allowing them to escape with an improbable home victory and snap a three - game skid . The Raptors were led by a spectacular 27 - point tally from Frank Kaminsky , which he supplemented with five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Kyle Lowry followed with 21 points , six assists , six rebounds and one steal . Powell had a near double - double with 17 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas supplied 10 points , 10 boards and one assist . Delon Wright led the bench with 11 points , two assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Marvin Williams had a modest game by his standards , posting six points , nine rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks . Jonas Valanciunas generated a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Delon Powell led the bench with 11 points , two assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . The Hornets resume post - All - Star - break play when they visit the Detroit Pistons on Thursday , February 23rd , while the Raptors kick off the second half by doing battle with the Boston Celtics at home on Friday evening , February 24th .

This was a battle of current Eastern Conference bottom feeders , as both teams came in looking for their first victory of the 2014 - 10 season . The Knicks were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the 76ers went 40 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Knicks also secured a 40 - 36 rebounding advantage . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 15 points and 20 rebounds . The Sacramento Kings ( 10 - 15 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 12 - 14 ) 107 - 97 on Friday . James Harden has been working his way back from a surgically - repaired knee , but has seen his minutes slowly increase . He scored a season - high 33 points in Sacramento 's blowout loss to the Suns on Thursday . The Rockets were up by as many as 17 in the fourth quarter but the Rockets battled back to make it a two - point game with 2:56 to go . Both teams went scoreless from then until J.J Collison hit a three pointer to tie the game at 92 with six seconds left in regulation . Harden finished the game with 33 points , six assists and seven rebounds . His speciality is getting to the free throw line , but he went just 9 - for - 18 from the field and 9 - for - 12 from the free - throw line . James Harden had a monster game , as he finished with 33 points , seven rebounds and six assists on 10 - for - 18 shooting in 36 minutes . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 14 - 9 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 6 - 18 ) 97 - 88 on Friday . Cleveland has won four straight games , and in their last three games , they 've scored at least 118 points . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used LeBron James as the point guard . While James has always facilitated the offense , he has n't spent a lot of time at point guard , and using a 13 - 4 forward there is creating devastating matchup problems for the Cavaliers ' opponents . Walker scored 24 points and grabbed ten rebounds in 35 minutes on the floor . Kemba Walker scored a game - high 24 points against the Cavaliers . Kyrie Irving shot 6 - for - 14 from the field and finished with 16 points and four assists in 40 minutes . Charlotte has lost three straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Hornets will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Hornets have the right guys to build a winning team around . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with 24 points , five rebounds and five assists in 35 minutes . Cleveland has now won three straight games and are solidly positioned in the second seed in the East . LeBron James was dominant again with 27 points , seven rebounds , and 14 assists . Kemba Walker left the game with a sprained ankle and did not return . The Hornets will return to action Saturday against the Magic .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting LA Clippers , 105 - 97 , to take a 18 lead in the Western Conference first - round playoffs Wednesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs continued their home - court dominance , holding the Clippers to 97 points on 44 percent shooting . The Clippers got off to a hot start , but they held a 31 - 18 lead after the first quarter and never looked back . San Antonio was led by Blake Griffin , who scored 29 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with nine rebounds and five assists in 38 minutes . Leonard was not far behind , however , as he finished with 21 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting , while Paul Paul added 17 points , six rebounds and five assists in 33 minutes . Chris Paul struggled mightily , scoring only six points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , but he did add five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Patty Mills contributed 14 points on 5 - of - 10 shooting , including 2 - of - 7 from three - point range . The Clippers ( 35 - 23 ) shot 44 percent from the field and out - rebounded the Clippers 51 - 36 , but they were able to overcome their deficiencies on the boards to grab the win . The Spurs begin a three - game road trip Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers . The Spurs have three days off before they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 102 - 100 , at Golden 1 Center on Monday . The two clubs nearly matched each other point for point in the first half , with the Kings ( 14 - 17 ) holding a slim 51 - 47 edge at halftime . However , the Sixers ( 7 - 23 ) stormed out of intermission to take the third quarter by a 30 - 19 margin , leaving them with a seven - point lead heading into the final period . Sacramento then turned the tables in the fourth , and DeMarcus Cousins made sure the visitors did n't prevail . First , the mercurial big man sunk a 26 - foot three - point jumper with 20 seconds left to give the Kings a 99 - 97 lead . He subsequently netted one of two free throws with five seconds remaining to extend the advantage to three , and then stuffed a 25 - foot shot attempt by the Sixers ' Joel Embiid with three ticks on the clock . Embiid managed to get his hands on the ball again in time to hoist a 28 - footer a second later , but the home team was assured the win when that shot failed to find the net . Despite the failed heroics , Philadelphia 's emerging big man did pace them with 25 points , eight rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks . Sergio Rodriguez followed with 18 points , five assists , three rebounds and a trio of steals . The remaining three members of the first unit failed to hit double digits in the scoring column , however , as Jahlil Okafor ( six points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal ) , Gerald Henderson ( six points , two rebounds and an assist ) and Robert Covington ( five points , six rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks ) under - performed on offense . However , the scoring void was partly made up by two big men off the bench , as Ersan Ilyasova and Dario Saric went for 17 and 12 points , respectively . Cousins led the way for the home squad with 30 points , seven rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocks . Rudy Gay went for a near double - double with 17 points , nine boards , two assists and a block . Ty Lawson compiled 12 points off the bench , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Darren Collison produced nine points , four assists , a rebound and a steal , but Ben McLemore and Kosta Koufos could only supply a combined 10 points . The Sixers next visit the Utah Jazz on Thursday evening , while the Kings travel to Portland to face off with the Blazers on Wednesday night .

This was a game that was expected to be close throughout and these elite teams did n't disappoint in this overtime thriller . In fact , there were 10 ties and 21 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The New Orleans Pelicans ( 14 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 13 - 30 ) 114 - 99 on Monday night . There wasn’t a whole lot to decipher these two teams on the stat sheet , as nearly every statistic was tight . Both teams hovered around 47 percent shooting in a surprisingly offensive game . That 's a recipe for a deep playoff run and the Pelicans have the players with the experience to guide them there . The Knicks were able to out - score the Bulls 26 - 29 in the third quarter , allowing them to pull off the victory in front of their home crowd . The Miami Heat defeated the Golden State Warriors 105 - 102 Monday at AmericanAirlines Arena . After Kevin Durant tied the game at 102 with just over 10 seconds left in the fourth quarter , Dion Waiters held the ball at the top of the key while the clock ticked down . With a little over two seconds on the clock , Waiters launched a shot from behind the arc . The shot hit nothing but net and the Heat pulled off one of the biggest upset victories in the NBA this season . Waiters was not only the hero , but he was also the star , as he finished with a game - high 33 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field and 6 - of - 8 from 3 - point land in 33 minutes . As a team , the Heat were scorching from behind the arc , hitting a ridiculous 43 percent of their shots from long range in the winning effort . The win gives Miami their fourth straight victory as they were perfect over their four - game home stand . Meanwhile , the loss ends the Warriors ' ( 38 - 7 ) seven - game win streak , as it ended up being too little too late in the closing moments for the NBA 's top team . Durant led the way in the scoring column , finishing with 27 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he did shoot just 1 - of - 8 from behind the arc . Additionally , Steph Curry almost put together a triple - double , as he recorded 21 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 22 of his own , but JaVale McGee 's 10 points made him the fourth and final Warriors to score in double figures . Up next , the Heat will look to continue their winning ways in Brooklyn on Wednesday , while the Warriors will look to return to form against the Hornets on Wednesday .

Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Suns did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Suns into 19 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Victor Oladipo was unstoppable this season , going 15 - for - 25 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 38 points , while also adding four assists in 43 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 17 rebounds on the season . Nikola Vucevic came off the bench to score 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and three steals . He 's had a nice stretch of three games , averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds over that span . Markieff Morris added 23 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds , while Vucevic recorded 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 5 rebounds and three steals . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 30 points and 32 rebounds over those two games . Coming off the bench , P.J . Tucker had 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and five rebounds . P.J . Tucker chipped in with 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and five rebounds as well . These two teams will play game three on Friday at the Barclays Center in Phoenix .
LeBron James and Kyrie Irving led the way for Cleveland with matching 27 - point efforts . Kevin Love had a near double - double with 16 points and nine rebounds , while Tristan Thompson supplied a 13 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . Kyle Korver led the second unit with 14 points . The Cavs were excellent on both ends of the floor , posting success rates of 55 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while limiting Denver to respective tallies of 40 and 34 . Nikola Jokic 's 27 - point , 13 - rebound double - double paced the Nuggets . Gary Harris was next with 16 points . Jamal Murray matched Harris ' scoring total to lead the bench . Wilson Chandle provided 13 points . Jameer Nelson supplied a full stat line of 12 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Will Barton was productive as a reserve as well with 12 points . LeBron James 's 27 points led Denver , and Kevin Love posted a 16 - point , 9 - rebound double - double . Tristan Thompson contributed a near double - double of 13 points and nine rebounds . Will Barton was highly productive off the bench , registering 12 points , three rebounds and four assists . The Nuggets dropped to 24 - 30 and remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 'll travel to Orlando to face off against the Magic on Saturday . Kyrie Irving 's game - high 27 points led the Nuggets , a total he supplemented with five assists , four rebounds and a steal . Nikola Jokic was next with a 16 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Wilson Chandler filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , six rebounds , an assist and a block . Will Barton paced the Denver bench with 12 points , three rebounds , four assists and a steal . The Nuggets remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They take on the Toronto Raptors at home on Thursday night .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 118 - 88 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows which way they 're heading . The second half is when Chicago really turned it on , as they outscored Brooklyn , 59 - 42 in that 24 - minute span . Prior to that , there were 10 lead changes and six ties , as it was close throughout the first half . Defense was key for the Bulls , as they held the Nets to 34 percent from the field and 16 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a decisive statistic as well , with Chicago winning that battle , 58 - 45 . The Bulls also dominated the assist differential , recording 26 assists to Brooklyn 's 13 . The Nets ( 1 - 3 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Jimmy Butler continued his great form , as he accumulated 22 points , six rebounds and 2 assists . Nikola Mirotic was the only other starter with more than four points , as he totaled 16 points and 10 rebounds . Taj Gibson went just 7 - of - 10 from the field to finish with 14 points and 11 rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic led the starters in scoring , as he dropped 15 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting . On deck for Brooklyn is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 94 , at Smoothie King Center on Tuesday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Wizards were able to pull ahead of the Pelicans with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Washington outscored New Orleans , 33 - 21 . Defense was also key for the Wizards , as they held the Pelicans to 45 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . The Wizards also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 45 - 42 . The Wizards ( 19 - 29 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 36 points , 17 rebounds and three steals on 15 - of - 25 shooting . John Wall was n't far behind , finishing with 18 points , four rebounds , 19 assists , two steals and two blocks . Marcin Gortat was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 17 points and 11 rebounds . Otto Porter was second on the team , providing 13 points , six rebounds and two steals . Buddy Hield was the only other starter with more than four points , as he dropped 0 points on 2 - of - 0 from three - point range . Bradley Beal led the team in scoring , as he tallied 27 points , six rebounds and two assists on 11 - of - 16 shooting . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , totaling 17 points and 11 rebounds .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 3 ) 103 - 95 on Tuesday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . Coming into this game , this was a matchup between the leaders of each respective conference . The Celtics were n't phased though , and dominated the Celtics in all aspects of the game . The Cavaliers shot better , going 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 31 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , four assists and four steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Evan Bradley did all he could to keep the Celtics in this game . He went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding eight rebounds . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Cavaliers ' seven - game win streak . James on the other hand finished with 31 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 11 rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 11 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The only other Hornet in double figures was Kyrie Irving , who chipped in with 13 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and six assists . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Celtics will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 96 - 92 , at Sleep Train Arena on Monday . Memphis was expected to win this game easily and they left yes doubt with this lopsided result . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Kings , as they led by 11 after the first quarter and by 40 headed into halftime . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as Sacramento recorded eight more assists than the Grizzlies , while committing five less turnovers . The Kings ( 10 - 16 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Grizzlies is just what they need to get going . Marc Gasol was the player of the game , as he scored a game - high 22 points on 7 - of - 20 shooting . Marc Gasol was huge , as he accumulated 20 points , five rebounds and four assists . Troy Daniels had one of his best games of the season , as he led the Kings with 17 points on 4 - of - 11 shooting off the bench . Zach Randolph was the only bench player in double figures , accruing 10 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Sacramento will look to build off this win in a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 16 ) played this game without Chandler Parsons and they clearly hurt their offense here . DeMarcus Cousins did all he could for Memphis , as he led the team with 20 points , five rebounds and two blocks . Garrett Temple was second on the team , tallying 17 points , six rebounds and four assists off the bench . Zach Randolph recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 16 points and 13 rebounds .
The Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 50 - 11 ) 94 - 87 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Chicago . The Bulls got out to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Warriors 19 - 26 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Bulls also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 44 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors went 39 percent from the floor and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Bulls forced the Warriors into 15 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . The Bulls were led by Stephen Curry , who went 10 - for - 27 from the field and 2 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and five assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to be the team scoring leader . Bobby Portis also had a double - double of his own with 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 19 points and 15 rebounds over that span . He 's averaging 14 points and 14 rebounds on the season . Klay Thompson really struggled with his shot , as he went 5 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 11 from the three - point line to finish with 13 points . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Warriors will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Friday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New York Knicks , 121 - 107 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday night . The Knicks ( 22 - 31 ) have been mired in controversy on and off the court in recent weeks , with rumors swirling about a possible trade of franchise cornerstone Carmelo Anthony and losses in three of their last four games . The Lakers ( 18 - 36 ) are n't in much better shape , however , and came into Wednesday 's contest with only five road wins in 28 games away from the Staples Center this season . However , a sterling effort from the Los Angeles bench that generated over half of the team 's scoring total helped lead the way to a relatively easy victory . The visitors were sharp from the jump , building a 29 - 19 lead after one and a 61 - 45 advantage by halftime . That edge was 97 - 73 after three quarters , and even with New York showing some signs of life in garbage time , the Lakers still coasted to a double - digit road victory . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who tallied 22 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal in 26 minutes . Nick Young was next and led the first unit with a 22 - point , 2 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Brandon Ingram drew the start at small forward and totaled 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Justin Holiday was productive on the second unit as well with 14 points , one rebound and one block . D'Angelo Russell paced the starters with 26 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Kristaps Porzingis managed an 16 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Brandon Jennings matched Porzingis 's point total and added five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Larry Nance , Jr. was next with a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three steals . New York remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again Sunday afternoon for a date with the Charlotte Hornets .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) used a late fourth - quarter surge to secure their first road victory on Monday , after dropping their first three away from home to start the season . They did so with yet another great performance from Vince Carter off the bench , as he continues to turn back the clock in his 19th NBA season . Carter had 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve - - his third straight game with at least 17 points . Zach Randolph added a great performance off the bench himself , scoring 18 points and grabbing 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes to notch his third double - double of the season . For the starters , it was Marc Gasol and Mike Conley who carried the load , scoring 22 and 18 points respectively . For the Jazz ( 7 - 5 ) , on top of losing Monday 's game , they also lost their starting power forward Derrick Favors , as he left the game with left knee soreness after 21 minutes of playing time . Favors has been bothered with knee issues since before the season even started , and it is possible the team is now extra cautious with their star forward , opening the door for second - year player Trey Lyles to play a bigger role . The power forward out of Kentucky was great in 32 minutes off the bench , scoring 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Gordon Hayward , who has been unstoppable as of late with five straight games of at least 20 points , struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to just 13 points . With Favors potentially out for an indefinite amount of time , the burden will be on Hayward to regain his scoring mojo and carry the load for a Utah team that is n't very prolific offensively . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to Los Angeles on Saturday to take on the red - hot Clippers , while the Jazz will have off until Thursday when they take on Chicago at home .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 6 - 7 ) 111 - 89 on Tuesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Thunder got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 23 - 20 right away in the first quarter . Along with the fast start , the Thunder also shot better than the Jazz , going 55 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 38 percent from the floor and a meager 26 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Thunder also secured a 36 - 41 rebounding advantage . The Thunder were led by the duo of Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook . Westbrook went 10 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding six rebounds . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Thunder ' seven - game win streak . Westbrook on the other hand finished with 20 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , seven rebounds and nine assists . He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 25 points , 16 rebounds and 18 assists over his last two games . Anthony Ibaka had a solid game as well , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and four rebounds . The Jazz were led by Russell Westbrook , who recorded his first triple - double of the year . He finished with 20 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 9 assists in 27 minutes . The 27 points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his first since December seventeenth . While he did n't do too much on the offensive side of the ball with only seven points ( 3 - 7 FG , 3 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , Dion Waiters had a nice boost off the bench for Utah , as he finished with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , three rebounds and six assists . While he did n't reach his season average of 11 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to reach double figures was Serge Ibaka , who finished with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and five rebounds . The Jazz ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Jazz will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .

It was as one - sided as it could be , with the Grizzlies holding a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . While Memphis did n't dominate any statistic , it won nearly every one . In fact , Memphis ended up winning the shooting , assisting , turnovers , steals , fastbreak points and points in the paint differentials . The Grizzlies starters really took control , as they outscored the Heat starters , 84 - 42 . Miami will look to get out of this slide on Thursday against the Phoenix Suns .
