The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting New York Knicks , 107 - 102 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . After playing a competitive game on Friday , these two teams put up a similar fight on Saturday . The game flow was a bit different though , as there were only six combined lead changes and ties after nearly 29 on Friday . Charlotte got out to a hot start , as they led 22 - 22 after the first quarter . New York fought back to take their first and only lead in the fourth quarter , but could n't quite hold off a late fury by the Hornets . Defense was key for Charlotte , as they held New York to 38 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . The Hornets also took advantage of the whistle , taking 21 more free - throw attempts than the Knicks . New York ( 8 - 8 ) had the tough task of winning both games of a home - and - home set and they did all they could to hang around in this tight loss . Kristaps Porzingis led the team in scoring , dropping 25 points and grabbing six boards . Derrick Rose fell just shy of a triple - double , accumulating 18 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Carmelo Anthony also scored 18 points , adding eight rebounds on an ugly 7 - of - 25 shooting . On deck for the Knicks is a home matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday . New York ( 9 - 7 ) had to play this game extremely shorthanded , but they got some huge performances from unexpected sources . Jeremy Lamb was the biggest surprise , as he scored a season - high 18 points and grabbed a career - high 17 rebounds in his first start with the Hornets . Kemba Walker led the team in scoring , tallying 28 points , three assists and three blocks in the win . Cody Zeller recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 10 rebounds . Starters Nicolas Batum and Marvin Williams both sat out this game with differing injuries . The Hornets will return to action on Monday , when they play the Memphis Grizzlies on the road .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 120 - 116 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday evening . The Cavs ( 28 - 8 ) narrowly escaped Phoenix with the win , as the Suns ( 12 - 26 ) used a strong second half to come within two points , with 3:20 left in the fourth . The Cavs started out with a huge 41 - point first quarter but the Suns retaliated in the third , winning the quarter 37 - 24 , to bring the score to 93 - 90 at the start of the fourth . However , the Cavs were able to hang on to escape with a four - point win . Cleveland 's big three earned their keep in this one , as they combined for 40 points in the first half , and another 40 in the second half , for a huge 80 - point contribution on the night . LeBron James was the high - point man , with 28 points , to go along with eight rebounds and four assists , but gave up a troublesome seven turnovers , in 40 minutes . Kevin Love added 25 points and 10 rebounds , while Kyrie Irving totaled 27 points and seven assists , but also gave up seven turnovers . The Cavs shot 54 percent from the field and 15 - of - 34 from long range , but only tallied 15 assists in the game . They are now 20 on their current road trip , which will go on for four more games , beginning with a stop in Utah on Tuesday . Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Suns , as he finished with 31 points , eight assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , while Devin Booker contributed 28 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Four other players scored in double digits in the valiant effort , including Tyson Chandler , who finished with 10 points and 15 rebounds . The Suns shot a solid 53 percent from the field and forced the Cavs into 20 turnovers , as they came very close to pulling off the upset . The Suns will look to carry on with similar intensity and fight , as they play host to the Mavericks on Thursday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 87 - 75 , at Palace at Auburn Hills on Friday . Both teams ' defenses came out ultra - sharp , with only a combined 29 points scored in the first quarter . The game remained close throughout the second and third periods as well , and the Pistons ( 33 - 36 ) actually entered the fourth quarter with a 66 - 60 lead . That 's when the light went on for the Raptors ( 40 - 29 ) , who rattled off 27 points over the final 12 minutes while limiting Detroit to just nine points . Abysmal three - point shooting was part of the downfall for the Pistons , as they managed just a 15 percent success rate from behind the arc . The loss negated a mammoth 22 - rebound effort from Detroit 's Andre Drummond . Serge Ibaka paced Toronto with 17 points , nine rebounds and one assist . DeMar DeRozan followed with 14 points , eight boards and six assists . DeMarre Carroll supplied 12 points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 10 points , eight rebounds , one steal and one block . Cory Joseph was productive as well with a full stat line of nine points , seven rebounds , six assists and one block . Norman Powell led the second unit with 11 points and two rebounds . Reggie Jackson led Detroit with 20 points and six assists . Tobias Harris provided 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope registered nine points , two rebounds and two assists . Andre Drummond added eight points , two steals and one block in addition to his astounding rebound total . Jon Leuer led the second unit with 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and one block . The Raptors head back home to tangle with the Indiana Pacers on Sunday evening , while the Pistons remain home to face off with the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday evening .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 0 - 1 ) 101 - 100 on Thursday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . In a tight battle between two of the more experienced teams in the league , the Spurs were able to hold on in the fourth quarter to secure the five - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Spurs shot 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 49 percent from the floor and 38 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Mavericks , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Spurs got their biggest contribution from Monta Ellis , who had 26 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and six assists . The 26 points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his first since the end of January . The Spurs also received a solid contribution from Marco Belinelli , who came off the bench to score 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 28 minutes . Danny Green was the only other Mavericks ' player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and four assists . The Mavericks ' next game will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 18 - 32 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 19 - 31 ) 114 - 109 on Tuesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers came out of the third quarter down 75 - 69 , but absolutely exploded in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Pistons 33 - 33 to seal the victory on the road . The Pacers shot 60 percent from the field and 57 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons shot 49 percent from the floor and 50 percent from beyond the arc . The Pacers were led by the duo of George Hill and George Hill . Hill shot 8 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding six rebounds . He 's now combined for 52 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Pacers ' seven - game win streak . Hill on the other hand finished with 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 8 FT ) , three rebounds and six assists of his own . Considering he 's only averaging 13 points per game so far this season , it was a nice surprise for the Pacers in this one . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Caron Butler , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) in 24 minutes . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 12 - 13 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 14 ) 104 - 92 on Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . This marked a huge win for the Thunder , as they passed up the New Orleans Pelicans for the eighth and final projected seed in the Western Conference standings . The Pelicans are just a half game behind them though , with the Suns trailing by just three games as well , so it 'll remain a fight for the last seed all the way until the end of the regular season in the West . The Kings , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . They 're even with the Indiana Pacers , but hold the tie breaker , so they remain ahead of them for now . The Thunder are also just a game behind the Miami Heat for the seventh spot . With both Kevin Durant and Serge Ibaka out due to injury , Russell Westbrook continued to put on a show . He did n't have the best night shooting the ball ( 11 - 20 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , but he got to the free throw line at will and converted on 9 - of - 12 attempts to finish with 32 points . He also had six rebounds and seven assists , as he was able to stuff the stat sheet against a tough opponent . Coming off the bench , Carl Landry continued his strong play with 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and four rebounds in 22 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Kings will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

This game was over from the start , as the Spurs opened up a 11 - point lead after the first quarter and continued to pile it on throughout the rest of the game . By the time the fourth period rolled around , San Antonio had opened up a 23 - point lead . Kawhi Leonard was the only other Timberwolves player to score in double figures for the Timberwolves , posting 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) with three rebounds , four assists and one steal in 27 minutes . The Spurs now head to Miami on Thursday to take on the Heat . For the Timberwolves , it was just a painful loss in a game that looked to be a blowout early on . Minnesota got off to a hot start , jumping out to a 44 - 23 lead after the first quarter . However , the Timberwolves came out firing in the third quarter though , out - scoring the Timberwolves 28 - 25 , but the Spurs were able to hold off the charge and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Spurs shot 57 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves shot only 42 percent from the floor and a meager 38 percent from beyond the arc . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 28 points and 6 rebounds per game . Considering he 's only averaging 17 points per game so far this season , it was a nice surprise for the Timberwolves in this one . In fact , neither team had more than a nine - point lead until the final six minutes , as there were nine ties and 15 lead changes in total . The second half is where the Cavaliers really turned it on , outscoring Utah , 65 - 48 over the final 24 minutes . Cleveland was lights - out from the field , shooting 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . LeBron James carried the load for Cleveland , as he tallied 33 points , 10 rebounds and six assists on 13 - of - 20 shooting . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , tallying 21 points and four assists . Rudy Gobert was the only other Cavaliers player in double figures , as he accumulated 10 points , nine rebounds and four assists . The Cavaliers will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Sacramento Kings ( 5 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 6 - 7 ) 97 - 91 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Kings did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 35 percent compared to the Magic , who went 29 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Kings did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Magic into 17 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . DeMarcus Cousins turned in a huge game , going 8 - for - 19 from the field to score 29 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 21 points and 4 rebounds on the season . Rajon Rondo came one assist shy of his second triple - double , as he finished with 13 points , seven rebounds and nine assists . He 's now averaging 11 points and 4 rebounds on the year . The only other Hornet in double figures was Victor Oladipo , who posted 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds in just over 25 minutes . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host New York Knicks 104 - 93 at Barclay 's Center on Friday . In a game that was tight throughout the first half , it took a lot of swings to get Milwaukee their win . In fact , the Bucks led by 26 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Milwaukee , as they held New York to 46 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The Bucks also took advantage of the whistle , taking 16 more free - 13 attempts than the Knicks . New York ( 26 - 39 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Giannis Antetokounmpo carried the load , as he tallied 32 points , 13 rebounds and four steals . Carmelo Anthony was second on the team , finishing with 16 points , four rebounds and three assists . Courtney Lee was second on the team , as he totaled 12 points and seven rebounds off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis had a nice all - around game too , accumulating 13 points , eight rebounds , two assists and three blocks in the defeat . Greg Monroe recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 13 points and 12 rebounds . Carmelo Anthony led the Knicks in scoring , as he collected 32 points and 13 rebounds . Carmelo Anthony was second on the team , with his 18 points , three rebounds and three assists .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 8 - 27 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 12 - 25 ) 97 - 77 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers got out quickly in this game , out - scoring the Suns 25 - 10 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Lakers used their three - point shooting to grab an advantage , going 36 percent from deep , while the Suns went just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Lakers were also able to force the Suns into 14 turnovers , while only committing 14 of their own . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who went 11 - for - 25 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two steals . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to be the team scoring leader . Mirza Teletovic also had a solid game in a row , going 6 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 16 points in 23 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise as he 's averaging only 10 points per game on the year . Like Russell Randle , Devin Booker did n't have his best night shooting the ball . He went 5 - for - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 10 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 10 assists over those two games . Roy Hibbert finished with 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) , six rebounds and three blocks in 16 minutes . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Suns will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 117 - 104 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers took a 27 - 17 lead after the first quarter , as they never trailed after that . The Indiana offense was as efficient as ever , going 50 percent from the field , 41 percent from three - point range and 92 percent from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Pacers winning that battle , 38 - 32 . Orlando ( 15 - 20 ) have not been able to get a winning - streak going this season , as their defense continues to falter . Serge Ibaka led the starters in scoring , as he totaled 17 points and eight rebounds in the loss . Nikola Vucevic led the team in scoring , as he accrued 18 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Jeff Green provided 17 points on his own off the bench on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Aaron Gordon went just 4 - of - 10 from the field , to finish with 13 points and six rebounds . On deck for the Magic is a road matchup with the New York Knicks on Monday . Indiana ( 17 - 18 ) needed this win after a poor stretch and they did n't let fans down in this offensive showcase . Myles Turner was the player of the game , as he accumulated 23 points , 12 rebounds and three assists on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Paul George was second on the team , collecting 19 points , five rebounds and three assists . Jeff Teague scored just 12 points , but dished out nine assists in the win . Off the bench , Al Jefferson scored 12 points , while Aaron Brooks dropped 14 of his own . Indiana will look to keep rolling against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday .

In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets finished the game on a 21 - 11 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as New York 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Houston hitting 45 percent from the field , 64 percent from the free - throw line and 28 percent from three - point range . Defensive rebounding was key for Houston , winning that battle , 42 - 26 . The Knicks ( 8 - 10 ) had a tough task here in a back - to - back set , but they pulled out another huge win on the road . During that five - game stretch , he 's averaging 22 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists . Considering he 's averaging 14 points per game on the season , it was a nice surprise for the Hawks . He shot 10 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 29 points , while also adding seven rebounds and seven assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Jazz ' seven - game win streak . While the Sixers have preached patience , questions about whether or not the pieces they have can fit together have already been getting tossed around liberally in NBA circles . Phoenix will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Philadelphia has lost four straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Sixers will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Sixers have the right guys to build a winning team around . Tony Wroten led the Sixers in scoring with 28 points , to go along with four rebounds and two assists . DeMarcus Cousins ' struggles in Tuesday 's game against the Kings were , in general terms , uncharacteristic of the All-Star center . However , when looking at Cousins ' history following a huge performance , it ends up not being too out of character . Cousins followed up Monday 's monster 46 - point , 29 - rebound performance with a bit of a dud , as he shot just 11 - of - 23 ( 48 percent ) from the field en route to scoring just 24 points . Going back as far as last season , in his last five games where he scored at least 44 points , Cousins followed up with a poor shooting performance the next game . Cousins never shot over 38 percent from the field in any of those five followups and shot as low as 28 percent in one of the outings . Overall , in those five games coming off a 44 - point performance , Gay shot just 1 - of - 21 from the field and had just six rebounds . In the end , it was a night to forget for the Knicks , as they shot just 35 percent from the field and an underwhelming 16 percent from behind the arc . Up next , the Kings will remain home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while the Knicks will look to get back on the right track against the Warriors on Saturday in the first half of a home - to - home , the Utah Jazz . The Knicks ( 27 - 43 ) had won two - straight headed into this matchup , so a win against the Kings is a great sign going forward . DeMarcus Cousins had his best game of the season though , accumulating 24 points , 20 rebounds , four assists and two blocks in the defeat . Rudy Lopez was the only other player who scored more than 11 , as he totaled 17 points , seven rebounds and two blocks . Derrick Williams played well off the bench , collecting 11 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Kings will look to play better on Sunday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers .

It was a wire - to - wire win for the Spurs , as they led by 12 after the first quarter and by 50 headed into the fourth quarter . Defense was key for San Antonio , as they held Washington to 48 percent shooting and forced them to commit 12 turnovers . San Antonio also dominated in the paint , winning the rebounding battle , 38 - 7 , and outscoring the Wizards in the paint , 68 - 27 . Bradley Beal led the team in scoring , as he tallied 25 points and six rebounds . Tony Parker finished second on the team , amassing 20 points and three assists . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , totaling 10 points and 10 rebounds . Patty Mills was San Antonio 's best player , as he accumulated 15 points , five rebounds and four assists . Otto Porter was second on the team in scoring , collecting 14 points and eight rebounds . The Wizards will play the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday for their next game . The Spurs ( 14 - 3 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across their last 19 games and home blowouts like this are simply embarrassing . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards , as he tallied 19 points , three rebounds , five assists and three steals . Otto Porter amassed 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Otto Porter amassed 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Washington will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Houston Rockets .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 48 - 19 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 34 - 34 ) 99 - 98 on Friday at the American Airlines Center in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got out to a quick start in this matchup , out - scoring the Mavericks 31 - 31 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 44 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 47 percent from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were led by Kyrie Irving , who went 13 - for - 28 from the field and 3 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding five assists . He temporarily left the game in the first quarter after straining his hamstring , but he came back in the second and played through the injury to bring the Cavaliers to a huge win . Irving secured the fifth double - double of his own , as he shot 7 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 33 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line four times and converted on all four attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him after struggling with his shot against the Pelicans on Sunday . Chandler Parsons shot just 3 - for - 9 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 14 points in 6 minutes . Coming off the bench , Channing Frye added 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three rebounds in 15 minutes . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Miami Heat ( 21 - 13 ) defeated the Indiana Heat ( 19 - 15 ) 103 - 100 on Wednesday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Heat road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Pacers had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 5 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , Indiana had managed a paltry three wins in 21 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 100 points over the first 41 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for Miami , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Heat roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 38 percent from the field and 23 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Pacers ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 23 percent shooting from beyond the arc . Indiana was led by Dwyane Wade , who managed 17 points , nine assists and three rebounds . Ian Mahinmi was close behind him with 13 points , nine rebounds and a block , while Jordan Hill collected 10 points , 12 rebounds , an assist , a block and a steal . Rodney Stuckey and Jordan Stuckey contributed a pair of 10 - point efforts as reserves , with the former adding three rebounds and three assists , and the latter posting five rebounds , three assists and a block . Jordan Hill led the reserves with 10 points , 12 rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . The Heat fell to 21 - 13 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Orlando to take on the Magic on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Portland Trail Blazers , 88 - 86 , at Moda Center on Saturday . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the NBA , this game was tight throughout . In fact , neither team had more than a nine - point lead until the final six minutes , as there were nine ties and 15 lead changes in total . The second half is where the Grizzlies really turned it on , outscoring Portland , 65 - 17 , in the second half . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with Memphis winning that battle , 58 - 52 . The Grizzlies also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 11 more assists , while committing three less turnovers . Damian Lillard was the lone bright spot for Portland , as he accumulated 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . C.J . McCollum was the only other Blazer in double figures , totaling 24 points , four rebounds and four assists . C.J . McCollum led the team in scoring , as he dropped 24 points , four rebounds and two assists on 7 - of - 13 shooting off the bench . JaMychal Davis recorded a double - double , totaling 6 points , 10 rebounds and two steals . No other player on the roster had more than five points , five rebounds or four assists . The Grizzlies will be off until Tuesday , when they play the Utah Jazz for their next game . The Grizzlies ( 16 - 12 ) have now dropped five - straight games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . CJ McCollum led the way for Memphis , as he collected 24 points and five steals . Evan Turner was second on the team , as he accrued 15 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . JaMychal Davis recorded a double - double , totaling 6 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . Memphis will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup versus the Chicago Bulls .
The Denver Nuggets ( 31 - 42 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 15 - 61 ) 116 - 105 on Friday . In a battle between the two bottom teams in the west , the better team prevailed . The shooting was terrible from both teams , as they both shot 44 percent from the field . The difference for the suns was the play of their starters , as they outscored the Lakers starters 80 - 31 . In fact , no Lakers starter scored in double figures for the first time in over a decade . This now gives Denver their 10th win in their last 10 games and they continue to climb up the standings . D.J . Augustin was the hero , as he sneakily drew a foul with less than a second left and sinked the two free - throws to win the game . Denver had won three of their last five coming into this , but couldn’t hold a late lead on the road against a struggling Nuggets team . They made some crucial mistakes late that ultimately cost them the game , and that 's strange considering this team thrives off their veteran leadership . Kobe Bryant led all scorers , as he tallied 28 points , four rebounds and four steals in the victory . Julius Randle was the only other player with more than 18 points , as he totaled 18 points and four rebounds in the loss . This snapped a three - game winning streak for the Lakers and they 'll look to start a new one on Friday against the Denver Nuggets .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 3 - 3 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 5 - 4 ) 102 - 93 on Saturday . Portland is on a three - game win streak , which included wins against the Indiana Pacers , Detroit Pistons , and New Orleans . While their 7 - 2 record is impressive , and everyone expects the Trail Blazers to be a force to be reckoned with in the playoffs next summer , they have had an easy schedule to start the season . In fact , their two losses came against the only two teams they 've played this season who are considered locks to make the playoffs ( Miami Heat , Toronto Raptors ) . Bradley Beal has been out since the preseason with a broken wrist , but he is expected to make his debut next Friday . The Trail Blazers have three days off before they 'll host the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday . New Orleans has been playing some of the best basketball in the NBA this season and this win could be a springboard for a needed run . This shows how good this team can be at times , but the inconsistency is just so frustrating . Four players scored at least 14 points in the win , with the high - scorer being LaMarcus Aldridge with 31 . LaMarcus Aldridge had a double - double off the bench , as he scored 22 points and grabbed nine rebounds . Portland is in second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , one game ahead of the eighth - place Rockets . They 'll be taking on the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 115 - 108 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . The Lakers ( 1 - 3 ) were n't sure that they 'd have Paul George ( ankle ) available to help try to break a two - game losing streak until late in the afternoon , but he ultimately was able to suit up and share the co - lead in scoring among the starting five . He also helped spearhead a defensive effort that saw Indiana limit the Lakers ( 1 - 3 ) to a 45 percent success rate from the field and a 36 percent tally from three - point range , while also holding them to a season - low point total . They also elicited a total of 19 turnovers from Los Angeles while turning the ball over a whopping 19 times . The visitors were led by Lou Williams off the bench , as he tallied 19 points , five assists , a rebound and a block . Backcourt mate Monta Ellis was next with 17 points , three assists , two rebounds and a block . Luol Deng was next with 14 points , six rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block but had a rough night from the field , going just 5 - of - 10 from the field and 2 - of - 4 from behind the arc . Monta Ellis ( 17 points , three assists , one rebound ) and D'Angelo Russell ( 11 points , six rebounds , an assist and a steal ) were productive in reserve roles . The Lakers head back home to face the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Pacers head to the Windy City for a Tuesday night date with the Chicago Bulls .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 28 - 28 ) routed the New York Knicks ( 25 - 37 ) 104 - 85 on Wednesday at the Madison Square Garden in New York . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 27 - 25 in the first quarter alone . The Knicks were the superior shooters , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 38 percent from the floor and a meager 29 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Trail Blazers also secured a 55 - 46 rebounding advantage . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Carmelo Lillard and CJ McCollum . Lillard shot 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also adding six assists . He 's now combined for 50 points over his last two games , pushing his season averages to 19 points and 8 rebounds per game . Notching a double - double of his own , Kristaps Porzingis finished with 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and 7 rebounds . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who scored 23 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and adding 10 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Afflalo was also very efficient Tuesday . He shot 6 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also grabbing six rebounds . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 0 - 3 ) 102 - 90 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Detroit . The Nets were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 42 percent from the floor and just 6 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were able to force the Pistons into 22 turnovers , while only committing 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nets were led by Joe Johnson , who shot 14 - for - 23 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 34 points , while also adding eight rebounds . He 's picked up his scoring of late with so many injuries affecting this team , as he 's averaging just 7 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Kevin Garnett finished with 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 19 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 15 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope gave the frontcourt some help as well and recorded 10 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and two rebounds . Like Garnett , he 's turned it on offensively , scoring over his last three games in a row . Coming off the bench , Greg Monroe posted an efficient 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 43 points and 3 assists over his last two outings . Also reaching double figures in points was Mason Plumlee , who scored 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) in 21 minutes . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Orlando to play the Magic on Friday .

Coming into this game , this was a matchup between the leaders of each respective conference . The Warriors were n't phased though , and dominated the Thunder in all aspects of the game . The Warriors shot better , going 36 percent from the field and 18 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 36 percent from the floor and a meager 18 percent from beyond the arc . He went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 24 points and 0 rebounds per game . Stephen Curry did n't have his best night offensively , as he went 5 - for - 15 from the floor and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 15 points . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Steven Adams , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Thursday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 41 - 29 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 35 - 35 ) 109 - 97 on Sunday . The importance of the rather unlikely road victory for Atlanta can not be underscored , as the Hawks had come in to the contest having dropped three of their previous four games and in tangible danger of losing their grip on the eighth seed in the conference . Further dampening their prospects was the Rockets ' formidable defense , as well as the 19 - game home winning streak they carried into the Sunday night affair . Despite the rather long odds and a 61 - 51 halftime deficit , the visitors rallied on the strength of a typically remarkable effort from James Harden , who collected at least 53 points for the third time in the last six games . Tim Hardaway , Jr. was the high - point man for the Hawks ( 41 - 29 ) , posting a game - high 20 points and adding nine rebounds , a pair of assists and a block . Al Horford followed with a 22 - point , nine - rebound , an assist , a steal and a block . Paul Millsap contributed 11 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Donatas Motiejunas was productive in his own right , supplying 13 points , six rebounds and an assist . The Hawks remain in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Monday night . Harden paced the Hawks with 25 points , eight assists , six rebounds and a steal . Horford was next with 22 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Dennis Schroder was next with 14 points , four assists , a rebound and a steal . Donatas Motiejunas paced the reserves with 13 points , six rebounds and an assist . The Rockets remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Philadelphia to face the Sixers on Saturday .

The Heat got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 18 - 23 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Heat also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 46 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 40 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat also forced the Bulls into 13 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own . The frontcourt did the bulk of the work for the Heat , led by center Pau Gasol . Gasol went 9 - for - 18 from the field and 1 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 19 points , while also adding 17 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Aaron Brooks , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and two rebounds . Wade led all scorers with 28 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) of his own , to go along with seven rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 11 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Golden State Warriors , 107 - 85 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday . These are two teams at the top of the standings , but the Spurs really took it to the Warriors in this beatdown . It was a near wire - to - wire win for San Antonio , as Golden State held just one lead in the first three minutes , with the Spurs leading the rest of the way . Each quarter was decisive , as they won the first quarter by 12 , the second quarter by eight and the third quarter by 13 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the biggest difference , with San Antonio dishing out 27 assists to just 18 turnovers , while Golden State committed 11 turnovers to just nine assists . The Spurs shot 52 percent from the field , while holding the Warriors to just 36 percent on their end . Three-point shooting really killed Golden State , as they went just 18 - of - 31 from long distance . Ian Clark was the lone bright spot for Golden State , as he led the team with 36 points on 15 - of - 21 shooting off the bench . Matt Barnes led the starters , as he collected 14 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Patty Mills was San Antonio 's best player , as he accumulated 21 points , two rebounds and four assists . Matt Barnes was huge off the bench , as he amassed 14 points and nine rebounds . Zaza Pachulia recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 12 rebounds .
The Utah Jazz defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 88 - 83 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Jazz ( 40 - 24 ) picked up their 40th win of the season and continue to rise in the Western Conference behind stellar play from Rudy Gobert . The elite center for Utah tipped in the buzzer beater for the win over the Kings on Sunday , and came up with another ridiculous stat line on Monday , as he finished with 15 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks across 36 minutes of action . The Pelicans simply could not find a rhythm shooting the ball , and finished with a season worst 36 percent as a unit . They allowed multiple Jazz scoring runs and did not have a single lead throughout the entirety of the game . The Pelicans picked up their first win with DeMarcus Cousins on Sunday , but were unable to do the same on the second game of a back - to - back . Cousins finished with 15 points , eight boards and three assists on 5 - of - 15 shooting , while Anthony Davis added 20 points and 12 rebounds across 37 minutes . The Jazz were led in scoring by Gordon Hayward , who finished with 23 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting . He was the only efficient scorer amongst the starters , as Utah finished just 41 percent shooting from the field as a team . Next up , the Jazz visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Jazz play the same day when they host the Toronto Raptors .

This was a game full of swings , as the Grizzlies made a huge comeback , despite playing with a depleted roster . Marc Gasol carried the load , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Robert Covington was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 19 points and 10 rebounds . Zach Covington recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 10 rebounds . The Pelicans ( 20 - 33 ) did a pretty good job of keeping pace , though , as they emerged from the first quarter with a 25 - 32 lead and managed a 46 percent success rate from the floor . However , Utah 's vaunted defense asserted its dominance following their disastrous first 11 minutes , limiting New Orleans to just 65 points over the last three quarters . The Indiana Pacers ( 21 - 33 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 27 - 26 ) 106 - 93 on Tuesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . With both teams just barely on the outside looking in for the final spot in the Eastern Conference playoff race and less than 7 games left in the regular season , this marked another extremely important outing . The Pacers were able to come out victorious though , pulling even with the Pelicans in the standings and pushing themselves within striking distance at just one game back from the Boston Celtics for the eighth and final projected playoff seed . In order to seal the win , the Pacers used a superior shooting performance , out - rebounding the Pelicans 37 - 32 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Pacers shot a stellar 53 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans shot 46 percent from the floor and 47 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Pelicans , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Pacers got their biggest offensive contribution from George Hill , who went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to finish with 17 points , while adding three rebounds and nine assists as well . Averaging just 5 points per game on the season , it was a nice suprise for the Sixers , especially considering he had n't reached double figures in points for six straight games . Rodney Stuckey also had a productive night as well , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and three assists . It was his second straight night with 16 points , as he 's a combined 19 - of - 24 from the field over that stretch . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Solomon Hill , who scored 12 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 27 minutes . The Pacers ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday .

Meanwhile , the Raptors struggled offensively , shooting only 45 percent from the field . Nikola Mirotic was solid , with 17 points and five rebounds , while Taj Gibson chipped in 17 points . The Bulls will look to bounce back , as they go on to visit Sacramento on Monday . The Boston Celtics ( 11 - 8 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 7 - 13 ) 114 - 97 on Monday . Boston has won three straight games and are defining themselves as a contender to win the Eastern Conference this season . Isaiah Thomas paced the team with 21 points , the Celtics shot a woeful 38 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc as a team . They won the game at the foul line , going to the charity stripe 42 times to convert 25 of their free points . The Celtics will return home to host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday . Sacramento has lost four straight games , but it 's difficult to see why the team is struggling . Rudy Gay has been one of the few bright spots in the starting lineup this season . He put up 18 points and three rebounds in 31 minutes Thursday , and Jae Crowder had a disastrous game off the bench , scoring just five points in 23 minutes . The Kings will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Sacramento was playing their second game in as many days , coming off a win over the Miami Heat on Monday . They entered the fourth quarter down by just ten points , but mustered only three points in the first four minutes of the period while Avery Bradley finished with 20 points . The Celtics have taken a bold stance by putting out some of their lesser - known players in the starting lineup over Bradley Thomas , but the gamble has largely paid off , as they 've won seven of their last nine games .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 15 - 12 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 14 - 14 ) 97 - 88 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Dallas . The Mavericks came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 25 - 26 in the first quarter alone . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went just 38 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Mike Conley . Nowitzki went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds as well . Despite shooting just 19 percent ( 3 - 14 FG ) from the field , it was good to see him get things turned back around and have a decent performance . Deron Williams also had a strong showing , posting 14 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , six assists and a steal . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Chandler Parsons had a strong showing . He went 5 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding seven rebounds . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 6 - 2 ) grinded out a win on Friday night , defeating the Detroit Pistons ( 2 - 5 ) 102 - 91 . The game was very close the whole way but Chicago took control early in the fourth quarter when they grabbed the lead and did not look back . Detroit was led by a big performance from Derrick Rose , who had 19 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , seven assists , and two rebounds . Meanwhile , the Bulls struggled from the field , shooting a poor 44 percent from the field . The Pistons were led by the duo of Jimmy Butler and Pau Gasol . Butler shot 9 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 9 points , while also handing out seven assists . He also had two rebounds and one steal . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Brandon Jennings , who recorded 11 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five assists , a rebound and a steal . The Bulls are now 6 - 4 at home this season and will continue to battle for the top seed in the Eastern Conference . They face a tough Division record in Atlanta on Sunday . The Pistons will be right back in action with a game in the Eastern Conference Finals , while the Bulls will head to Utah to take on the Jazz .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 35 - 35 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 36 - 71 ) 132 - 120 on Tuesday . It was a night of improbabilities , with the Mavericks coming into the contest looking to snap a five - game losing streak at Quicken Loans Arena of all places , where Portland had only dropped four games in the last six games . Dirk Nowitzki continued his play Tuesday , putting up 40 points ( 16 - 26 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , with eight rebounds , four assists and two steals over 39 minutes . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe was dialed in with his shot , scoring 24 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 6 - 10 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and one assist in 43 minutes . Damian Lillard had 26 points ( 26 - 26 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and eight assists in 44 minutes . C.J . McCollum contributed 22 points ( 22 - 22 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt ) , one rebound , eight assists and two steals in 43 minutes . Wesley Matthews scored only 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 5 - 7 3Pt ) with five rebounds , two assists and one steal in 33 minutes . The Trail Blazers will continue their road trip by traveling to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Friday , while Portland will head to Los Angeles to square off against the Lakers on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 1 ) 102 - 101 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 30 - 30 in the first quarter alone . The Hawks shot better in this one , going 41 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went just 36 percent from the floor and a meager 31 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Hawks also secured a 53 - 50 rebounding advantage . The Hawks were led by the duo of Jeff Teague and Isaiah Thomas . Thomas went 8 - for - 21 from the field and 4 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding eight assists . He temporarily left the game in the first quarter after straining his hamstring , but he came back in the second and played through the injury to bring the Hawks to a huge win . Horford finished with 24 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and 12 rebounds , giving him his second double - double in the last three games . He 's been on an absolute tear of late , posting four double - doubles in a row , while averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds over that span . He 's averaging 24 points and 17 rebounds on the season . Kent Bazemore came off the bench to shoot 5 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding five assists . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 107 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 26 - 16 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but they did a fine job lighting up the scoreboard on Saturday as well after falling behind early . All five members of their first unit tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Utah shot a stellar 49 percent from the field overall . The Magic ( 17 - 25 ) did a pretty good job of keeping pace , though , as they emerged from the first quarter with a 42 - 29 lead and managed a 46 percent success rate from the floor . However , Utah 's vaunted defense asserted its dominance following their disastrous first 12 minutes , limiting Orlando to just 65 points over the last three quarters . Elfrid Payton led all scorers with 28 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , nine assists , two steals and a block . Aaron Gordon went for 21 points , four boards , two assists and a steal . Nikola Vucevic could n't quite duplicate his standout effort from Friday night versus the Suns , but did contribute a solid 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Serge Ibaka overcame a questionable designation due to a shoulder injury to take the floor and tally 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Jodie Meeks notched a spot start in place of Evan Fournier ( foot ) and collected 12 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jeff Green led the bench with 11 points and five rebounds . Gordon Hayward paced the Jazz with 23 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Rudy Gobert was next with a monster 19 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors registered 17 points , six rebounds and an assist . George Hill and Rodney Hood turned in matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out seven assists and recording two steals , and the latter posting four rebounds and two assists . Alec Burks led the bench with 11 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Magic head to Philadelphia to take on the Sixers for a Monday night showdown , while the Magic head west to Portland to take on the Trail Blazers .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 16 - 42 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 14 - 44 ) 116 - 106 on Friday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Phoenix , as they shot 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Nets really turned it on , as they outscored the Suns 26 to 35 . The Suns actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 50 boards to the Nets 42 . Brooklyn came into this game as a small favorite , but couldn’t muster up enough late to pull out the road win . The bench was the only reason they played so well , as they scored 41 bench points to go along with an impressive 35 rebounds . Brook Lopez was the only Laker who played well , as he tallied 12 points , six rebounds and two assists in the win . Brooklyn has a tough task ahead of them , as they play the second half of a back - to - back against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday for their next game . Brooklyn is off until Monday , when they host the Indiana Pacers . This was one of Brooklyn 's best games of the season , as they handled an Eastern Conference foe extremely easily . The Nets were clicking on all cylinders , but their defense was the key , as they held the Suns to 43 percent shooting . All the starters played well , as four of them scored at least 13 points and all five recorded at least five assists . Thaddeus Young was the hero though , as he scored a team - high 18 points on 8 - for - 11 shooting . Ronnie Brown also played well off the bench , as he amassed 16 points , four rebounds and three assists . Phoenix has a quick turnaround for their next game , as they travel to play the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday for their next game .
The Golden State Warriors ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 0 - 2 ) , 110 - 99 , on Tuesday at the Oracle Arena in Game 2 of the Western Conference Finals . In a matchup that featured the top two finishers in the MVP voting this season , Golden State 's Klay Thompson and Damian Lillard . Lillard led the way for the Warriors with 25 points and six assists , hitting five three - pointers on the night . He added four rebounds and two steals . Golden State , meanwhile , has sought to separate itself from the middle of the Western Conference and hold on to the three seed heading into the playoffs . Wednesday 's performance did the team no favors , however , as the starting five simply struggled to find their mojo offensively . Only C.J . McCollum scored at least 22 points and added two rebounds and two assists . Portland , meanwhile , struggled mightily on the offensive end . The team shot just 44 percent from the field , but could not find the basket enough to end the game . The Blazers are in fourth place in the Western Conference standings , seven games behind the conference - leading Golden State Warriors . The Trail Blazers will face the Blazers in the first round of the Western Conference playoffs , and the Warriors will face the winner of the Hawks-Wizards series . Golden State built a sizeable lead by halftime and never relented . To emphasize how impressive the Warriors ' victory was on Thursday , JeBron Lillard was held to 25 points on 8 - of - 20 shooting , which included a six - pointer late that put the game in overtime . The Trail Blazers will look to extend their win streak to three on Tuesday against the Grizzlies .

The Chicago Bulls ( 42 - 28 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 41 - 28 ) 108 - 92 on Sunday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with their quick start , the Bulls also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 53 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 38 percent from the floor and a meager 40 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Bulls also secured a 47 - 36 rebounding advantage . The Bulls were led by the duo of Nikola Mirotic and DeMar DeRozan . DeRozan finished with 37 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and seven rebounds , while Dunleavy chipped in with 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and three rebounds . With Kyle Lowry sitting out , Nikola Mirotic put up an impressive career - high of 29 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds and four blocked shots . The 21 points were a season - high for him , while he 's also been extremely effective on the defensive side of the ball and has posted two or more steals in each of his last six games . Recording a double - double , Joakim Noah finished with a team - high of 8 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 0 - 5 FT ) , nine rebounds and six assists in 28 minutes . He 's now averaging six points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Patrick Patterson was a huge factor in the win , scoring 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , to go along with five rebounds and two steals in 25 minutes . He continues to be one of the Raptors ' focal points in their offense , as he 's had at least 11 shot attempts in each of those outings . Coming off the bench , Patrick Patterson was extremely effective , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 0 FT ) and five rebounds in 20 minutes . He 's now averaging six points and 4 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Tony Brooks , who finished with 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) and 1 assists . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Raptors will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 119 - 108 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 4 - 3 ) notched their third straight win and remain undefeated at home after another strong performance by their young , talented core . Los Angeles built upon an eight - point first quarter lead in the second period , where a series of scoring runs capped off the first half . The Suns made the game a heated contest in the fourth quarter . Devin Booker buried a 10 - foot jump shot with 6:39 left in the final period and drew a foul , sinking a free throw to pull the game within one point . The Lakers were able to outlast the Phoenix comeback attempt and did not let up their lead , even after it dwindled to just one possession . Nick Young and D'Angelo Russell nailed much needed back - to - back three pointers to put the game out of reach and secure the rest of the victory from the charity stripe . Devin Booker had a standout performance , as his sophomore season continues where he left off from his rookie year . Booker finished with 39 points , seven assists and three rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . T.J. Warren added 1 points , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points , two assists and two boards . Nick Young provided his best game of the young season with 22 points and seven rebounds , in addition to three buckets from behind the arc . Jordan Clarkson and Lou Williams were impressive off the bench , adding a combined 32 points on 13 - of - 28 shooting in 26 minutes and 30 minutes , respectively . Julius Randle had the most well - rounded game for the Lakers on his way to 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Lakers look for their fourth straight win hosting the Dallas Mavericks , while the Suns head north to take on the Portland Trail Blazers .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 53 - 9 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 36 ) 104 - 94 on Sunday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs shot very well in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 46 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were led by the duo of Kawhi Leonard and DeMarcus Cousins . Cousins went 10 - for - 20 from the field to score 31 points , while also grabbing nine rebounds . He 's now combined for 37 points in the last two games , as he continues to be a force for the Kings . Leonard went 9 - for - 24 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also grabbing 13 rebounds . It was the most points he 's had in the last four games . In Cousins 's third game with the team , he finished with 31 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 10 - 15 FT ) , nine rebounds and 0 blocked shots . The 31 points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his first since December seventeenth . While he did n't do too much on the offensive side of the ball with only seven points ( 1 - 5 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) , Boris Diaw came off the bench and recorded 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , three rebounds and six assists as well . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Kings will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Suns ( 4 - 10 ) , which came on the short of a 52 percent success rate from the field , and a serviceable 49 percent success rate from the field . Philadelphia was led by a pair of 27 - point efforts from Eric Bledsoe and Nik Stauskas , with the former also hauling in 7 - of - 18 assists , while the latter supplied two rebounds and a steal . Nik Stauskas generated 21 points , five assists , two rebounds and a steal . Dario Saric was actually second on the Sixers with a bench - leading 12 points , which he supplemented with 11 rebounds , two assists , four steals and four blocks . Sergio Rodriguez managed 8 points , two rebounds , an assist and a steal , while Gerald Henderson provided 11 points , five rebounds , three steals and a block . Hollis Thompson paced the bench with 14 points , four rebounds and an assist . Phoenix remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head home to face the Toronto Raptors on Sunday afternoon . Bledsoe paced the 76ers with 27 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , six assists and one block . Joel Embiid followed with 26 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Nik Stauskas compiled 21 points , two assists , two rebounds and one block . Dario Saric was productive as a reserve as well with 10 points , seven rebounds , five assists , one block and one block . The Suns head to the Nation 's Capital to tangle with the Wizards on Tuesday night , while the Sixers also hit the road and face off with the Orlando Magic on Tuesday evening as well .
Win or lose , Anthony Davis has been posting historic numbers left and right this season . On Tuesday , that translated into 42 points and 13 rebounds en route to a shattering blowout of the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves . The game marked Davis 's third 42 - point outing in just 16 this season , a league - high . It was also Davis 's eighth double - double of the season . Davis has now scored 48 or more points in three of his last four comments , only failing to do so in a blowout in which he sat due to a minor injury . Thanks in large part to Davis 's 73 percent shooting performance from the victory , Minnesota was able to edge the Wolves ' team . Off the bench , sixth man Andrew Wiggins scored 29 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Bench guard Buddy Hield had 17 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , while point guard Solomon Cunningham had 12 . The team shot just 46 percent and hit only four three - pointers . The Timberwolves will play in Portland on Tuesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to San Antonio on Wednesday to play the Spurs . The Pelicans will host the New York Knicks on Wednesday , as they will see the Knicks against the Portland Trail Blazers . The Pelicans have three days off before but they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 20 - 34 ) had won four of their last five games headed into this matchup , so a near wire - to - wire win is all they could ask for . The first quarter is where they made their bread and butter , winning that quarter , 28 - 22 . New Orleans also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 43 - 34 . Anthony Holiday led the way for Minnesota , as he tallied 42 points , six rebounds and 12 assists . Ricky Rubio flirted with a triple - double , accumulating 15 points , nine rebounds and 12 assists .

These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Celtics were able to pull ahead of the Lakers with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Los Angeles , 33 - 21 . LA wo n't play again until Sunday when they take on the Phoenix Suns on the road .

He 's on quite the tear right now , as he has scored 111 points across his last three games . For Paul , Tuesday 's game marked the eighth time this season where he reached at least 11 points and 13 assists , while Jordan not only achieved his fourth straight double - double , but Tuesday was also his 13th straight game with at least nine rebounds . He also has grabbed at least 13 rebounds in 13 of those 9 games . For the Spurs , trade rumors continue to swirl around shooting guard Jamal Crawford and rightfully so , as the reserve has now scored double - digit points in all but one game so far in December and has scored at least 11 points in eight of those outings , with his 17 points on Tuesday matching his season - high he has set twice this season already . The Chicago Bulls defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 106 - 94 , at United Center on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just which way . This game was close throughout though , as there were six ties and 21 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 18 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as Chicago recorded eight more assists than the Cavaliers , while committing five less turnovers . The Bulls ( 18 - 18 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Cavaliers is just what they need to get going . Jimmy Butler struggled through the first three quarters , but finished the game with 20 points , six rebounds and eight assists , with 14 of those points coming in the fourth quarter . Taj Gibson went 9 - of - 10 from the field to collect 18 points and seven rebounds . Doug McDermott and Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to combine for 33 points and 10 rebounds . Chicago will host the Toronto Bulls for their next game on Saturday . The Cavaliers ( 26 - 8 ) had to play this game without Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving , as they simply did n't have enough in the tank to beat a hungry Bulls team . LeBron James had to carry the load , as he led the team with 31 points , eight rebounds and seven assists . Jordan McRae got the start for Irving and accrued 21 points , three rebounds , two assists and two blocks in the loss . Channing Frye was the only other starter with more than four points , as he amassed 15 points and five rebounds . Cleveland should fair better in their next game , as they take on the struggling Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Indiana Pacers , 100 - 99 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday . The Spurs were expected to win this game easily , but San Antonio fought back for a huge road win . The Pacers really turned it on in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Pacers , 27 - 23 . The offense was extremely efficient , as San Antonio shot 47 percent from the field , while recording 20 assists . San Antonio actually led for over 56 minutes of this game , as the Spurs never led by more than two points . Scoring down low was huge for San Antonio as well , as they outscored Indiana , 47 - 41 in the paint . Kawhi Leonard led the way for San Antonio , as he tallied 31 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and three steals . Paul George finished second on the team , accumulating 22 points , six rebounds , two assists and two blocks . David Lee was a huge spark off the bench , totaling 18 points , five rebounds and three steals . David Lee was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 18 points on 8 - of - 8 shooting . The Spurs will host the New York Knicks on Friday for their next game . The Spurs ( 46 - 13 ) have been a huge disappointment this season and this loss only adds to their struggles . David Lee had one of his best games of the season , as he led the team with 18 points and five rebounds on 8 - of - 11 shooting . Myles Turner was second on the team , totaling 16 points , six rebounds and three blocks . Myles Turner was second on the team , totaling 16 points , six rebounds and three steals .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 117 - 108 , at TD Garden on Saturday . The Celtics ( 23 - 14 ) learned earlier in the afternoon that they 'd play without Avery Bradley , who 'd tallied a team - high 26 points on Friday versus the Sixers . Marcus Smart entered the starting five in his stead and did n't disappoint , producing 22 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block . However , the high - scoring affair was a showcase for two of the game 's brightest stars , as Isaiah Thomas ( 38 points ) and Anthony Davis ( 36 points , 15 rebounds , two assists , two blocks ) put on a spectacular show on opposite ends of the court . Ultimately , a 36 - point third quarter by Boston did in the Pelicans ( 14 - 24 ) , which suffered their 13th road loss in 17 games this season . Langston Galloway was actually the second leading scorer on New Orleans in a bench role , posting 20 points , four rebounds and an assist over 22 minutes . Jrue Holiday was next with 13 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Rookie Buddy Hield totaled nine points , four rebounds and two assists , with all three of his baskets coming from three - point range . Donatas Motiejunas made his season debut and supplied 11 points , five boards , four assists and a steal over 20 minutes . Thomas added three rebounds , two steals and a block to his game - high scoring total , and was also notably 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc . Al Horford and Jae Crowder had matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding eight assists , seven rebounds and a pair of blocks , and the latter providing six rebounds , two assists and a steal . Gerald Green paced the bench with 15 points and three boards , while Kelly Olynyk offered 12 points , four assists and four rebounds in a reserve role as well . The Pelicans continue on their trek through the Northeast with a visit to the New York Knicks on Monday night , while the Celtics tangle with the Toronto Raptors north of the border on Tuesday evening .
The Chicago Bulls ( 35 - 33 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 33 - 36 ) 92 - 85 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with their quick start , the Bulls also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 41 percent from the floor and a meager 30 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Bulls also secured a 42 - 40 rebounding advantage . The Bulls were led by Derrick Favors , who went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Rodney Hood , who recorded 14 points ( 5 - 17 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three rebounds . Mack was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate , going 10 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 22 points in the final game . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Orlando Magic , 128 - 104 , at Toyota Center on Saturday . The Rockets ( 38 - 17 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered six defeats . The Rockets ( 20 - 17 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Houston forced the Rockets into an uncharacteristic 16 turnovers and made the difference maker to the Rockets ' four - game win . Despite the defeat , the Magic tallied 49 and 24 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively , and six players posted double - digit scoring . They played superbly on defense also , holding the Magic to just 65 points through three quarters . Serge Ibaka led the way for Orlando with 20 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . Nikola Vucevic posted a 14 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , three steals and one block . Patrick Beverley supplied 14 points , seven assists , six rebounds and one steal . D.J. submitted a full stat line of 18 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Nene Hilario was productive in a reserve role as well with 13 points and five rebounds . The Magic were led by Serge Ibaka 's 28 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds and one block . Evan Fournier contributed 21 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Patrick Beverley registered 14 points , seven assists , six rebounds and one steal . Nikola Capela tallied a 14 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , three blocks and one steal . Nene Hilario was productive in a reserve role as well with 13 points , three boards and one steal . The Rockets head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Rockets head to the Big Easy to face off with the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday evening as well .

The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 35 - 24 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 43 percent from the field , while the Nuggets finished at just 43 percent from the floor . Along with the hot start , the Nuggets out - rebounded the Nuggets 45 - 45 , giving them a hefty advantage , while also going a long way in making up for the 16 turnovers they committed . The Nuggets ' big three of Emmanuel Mudiay , Nikola Jokic and Emmanuel Mudiay were very efficient in this one . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Nuggets ' seven - game win streak .
