It was his first double - double of the season , and he 's now combined for 55 points and 29 rebounds in his last two games .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 21 - 10 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 21 ) 102 - 98 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Dallas . The Mavericks were down 81 - 78 following the third quarter , but were able to make a run in the final quarter , out - scoring the Lakers 30 - 36 to finish the game on the road . The Mavericks shot 51 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers shot only 36 percent from the floor and a meager 38 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Mavericks also secured a 40 - 63 rebounding advantage , only furthering their dominance in this one . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Rajon Rondo and Monta Ellis . Rondo went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding seven rebounds and seven assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Mavericks ' seven - game win streak . Rondo on the other hand finished with 21 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and seven assists . He 's been on an absolute tear of late , posting four double - doubles in a row , while averaging 15 points and 13 rebounds over that span . He 's averaging 17 points and 17 rebounds on the season . Monta Ellis led the team in scoring , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and three steals . He 's now pushed his season averages to 13 points , 3 rebounds and 7 assists per game on the year . The only other Net in double figures was Ed Chandler , who recorded 12 points ( 1 - 6 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and 11 rebounds , while Ed Davis had 10 points ( 1 - 6 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and 11 rebounds over 29 minutes . The Lakers ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Thursday , while the Lakers will be at home against the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday .

It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The Los Angeles Lakers ( 4 - 21 ) got the win as they upset the Milwaukee Bucks ( 10 - 16 ) by a score of 113 - 95 . This was only the Lakers third win of the season but a vintage performance from Kobe Bryant made it one that Bucks fans and basketball fans can appreciate nonetheless . Kobe scored 16 of his 22 points in the fourth quarter , but it was a strong 22 - 30 start by the Lakers that gave them the advantage they needed to come out on top . After going back and forth Los Angeles led 99 - 98 with 1:8 left in the game but Kobe came up clutch with a couple jumpers in the last minute to seal the deal . Kobe came out blazing with 16 points in the first half and led the Lakers on the night with a total of 22 points on 7 - 15 shooting , including 2 - 7 from deep , along with seven assists and four rebounds , in 27 minutes . Five other players scored in double digits for Los Angeles , including Michael Carter-Williams , who chipped in 19 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , along with five rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block , in 25 minutes off the bench . Giannis Antetokounmpo notched a double - double with 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 4 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and five assists , along with six rebounds and five steals , in 31 minutes . Khris Middleton chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 30 minutes . Lou Williams dropped 16 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt ) , along with three rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 32 minutes off the bench . Roy Hibbert finished the game with a double - double consisting of 12 points and 14 rebounds , along with three steals and one assist , in 35 minutes . The Bucks shot a poor 47 percent from the field and are continuing to struggle on both ends of the floor . The Bucks have now lost two in a row . The Bucks will look to bounce back as they visit Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Monday .

The Los Angeles Clippers ( 42 - 22 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 27 - 40 ) 101 - 94 on Thursday at the Staples Center . It 's rare to see the Knicks and Clippers match up this late in the season with a combined winning percentage under 30 , but that 's the way this season is going for both teams . The veteran point guard finished with 20 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , four assists and six rebounds in 43 minutes . The San Antonio Spurs ( 26 - 16 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 14 - 27 ) 89 - 69 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . In a tight battle between two of the more experienced teams in the league , the Spurs were able to hold on in the fourth quarter to secure the five - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Spurs shot 39 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz shot 33 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were also able to force the Jazz into 12 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . This win marks a league - leading eigth straight victory for the Spurs . Rudy Gobert led the way offensively for the Spurs posting 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) , 18 rebounds and four blocked shots . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 17 - for - 23 from the field and 11 - for - 28 from the three - point line over his last two games , as he 'll look to continue with his hot shooting moving forward . Rudy Duncan was the only other Spurs player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 11 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , six rebounds and four assists . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Sunday night . In a battle between two potent offenses , the defenses were on display . San Antonio absolutely stifled the Nuggets , as they held them to 47 percent shooting from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The rebounding was a big difference as well , with the Spurs snatching down 44 boards to the Nuggets 42 . This loss cracked a seven - game winning streak for the Nuggets , so losing in the second end of a back - to - back is nothing to be upset about . Kenneth Faried was the hero though , as he scored a game - high 26 points to go along with 14 rebounds . Tim Duncan was second on the team , with his 16 points and five rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other player in double figures , totaling 10 points , nine rebounds and two assists in the win . Aron Baynes was great off the bench , as he provided 15 points and four rebounds in the win . The Spurs will look to keep the momentum going against these same Nuggets on Tuesday in their next game . Arron Afflalo flirted with a triple - double off the bench , as he finished with 21 points , four rebounds and three assists . Denver will look to bounce back on Sunday in their next game when they play the Denver Nuggets .

The Milwaukee Bucks ( 39 - 40 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 15 - 64 ) 99 - 91 on Monday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went just 47 percent from the floor and a meager 39 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Bucks also secured a 33 - 42 rebounding advantage , only furthering their dominance in this one . The Bucks were led by the duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Khris Middleton . Antetokounmpo went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding nine rebounds and 1 blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Lou Amundson , who recorded 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) , 11 rebounds and two steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Bucks ' seven - game win streak . Middleton on the other hand went 9 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 22 points . He also came pretty close to a triple - double with seven rebounds and four assists . Coming off the bench , Shane Larkin added 14 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and five assists . The Knicks ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday .

The Suns were able to force the Timberwolves into 24 turnovers , while only committing 13 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . While Thomas led the way scoring for his team with 19 points , he just a miserable 4 - of - 21 ( 19 percent ) from the field and 1 - of - 6 from behind the arc . It was by far Thomas ' worst shooting performance of this season , but while they have n't been nearly as bad in February , they still have n't been very efficient . In the 13 games Thomas has played in this February , he 's managed to shoot over 50 percent from the field just twice , while he has now shot under 40 percent four different times . Thomas ' saving grace has come at the free throw line , where he has never wavered and is shooting an impressive 90 percent from this month . The Chicago Bulls ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 22 - 19 ) 111 - 101 on Saturday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Derrick Rose returned to action Monday against the Raptors , and in his two games back , he 's put up 36 points and 31 points . The early - season rust seems to be breaking off , and if Rose can stay healthy , a great performance on Christmas Day could be on tap for Thursday 's game against the Lakers . Detroit has lost seven of their last eight games , and the bleakness will be hard for them to overcome anytime soon as they 're currently trudging through a difficult part of their schedule . Bullock ( plantar fascitis ) , Detroit pulled down the defense , holding the Pistons to 44 percent shooting from the field and 19 percent from beyond the arc . The New York Knicks ( 6 - 6 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 5 - 6 ) 102 - 94 on Friday . New York has won three straight games , and the deeper they get into the season , the more believable the Knicks ' turnaround under coach Jason Kidd appears to be a sustainable change . The Knicks gave up 21 turnovers to the Knicks ' seven . They also elicited 30 turnovers from the Hornets , using them to spark their second straight home loss . Charlotte will return home to host the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday . Charlotte has dropped two straight and seven of their last eight games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Hornets ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Hornets continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Kemba Walker scored a game - high 31 points in 38 minutes and finally escaped with a double - double . Arron Afflalo scored a team - high 16 points . The Hornets will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Charlotte was playing the second night of a back - to - back set . They beat the Phoenix Suns 103 - 95 on Friday , and with the way the Suns run , it 's no surprise the Hornets did n't have enough in the tank to take on a rested Knicks squad . Charlotte shot 44 percent from the field and a bizarre 68 percent from the free - throw line . They were also out - rebounded by the Knicks 45 - 42 . Charlotte will return home to host the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 16 - 10 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 21 - 6 ) 105 - 91 on Tuesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Cavaliers got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 22 - 22 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this one , going 61 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies shot 45 percent from the floor and only 6 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavs also secured a 33 - 38 rebounding advantage . For the Grizzlies , LeBron James did everything he could to keep the Grizzlies in this game . He went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding a game - high of 15 rebounds . The eight rebounds matched a season - high for Waiters , as he continues to make his case for a larger role come next season . Starting alongside Irving , Jon Leuer was also a huge factor in the win . He finished with 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and two steals in 30 minutes . Considering he 's averaging only four points per game on the season , it was a nice surprise for the Grizzlies . Both Mike Conley and Vince Carter reached double figures in points as well . Conley finished with 18 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) and seven rebounds , while Carter finished with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 102 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 13 - 25 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Grizzlies ( 22 - 25 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Los Angeles forced the Rockets into 10 turnovers , including to the charity stripe 22 times from the Lakers to seal the win . Mike Conley 's 21 points led the Lakers , and he added four assists and a steal . Nick Young was just a rebound short of a double - double with 20 points , nine boards and two assists . D'Angelo Russell supplied 18 points , six boards and six assists . Timofey Mozgov posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double , and Vince Carter supplied a bench - leading 12 points . Tony Allen and Tony Allen followed with matching 8 - point efforts , while Vince Carter compiled 12 points in 21 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies ( 22 - 15 ) were led by Mike Conley 's 21 points , which he supplemented with seven assists and a rebound . Jordan Clarkson provided 16 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Timofey Mozgov posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . Andrew Harrison filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , eight assists and a rebound . Tony Allen and Luol Deng went scoreless over seven minutes , contributing eight points , two rebounds and a steal . The Lakers continue on their swing through the Deep South with a visit to the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday evening , while the Lakers remain home to face the Utah Jazz on Monday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 0 - 1 ) defeated the Cleveland Bulls ( 1 - 1 ) 97 - 97 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Chicago . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Cavaliers were able to bounce back with a convincing 11 - point victory in game two . The Cavaliers got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Bulls 26 - 26 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Bulls were also the superior shooters . They finished at 43 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 43 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 25 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds and five assists . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Mo Williams did his best to keep the Bulls in this game , going 7 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while adding four rebounds and a steal as well . After shooting just 23 percent ( 3 - 8 FG ) from the field in Sunday 's game against the Rockets , it was good to see Williams get back on track . Coming off the bench , Mo Williams had a strong showing . In 37 minutes , he posted 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and four rebounds . He 's now averaging 10 points and 4 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double - digit points was Louis Smith , who came off the bench to shoot 5 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score eight points . Up next , the Bulls will travel to Indiana on Friday to take on the Pacers , while the Bulls will travel to San Antonio on Wednesday to play the Spurs .

The Cleveland Cavaliers came out strong on the second night of a back - to - back to defeat the Orlando Magic , 105 - 99 , on Friday night at Quicken Loans Arena to take a 3 - 0 lead in the Eastern Conference finals . Likely a bit spooked by both their performance over the last two games , and the throttling suffered by the other postseason presumptive favorite down in Oklahoma City in their last pair of contests , the Cavaliers came out with impressive tunnel vision in Game 5 . They ambushed the visiting Magic right out of the gate , winning the first quarter by a margin of 33 - 20 . The rout was on , as Cleveland took a massive 65 - 34 advantage into halftime , a lead that eventually ballooned to 100 - 58 by the end of the third period . A major difference Wednesday night was the return to prominence of Kevin Love , who 'd shot 5 - for - 23 over the previous two games . Love exploded for a game - high 19 points , and supplemented the scoring with six rebounds , nine assists , a steal and a block . It was the All-Star point guard 's third consecutive double - double , and he also drained two key free throws in the closing seconds to extend a razor - thin 112 - 99 lead to the final margin of victory . He added nine assists , a steal and a block to his stat line . Kyrie Irving was next in line with 20 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Serge Ibaka put up a 19 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a steal . Nikola Vucevic had a near double - double with 11 points , nine boards , an assist and a block . Tristan Thompson paced the bench with a 11 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . The Magic continue their road trip with a Saturday night showdown with the Miami Heat , while the Cavaliers remain home to take on the Miami Heat on Monday evening as well .

The Houston Rockets ( 29 - 13 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 28 ) 110 - 98 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . After winning seven games in a row during the start of March and pushing themselves into the seventh seed in the Eastern Conference standings , the Pacers have now turned completely in the opposite direction and have gone on to lose six straight games . The loss does n't take them out of the playoff race though , as they sit just a game back from the Charlotte Hornets for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the East . The Rockets , on the other hand , were on a poor streak of their own , as they were losers of four straight . The win gets them back on the right track though , as they still hold a two - game lead over the Portland Trail Blazers for the third projected playoff seed in the Western Conference . The Rockets shot fairly well in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line . James Harden was nearly unstoppable , as he went off for a game - high of 45 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 7 - 12 3Pt , 14 - 15 FT ) , to go along with one rebound , seven assists and four steals . He continues to be the team 's most consistent player , as he 's averaging 13 points and 11 rebounds per game over his last three outings . Harden , on the other hand , finished with 45 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 7 - 12 3Pt , 14 - 15 FT ) , a rebound and seven assists . He has been on an absolute tear of late , posting four double - doubles in a row , while averaging 23 points and 19 rebounds over that span . He 's averaging 18 points and 12 rebounds on the season . C.J . Miles had a solid showing off the bench as well , scoring 23 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) in 17 minutes . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Pacers will travel to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Tuesday .

The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 95 - 69 , at United Center on Friday . Fresh off a double - digit home victory over the Bulls ( 13 - 13 ) on Thursday night , the Bucks ( 13 - 12 ) bounced back with an even more dominating effort Friday . Chicago 's offense had no answer for a stifling Milwaukee defense that held them to a season - low scoring total , while also limiting them to a 30 percent success rate from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo once again proved to be a thorn in the side of the visitors , leading the way with a 22 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven boards , three steals and a block . Jabari Parker could n't come close to his 26 - point effort from Thursday , but he managed 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal . John Henson and Tony Snell posted a pair of 10 - point efforts , supplemented by five rebounds , a steal and a pair of blocks by Henson , to go along with five rebounds and a pair of dimes from Snell . Greg Monroe came off the bench to tally a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double over 23 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic compiled 13 points for the second straight night in a reserve role , and also hauled in eight boards . A nightmarish outing for the Bulls saw Dwyane Wade pace them in scoring with a modest 12 points , which he complemented with five boards , an assist and a steal . Taj Gibson and Robin Lopez posted a pair of eight - point efforts on a combined 7 - of - 20 shooting , although they at least managed 11 boards between them . Jimmy Butler and Rajon Rondo had matching seven - point contributions as well , with the former also supplying seven boards , six assists and a steal , and the latter dishing out four dimes and recording four rebounds . Bobby Portis actually served as the second - leading scorer on the team despite coming off the bench , posting 10 points and eight rebounds in 19 minutes . The Bucks are now off until Tuesday night , when the Cleveland Cavaliers will come calling to the Bradley Center . The Bulls are home again Monday night , when the Detroit Pistons come to town .

While this appeared to be a blowout at halftime , the Wizards heard something in the locker room that completely turned this game around . Portland took a 70 - 49 lead headed into the half , but they completely collapsed by allowing the Wizards to outscore them , 63 - 42 , in the second half to send it to overtime . Markieff Morris then played hero , as he hit the game - winning shot with 0 seconds left , despite the fact that it appeared he stepped out of bounds prior to the shot . Both offenses were efficient , with Washington shooting 52 percent to Portland 's 51 percent . Fastbreak points was the only noticeable difference in the stat sheet , with the Wizards winning that battle , 15 - 7 . The Wizards ( 41 - 24 ) overcame a huge halftime deficit to send this game to overtime , as this marked their second game in three nights in which they overcame a double - digit halftime deficit . John Wall was fantastic , as he led the team with 39 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Bradley Beal finished second on the team , totaling 26 points and six assists . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris each recorded a double - double , combining for 28 points and 26 rebounds . Otto Porter provided 18 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . On deck for the Wizards is a road matchup with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Sunday . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 36 - 13 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 25 - 24 ) 116 - 108 on Thursday at the Staples Center . James Harden reminded everyone why he 's an MVP candidate Thursday with his seventh outing of 40 or more points , setting a new career - high with 33 points . Fittingly , he hit two free throws to eclipse his previous career - high . Overall , he was 15 - of - 17 from the line against the Rockets . For comparison 's sake , the Rockets were 26 - of - 30 from the charity stripe in this contest . With Thursday 's win , the Thunder completed the season sweep of the Rockets . Houston had n't won a division title outright since the 1998 - 99 season when it was a member of the Pacific Division . Russell Westbrook recorded another triple - double , collecting 26 points , 10 rebounds and 14 assists . The Thunder have another tough game on the docket as they will travel to the Oracle Arena to take on the Warriors on Friday . Oklahoma City was playing its second game in as many nights after grinding out an overtime victory in Los Angeles against the Clippers on Wednesday . Oklahoma City had its three - game win streak snapped with the loss . Playing on the second night of a back - to - back , the Rockets did n't seem to have enough spring left in their legs , as they shot just 38 percent from the field and were out - rebounded 40 - 40 . Up next , the Thunder will look to continue their winning ways Saturday in Charlotte against the Hornets .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday . These are two teams on the outside looking in for the playoffs and the Pelicans were able to escape with a huge win to get them closer to that eight - seed . Despite Dallas leading by nine points after the first quarter , New Orleans took care of business from there by winning the other three quarters by at least four points . In fact , the Pelicans outscored the Mavericks , 49 - 40 , in the second half . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with New Orleans winning that battle , 44 - 38 . They also stifled Dallas with their defense , holding the Mavericks to 48 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range . The Mavericks ( 31 - 43 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and losses like this are devastating for that pursuit . Harrison Barnes led Dallas , as he scored 19 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting . DeMarcus Cousins was n't far behind , as he accumulated 29 points , 16 rebounds and six assists . Seth Curry was the only other starter with more than four points , as he provided 18 points , two rebounds and three assists . Jordan Crawford was huge off the bench , providing 15 points and four assists . The Mavericks ( 31 - 43 ) have been dominant at home this season and a win like this shows just how scary of a team they can be . Anthony Davis was the player of the game , as he tallied 30 points , 13 rebounds and two blocks in the win . Dirk Nowitzki finished second on the team , totaling 23 points and seven rebounds . Jordan Ferrell was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 18 points and five rebounds . New Orleans will look to get out of this slide on Saturday against the Oklahoma City Thunder .
The Golden State Warriors ( 54 - 13 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 53 - 15 ) 114 - 95 on Wednesday at the Oracle Arena in Golden State . The Warriors came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Hawks 28 - 24 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Warriors used their three - point shooting to grab an advantage , going 47 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks went 36 percent from the floor and a meager 36 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Warriors also secured a 44 - 44 rebounding advantage . The Warriors were led by the duo of Stephen Curry and Harrison Barnes . Barnes went 11 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Warriors ' seven - game win streak . Curry on the other hand finished with 16 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and 12 assists in 30 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise as he 's averaging only 13 points per game on the year . Paul Millsap did n't have his best game from the field , but he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The Warriors ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Hawks will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday .

This was a sloppier game than expected , as the two team 's combined to shoot under 28 percent from the field . The second quarter was when the tide turned , as the Raptors outscored the Pacers 26 - 26 in that 15 - minute stretch . Toronto has now lost five of their last seven and they are starting to look like a bad team . The good news is that the defense has been the problem all year and that really wasn’t the issue today . The Pacers will look to bounce - back against the Denver Nuggets on Monday . The Raptors are one of the hottest teams in the NBA and they showed why on Sunday . They didn’t play well , but knuckled down defensively to pick up an impressive win . The team was led by Paul George , who tallied 28 points , four rebounds and four blocks in the loss . Jonas Valanciunas also recorded a double - double , as he scored 23 points and grabbed 15 boards of his own . It doesn’t get much easier for Indiana , as they travel to play the Golden State Warriors on Saturday in their next game . This gives Toronto six - straight wins and they are going into the playoffs with a fury . The unfortunate news is that George Hill had just two points on 0 - of - 6 shooting and six points in 31 minutes as a reserve . That 'll look to bounce - back against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 14 - 16 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 18 - 12 ) 114 - 106 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . This marked a huge win for the Thunder , as they passed up the New Orleans Pelicans for the eighth and final projected seed in the Western Conference standings . The Pelicans are just a half game behind them though , with the Suns trailing by just three games as well , so it 'll remain a fight for the last seed all the way until the end of the regular season in the West . The Spurs , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . They 're even with the Indiana Pacers , but hold the tie breaker , so they remain ahead of them for now . The Spurs are also just a game behind the Miami Heat for the seventh spot . With both Kevin Durant and Serge Ibaka out due to injury , Russell Westbrook continued to put on a show . He did n't have the best night shooting the ball ( 14 - 28 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , but he went 14 - for - 28 from the floor and 0 - for - 1 from beyond the arc to finish with a game - high of 5 - of - 8 shooting from the floor . Russell Westbrook finished with a game - high of 34 points ( 14 - 28 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and 11 assists . It was far - and - away his best game of the postseason so far , as he had n't surpassed the 15 - point mark previously . Steven Adams added 16 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 6 - 12 FT ) and 15 rebounds , while Manu Ginobili scored 11 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and grabbed 13 rebounds . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , while the Spurs will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .

The second half is when Golden State really turned it on , as they outscored Orlando , 42 - 24 , in the fourth quarter . The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Golden State Warriors 133 - 105 at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Russell Westbrook has been virtually unstoppable the majority of the season , but had been somewhat human the last three games after seeing a streak of six consecutive triple - doubles snapped against the Celtics on Dec. 34 . However , matched up Saturday against one of the most porous defenses in the league , especially against point guards , the perennial All-Star exploded for 30 points , a career - high 12 assists and eight rebounds , his 50th career triple - double . He added three steals and a block as well . His spectacular performance helped negate a remarkable effort on the other side from Kevin Durant , who drained a game - winning jumper at the buzzer to seal the victory . Houston abused the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording four more assists and 10 less turnovers than Minnesota . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they led by at least seven points for the final 20 minutes . The Timberwolves ( 23 - 36 ) had beat two playoff contenders in their last two games , but this was a tough task against a potent Houston offense . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 4 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 19 ) 98 - 86 on Friday . Portland has won four straight games , and in their last two games , they 've scored at least 118 points . Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used LaMarcus Aldridge as his point guard . Aldridge scored a game - high 23 points and grabbed 11 rebounds in a team - high 33 minutes . Wesley Matthews pitched in 19 points and five rebounds in 35 minutes . The Blazers continue their road trip against the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday , giving them a realistic opportunity to get a new number in the win column . Meanwhile , Portland has dropped two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Pistons will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Pistons have the right guys to build a winning team around . Wesley Matthews paced the team with 19 points , five assists and five rebounds in another great game . Damian Lillard also played well against the Pistons , scoring 14 points to go along with seven rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope made his first start at point guard and finished with 11 points and a team - high seven assists in 25 minutes . Detroit will return to the floor Friday when it plays host to New York .

Despite there being just two ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 13 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 50 minutes . All-Star forward Blake Griffin had 16 points and six rebounds as well as seven assists . Meanwhile , DeAndre Jordan , the reigning All-NBA First Team center , pulled down a whopping 14 rebounds to help the Clippers earn a positive differential on the glass . Though Chris Paul saw below his usual output , the star still contributed 17 points and four assists while turning the ball over just once . Chicago , meanwhile , saw strong play from its star players . Guard Jamal Crawford scored a team - high 25 points while knocking down two three - pointers . For the team , three - point shooting was a strength , as they knocked down 11 shots from deep . Chicago ( 31 - 31 ) is trending in the opposite direction of LA , as the team has now lost three contests in a row . Monday was a particularly poor showing for the Bulls , as the team saw its lowest offensive output of the season . Only three team members scored in double figures and the high scorer was forward Bobby Mbah a team , including 1 - of - 2 from three - point range . The Bulls , meanwhile , saw startlingly low output from their starters . Superstar Jimmy Butler contributed a team - high 16 points but went without a rebound on the night . As a whole , the Chicago starting five recorded only 29 rebounds and 42 points . 28 rebounds and three double - digit scoring performances off the bench , however , allowed the Bulls to keep the game close .

The Raptors got out to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Bucks 56 - 41 right away in the first half . The Bucks shot very well in this one , going 47 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 44 percent from the floor and 15 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were led by the duo of Kyle Lowry and Kyle Lowry . Lowry went 5 - for - 9 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 25 points , to go along with four rebounds and two steals . He 's on a nice two - game stretch where he 's combined for 47 points and 15 rebounds . Antetokounmpo really turned it on in his time on the floor , as he was very efficient with his time on the court . Norman Powell had the most success for the Bucks . He went 6 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while adding three rebounds and two assists as well . He had shot less than 50 percent in two out of his last three games coming into Saturday , so it was good to see him get things turned around and have a solid showing in a row . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Wednesday , while the Bucks will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Monday .

This was a big win for the Sixers , who have been struggling lately and remain out of a playoff spot . It was his second consecutive 20 - point game in a row , as he 's been a huge reason for the 76ers recent success . Jason Richardson also had a strong showing , posting 14 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes off the bench . It was his second straight night with 14 points , as he 's a combined 18 - of - 32 from the field over the last two games . Reggie Jackson had a double - double of his own , as he recorded 11 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 33 points and 44 rebounds over his last two games . Jason Richardson was the other Bull to reach double - digit points with 14 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds . The Sixers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 42 - 8 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 28 - 25 ) 116 - 90 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . In a tight battle between two of the more experienced teams in the league , the Spurs were able to hold on in the fourth quarter to secure the five - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Spurs shot 51 percent from the field and 55 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks shot 45 percent from the floor and 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were led by the duo of Kawhi Leonard and Kawhi Leonard . Leonard went 9 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also handing out six assists . He was also able to convert on 3 - of - 3 free throws.He 's now averaging 16 points , 9 assists and five rebounds on the season . LaMarcus Aldridge was able to notch a double - double with 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds . He 's had two solid showings in a row , combining for 25 points , 14 rebounds and four steals over that span . Patty Mills was the only other Maverick to reach double - digits in points with 16 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) off the bench . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 3 - 5 ) were able to hold off a late push from the LA Clippers ( 5 - 2 ) 92 - 94 on Wednesday night . In a battle between two struggling teams , there were numerous swings , as it was clear both squads were desperate for a win . There were only two ties and six lead changes , as this game was close throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 14 points , as the Clippers never led by more than four points . Los Angeles was lights - out from the field , shooting 67 percent from the field and 18 percent from three - point range . Zach Randolph led the team in scoring , as he tallied 26 points and nine rebounds in the defeat . Marc Gasol did all he could to keep the Clippers hanging around , as he tallied 18 points and seven rebounds in the defeat . Los Angeles is in a rough stretch right now and it 's hard to imagine it getting better with this lack of offense . They 'll look to play better on Sunday against the Boston Celtics in the back end of a back - to - back . The Grizzlies were sick of their bad defense in the first half and shut down this weak offense to pull away with an impressive win . The frontcourt was spectacular tonight for Memphis , as Marc Gasol , Zach Randolph and Zach Randolph all played at least 20 minutes in their defeat and that 's a scary sight for the rest of the team .

With a 74 - 68 lead at the end of the third quarter , the Mavericks remained in control . They went on to out - score the Lakers 32 - 18 in the fourth quarter , allowing them to end the Lakers six - game winning streak and push their own to seven in a row . The Mavericks were able to out - rebound the Lakers 49 - 32 , giving them even more of an advantage , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Deron Williams and Justin Anderson . Anderson went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while adding five rebounds and two assists as well . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 6 times , and converted on 6 - of - 0 attempts from the free throw line . Justin Anderson also had a big game , scoring 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) while adding four assists and a steal . He had two steals though , so it was good to see him get back on track . Also , coming off the bench , Dirk Nowitzki recorded a double - double of his own , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds . The Mavericks had six players reach double figures in points . Justin Anderson led the way , going 4 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 15 points in 20 minutes . He 's averaging only 13 points on the year , so it was a nice surprise for the Lakers . Dirk Nowitzki was also big , posting 13 points , five rebounds and an assist in 20 minutes .

The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Indiana Pacers in overtime , 109 - 105 , on Friday at Wells Fargo Center . The Sixers ( 1 - 7 ) had taken the Pacers ( 4 - 5 ) to the limit just two nights prior before succumbing in overtime , 122 - 115 . However , their second consecutive foray into an extra period against Indiana went much better , culminating in Philadelphia 's first victory of the season . Joel Embiid led the way by playing a game - high 26 minutes and posting 25 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a block . While he shot just 33 percent ( 6 - of - 18 ) from the field , he successfully parlayed 12 of 14 visits to the free - throw line into points . The impressive third - year man helped spearhead a sizable advantage for the Sixers down low , as they outrebounded the Pacers by a 54 - 40 margin . Indiana was led by Paul George , who despite leaving the game in the first half temporarily with a left thumb sprain , totaled 26 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Monta Ellis was actually second in line despite coming off the bench , amassing 19 points , six rebounds , five assists and four steals over 36 minutes . C.J . Miles , who drew the start at shooting guard , turned in 13 points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . Jeff Teague was modestly involved on offense over 35 minutes , supplying 13 points , four assists , a rebound and three steals . Thaddeus Young had a near double - double with 11 points , nine boards , an assist and a steal . Myles Turner supplied only five points , five rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block over 21 minutes , but Al Jefferson chipped in with 10 points , three boards and two assists over 22 minutes . Philadelphia also saw Gerald Henderson compile 12 points , four rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Robert Covington checked in with 10 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova paced the bench with 14 points and three rebounds . Philadelphia remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Monday night to take on the Sacramento Kings .

The Pacers ( 29 - 28 ) came in to Thursday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . The second half was much tighter , but Washington eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . LA will lose its draft pick if it falls outside of the top three , and the Phoenix Suns remain on the Lakers ' tail for the second - worst record in the NBA . Still , there was a lot to like on Friday for Lakers fans . Guard Jordan Clarkson had a career - high 35 points while shooting 8 - of - 10 from three - point range . LA outscored Minnesota 21 - 10 in overtime , immediately establishing an eight - point advantage at the start of the OT . The team finished with staggering shooting splits of 52 percent from the field , 61 percent from three - point range , and 86 percent form the line . Minnesota ( 28 - 43 ) , meanwhile , extended its own losing streak to four games . Houston also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 42 - 15 and the points in the paint differential , 52 - 29 . The Rockets ( 6 - 6 ) continue to fly under the radar and they may have pulled out their biggest win of the season against the Kings here . The Detroit Pistons defeated the Miami Heat , 107 - 84 , at American Airlines Arena on Monday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Pistons finished the game on a 28 - 11 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Miami never led by more than four points and only held the lead for a total of five minutes . Free-throw shooting was the decisive statistic , with Detroit going 33 - of - 26 from the charity stripe , while Miami could only go 10 - of - 12 . Fastbreak points was also a glaring difference , with the Pistons winning that battle , 11 - 4 . The Pistons ( 4 - 10 ) have struggled on offense all season and duds like this against a bad Detroit defense only adds to those troubles . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was the player of the game , as he led Detroit with 22 points , five rebounds and two assists . Andre Drummond finished second on the team , totaling 18 points and 15 rebounds . Beno Udrih and Jon McGruder recorded a double - double , combining for 31 points and 10 rebounds . The Golden State Warriors defeated the New York Knicks , 112 - 105 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors ( 51 - 11 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Monday . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . They shot 49 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , compared to the Timberwolves , who shot only 46 percent from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc . James Harden led the way for the Timberwolves , finishing with 38 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 13 - 14 FT ) , four rebounds and six assists in 37 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 14 times , and converted on 13 out of those attempts . Young on the other hand shot 9 - for - 20 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 19 points . He also came just shy of a double - double with nine rebounds to go along with it . It was one of his better games for the Timberwolves this season , but it was n't enough to get them the victory . Coming off the bench , Donatas Motiejunas added 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , eight rebounds and three blocked shots in 40 minutes . Considering he 's averaging 17 points on the season , it was a nice surprise for the Timberwolves . Gorgui Dieng added a double - double as well , with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and six rebounds . With Dwight Howard sitting out on suspension after accumulating a flagrant foul during the 2014 - 20 postseason , it was James Harden and Shabazz Muhammad who did everything he could to keep the Timberwolves in this game . Harden went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 38 points , while also adding six rebounds and six assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Rockets ' seven - game win streak . The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 119 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 8 - 17 ) checked in to the contest short - handed , as both Rudy Gay ( hip ) and John Chandler ( illness ) were able to muster the net on the second night of a back - to - back . The Suns ( 7 - 17 ) were able to pierce New Orleans ' armor Wednesday , touching up Gregg Popovich 's crew for a season - high 119 points . Phoenix was led by Jrue Holiday 's 23 points , which he supplemented with eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jrue Holiday was right behind him with 23 points , three assists , three rebounds and two steals . Langston Galloway and Langston Galloway were next with a pair of 17 - point efforts , with the former adding three rebounds , an assist and a steal , and the latter posting 11 boards , four assists , five steals and a block . Langston Galloway matched Booker 's point total and added five boards and a block . Langston Galloway paced the bench with 12 points , three rebounds and a block . The Suns remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Indiana to take on the Pacers on Monday night . Bledsoe paced the Suns ( 7 - 17 ) with 23 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals , while Jrue Holiday posted a 13 - point , 4 - assist double - double that also featured three rebounds and five steals . Devin Booker totaled 16 points , five rebounds , five assists and a steal . Tim Frazier filled out the stat sheet with 14 points , eight assists , three rebounds and a block . Jared Dudley filled out the stat sheet off the bench as well , registering 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and three steals . Leandro Barbosa was productive in a reserve role as well with 12 points , two boards , three assists and a steal . The Pelicans remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head to Philadelphia to take on the Sixers on Monday night .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 103 - 97 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Russell Westbrook has been virtually unstoppable the majority of the season , but had been somewhat human the last three games after seeing a streak of six consecutive triple - doubles snapped against the Celtics on Dec. 0 . However , matched up Saturday against one of the most porous defenses in the league , especially against point guards , the perennial All-Star exploded for 32 points , nine assists and a rebound over 36 minutes . It was Westbrook 's third double - double in the last seven games , a stretch where he 's averaged 82 points , 54 rebounds , and 3 assists per game . Meanwhile , the Thunder ( 1 - 1 ) were able to pierce Oklahoma City 's armor Wednesday , touching up Gregg Popovich 's crew for a season - high 97 points . Oklahoma City was led by Russell Westbrook , who posted a game - high 32 points , nine assists and four rebounds . Joel Embiid was next with a 16 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and three steals . Sergio Rodriguez supplied 12 points , nine assists , four rebounds and a block . Robert Covington turned in a modest but full stat line of 10 points , four rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Russell Westbrook led the way for Oklahoma City with 32 points , nine rebounds , nine assists and three blocks . Joel Embiid was next with a 16 - point , five - rebound double - double that also included an assist and three steals . C.J . Stauskas managed 13 points , four rebounds and an assist , while Robert Covington produced 10 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova paced the Sixers bench with 10 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again Sunday afternoon for a date with the Houston Rockets .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Denver Nuggets , 103 - 86 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . A truly balanced offensive attack , superior ball security and stingy defense are a winning combination more often than not , and such was the case for the Pistons ( 4 - 2 ) on Saturday . All five members of Detroit 's starting five tallied double - digit scoring , and super - reserve Jon Leuer pitched in off the bench with a 15 - point , 3 - rebound double - double as well . The Pistons also committed only 13 turnovers while eliciting 16 from the Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) , and tallied a stellar 48 percent success rate from the field . The visitors also built themselves a cushion early , winning the first quarter by a 29 - 12 margin that would serve them well the rest of the way . Wilson Chandler totaled 21 points in 31 minutes as a reserve . Danilo Gallinari 's 16 points paced Denver , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal . Ish Smith was next with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope registered 13 points , 1 assists , a rebound and a steal . Jusuf Nurkic contributed 10 points , five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Emmanuel Mudiay paced the second unit with 11 points , three assists , two rebounds and a steal . The Pistons continue on the road and head to Milwaukee for a Saturday night showdown with the Bucks , while the Nuggets are home against the Brooklyn Nets on Monday night .
The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 14 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 9 - 15 ) 112 - 100 on Sunday . Denver has won two straight , and they earned Saturday 's win without several of their frontcourt players . Brook Lopez remains out indefinitely with a lower back injury , while Kevin Garnett sat out to rest his foot on the second night of a back - to - back , and Mirza Teletovic missed a third straight game with a hip pointer . Kenneth Faried put together a solid game , putting up 19 points and 10 rebounds in 28 minutes . Zach LaVine moved back to a bench role , but that did n't stop him from having the best game of his rookie career . He put up 15 points in 25 minutes off the bench . The Timberwolves will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Minnesota has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Timberwolves will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Timberwolves have the right guys to build a winning team around . Andrew Wiggins paced the Timberwolves with his second triple - double of the season , consisting of 23 points , 1 - of - 1 from the field , 1 - 1 from distance and 4 assists . Karl-Anthony Towns pitched in an double - double with 18 points and 10 rebounds and added one assist and a steal . Randy Foye added 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Timberwolves have two days off before hosting the Milwuakee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Utah to take on the Jazz on Saturday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 4 ) , 108 - 95 , in Game 3 of the Western Conference Semifinals on Friday . In a battle between two Western Conference contenders , the Warriors were able to prevail with a huge road win . The key for Golden State was their shooting , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from beyond the arc , while the Grizzlies shot 51 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Warriors winning that battle , 47 - 43 . Memphis also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 47 - 43 . The Grizzlies have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Stephen Curry was spectacular , as he tallied 32 points , six rebounds and 10 assists . Marc Gasol also played well , as he totaled 16 points , 12 rebounds and two assists . Vince Carter turned back the clock and contributed 16 points and three rebounds on 5 - of - 7 shooting off the bench . Shaun Lee had one of his best games of the season as well , as he amassed 16 points , three rebounds and two steals . The Warriors will look to keep this momentum going against the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . This is a downright bad loss for the Grizzlies and they continue to fall deeper and deeper out of the playoffs . Stephen Curry led the team with 32 points , while also recording six rebounds and 10 assists . Draymond Green flirted with yet another triple - double , as he accumulated 21 points , four rebounds and four assists . Golden State will look to add to their historic run when it faces the Houston Rockets in the playoffs .
The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 3 ) 123 - 119 on Saturday . This was a mismatch on paper and that ended up being the case on Saturday . The Warriors dominated in nearly every category , as they recorded more rebounds , assists , blocks and steals than the Pelicans . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 26 combined turnovers between both teams . It was a much closer game than expected and the credit has to go to this winless Sixers team to put in a strong effort night - after - night despite losing every single game . Luckily for New Orleans , this will be the only time they 'll have to face the Warriors in Golden State this season . This was one of the worst offensive performances that the Pelicans have had all season and it 's a shame they couldn’t keep the Pelicans off the free - throw line . Stephen Curry has been one of the most underrated players in the NBA this season and he flirted with a triple - double in this game as well . He finished with 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Draymond Green also had a nice game , as he amassed 12 points , 17 rebounds and five assists in the victory . This is a scary team right now and the sky is the limit with the way they are currently playing . The Warriors will play the Phoenix Suns on Friday in their next game to try to extend their already record - breaking streak .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 38 - 38 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 33 - 49 ) 107 - 99 in overtime on Monday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 27 - 31 in the first quarter alone . The Trail Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets finished at 43 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Emmanuel Mudiay backed up the slack , going 11 - for - 23 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , to go along with six rebounds and six assists . It was far - and - away his best game of the season so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 4 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 0 from the three - point line over his last two games , but he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 49 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Rookie Jusuf Nurkic nearly had a double - double of his own , as he finished with 11 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . It was his first double - double of the season , and he 's now combined for 55 points and 24 rebounds in his last two games .

Their offense is firing on all cylinders , and coach David Blatt is using unconventional lineups to get the work done . He 's regularly used DeMarcus Cousins as his replacement in the backcourt , and he has been averaging over 35 points per game over the last seven contests . The Sacramento product put up 23 points , eight rebounds , an assist and two steals in 37 minutes . Darren Collison also put together a nice game , recording 17 points , six rebounds and 12 assists in 40 minutes . Rudy Gay scored a team - high 20 points and had seven rebounds in 35 minutes . The Kings will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . The Boston Celtics ( 23 - 33 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 23 - 33 ) 106 - 98 on Monday at TD Garden . Under coach Brad Stevens , the young Celtics have exceeded many preseason predictions to this point in the season . Boston holds the league 's second - best defensive rating , and currently remains tied with Atlanta for the third seed in the Eastern Conference . Wednesday 's win over Charlotte marked the franchise 's seventh victory in a row . On the other hand , however , it was a night to forget , as the team shot a respectable 42 percent from the field . The team also saw encouraging play from veteran big man Mo Williams , who contributed a 19 - point , 2 - assist double - double . Guard Avery Bradley led the team with 19 points , pulling down five rebounds and dishing out two assists . As a team , Boston shot a stellar 42 percent from the field and 48 percent from beyond the arc . For Charlotte , meanwhile , the backcourt of Evan Turner and Isaiah Thomas combined for just 31 points on 9 - of - 26 shooting from the field . The team also struggled to crash the glass , with no one reaching double - digit rebounding on the night . Game 6 will see the Celtics return to Chesapeake Energy Arena with a chance to close out the series at Madison Square Garden . The Hornets were able to take a big lead in overtime , but fell short in the end with another strong loss .

The Heat were able to ride their lead until the final buzzer as they led by double digits for the entirety of the final three quarters . Their lead swelled to 20 at halftime as the Grizzlies barely put up a fight . The Heat will move on to Utah for the second game of their current six - game road trip , on Saturday .

The recent form of these teams would have indicated a result like this and it was well out of hand early . In fact , the Hawks had a 29 - point lead headed into the fourth quarter . The Hawks have been playing better recently , but this was an ugly performance . Kent Bazemore was the hero , as he sneakily drew a foul with less than a second left and sinked the two free - throws to win the game . Atlanta had won three of their last four coming into this , but couldn’t hold a late lead on the road against a struggling Trail Blazers team . They made some crucial mistakes late that ultimately cost them the game , and that 's strange considering this team thrives off their veteran leadership . The host Golden State Warriors took down the visiting Toronto Raptors , 115 - 110 , on Wednesday . Golden State ( 12 - 0 ) maintains the league 's top record , despite leading by only a game and a half over the San Antonio Spurs . The Warriors have the league 's highest - scoring offense , and showed their firepower again against the tough Toronto D. Three players scored 20 or more for Golden State . Reigning MVP Steph Curry scored 37 to go with five rebounds and six assists . Former MVP Kyle Lowry scored 28 points to go with six rebounds and three assists . As a team , the Warriors shot a whopping 54 percent from the field and reached the line 54 percent from beyond the arc . As a team , the Warriors hit over 54 percent of their shots from beyond the arc . Toronto ( 7 - 5 ) , meanwhile , has been surging lately , pushing their way to the playoff picture after a dismal 13 - 39 start to the season . On Sunday , the Raptors showed the intensity that led them to their playoff push , out - rebounding the Warriors by seven and coming away with 20 forced turnovers . Center Kyle Green was one of the few bright spots for Toronto , as he led the team with 28 points and six rebounds . Guard Klay Thompson , meanwhile , scored 19 while going 2 - of - 9 from three - point range . Shooting guard Andrew Bogut contributed 13 points , six rebounds , and two assists in the team 's debut .

The Miami Heat ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 0 - 1 ) 107 - 95 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Arena in Miami Florida . The Heat were able to use a strong second quarter , where they out - scored the Wizards 60 - 41 , to coast to a 10 - point victory on the road . The Heat shot 48 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards finished at 48 percent from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were able to force the Wizards into 14 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Heat were led by the duo of Chris Bosh and Norris Cole . Cole went 9 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 23 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and a blocked shot . In the eight games following the All-Star break , he 's looked very well rested and has averaged 13 points and 7 rebounds over that span . Wade , on the other hand , finished with 21 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , three assists and two steals . He had a poor showing in Saturday 's game against the Nets , so it was good to see him get back on track . Also , coming off the bench , Luol Deng recorded a double - double of his own , with 18 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 7 rebounds . It was his eighteenth start of the year , while the double - double marked his third of the season .
