The Miami Heat defeated the host Orlando Magic , 130 - 136 , at Amway Center on Saturday . In a battle between two struggling teams , there were numerous swings , as it was clear both squads were desperate for a win . There were 10 ties and 10 lead changes in total , with no team leading by more than 12 points . Miami took care of business in the fourth quarter , outscoring Orlando , 20 - 24 . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Heat winning that battle , 48 - 47 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 13 more assists and committing three less turnovers . The Heat ( 9 - 20 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Hassan Vucevic continued his fantastic form , as he led the team with 32 points and 15 rebounds . Goran Dragic was second on the team , finishing with 19 points , four rebounds and five assists . Justise Winslow accumulated 13 points , five rebounds and two assists of his own . Justise Winslow was the only other Heat player in double figures , as he accumulated 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Magic ( 9 - 17 ) have been unlucky in terms of results this season and a win over the Magic shows just how good they can be . Serge Ibaka led the team in scoring , as he totaled 22 points and nine rebounds on 8 - of - 13 shooting . Goran Dragic finished second on the team , accruing 19 points , four rebounds and five assists . Justise Winslow accumulated 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Magic will look to keep rolling on Monday in a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 90 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard DeMar DeRozan in the offseason , inking the 27 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 40 points and adding four rebounds , an assist and a steal . While the stellar showing was n't necessarily a surprise from a player of his caliber , the fact that Jonas Valanciunas , and not Kyle Lowry , checked in as Toronto 's second - leading scorer was a tad more unexpected . The veteran big man dominated in his showdown with Andre Drummond , posting a 32 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . The dominant Raptors , which outscored Detroit in every quarter , did n't need much else , with Lowry the only other player to hit double digits on the scoreboard . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Tobias Harris ' 22 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Marcus Morris supplied a near double - double with 17 points , nine boards , three assists and a steal , but struggled from long range , draining only a pair of his eight three - point attempts . Drummond tallied 16 points , six rebounds and a steal , while the starting backcourt of Ish Smith and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope only managed 10 combined points on 4 - for - 19 shooting . In addition to the combined 72 points they received from DeRozan and Valanciunas , the Raptors saw Lowry pitch in with 10 points , eight assists , five boards and a steal . Accuracy was the All-Star point guard 's biggest issue , as he could only manage a 3 - for - 13 tally from the field , including 1 - for - 5 from behind the arc . DeMarre Carroll registered eight points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal , while rookie Pascal Siakam went for four points , nine boards and a steal over 22 minutes . Detroit next takes on the Magic in their home opener on Friday , while Toronto remains home for an Eastern Conference Finals re - match with the Cavaliers on Friday as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Utah Jazz , 91 - 83 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the NBA , this game was tight throughout . In fact , neither team had more than a nine - point lead until the final six minutes , as there were nine ties and 15 lead changes in total . The second half is where the Cavaliers really turned it on , outscoring Utah , 65 - 48 over the final 24 minutes . Cleveland was lights - out from the field , shooting 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . LeBron James carried the load for Cleveland , as he tallied 33 points , 10 rebounds and six assists on 13 - of - 20 shooting . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , tallying 21 points and four assists . Rudy Gobert finished with another double - double , totaling 20 points , 20 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Gordon Hayward accrued 13 points , four rebounds and four assists . LeBron James recorded a triple - double , as he accumulated 33 points , 10 rebounds and 6 assists . Kyrie Irving led the team with 21 points , adding four rebounds and four assists to his tally . Rudy Gobert was the only other Cavaliers player in double figures , as he accumulated 10 points , nine rebounds and four assists . The Cavaliers will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 50 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 16 - 61 ) by a score of 116 - 111 on Sunday . Sacramento came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Kings team . The key for Sacramento was their shooting , as they shot 53 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Timberwolves shot 48 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . The rebounding was huge for Sacramento as well , as they snatched down 49 rebounds to the Timberwolves 36 . Minnesota has been throttling teams , but this was easily their worst offensive performance of the year . No player scored more than 26 points and no player recorded double - digits in rebounds or assists . Zach LaVine had a nice game as well , as he amassed 21 points , five rebounds and four assists . Sacramento has a quick turnaround , as they play the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday in their next game . Sacramento has been struggling recently , but they showed some great resiliency in this game against a talented Minnesota team . Omri Casspi led the team in scoring , dropping 31 points on 12 - for - 20 shooting in the loss . Zach LaVine also had a nice game , as he amassed 21 points , 11 assists and five rebounds . The Timberwolves will look to play better in their next game on Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers . This was one of Sacramento 's best games of the season , as they got to sit the starters for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Kevin Martin had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 31 points and five rebounds in the loss . Zach LaVine also had a nice game , as he amassed 21 points , 11 assists and five rebounds . Up next for Minnesota is a matchup with the Dallas Mavericks on Sunday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 0 - 1 ) 99 - 92 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . After coming out of the third quarter down 71 - 64 , the Hawks were able to out - score the Nets 25 - 30 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to grab the four - point victory on the road in Brooklyn . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went just 46 percent from the floor and a meager 25 percent from deep . The Hawks also forced the Nets into 17 turnovers , while committing just 7 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Kyle Korver and Joe Johnson . Korver went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 21 points , while also adding seven rebounds and three assists . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Hawks ' seven - game win streak . Teague on the other hand shot 6 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding three assists . After shooting just 24 percent ( 5 - 13 FG ) from the field in Sunday 's game against the Rockets , it was good to see him get things turned around . Dennis Schroder finished with 17 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) and six assists as well . While he did n't reach his season average of 12 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to reach double figures was Jarrett Jack , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and two assists . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Nets will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
Wire-to-wire wins are quite the accomplishment in the NBA and it feels even better against a division rival . Indiana did just that , as this game was out of hand early . All five starters played well for the Pacers , as they all had at least one assist and one steal en route to a double - digit plus - minus margin . David West was the lone bright spot for Brooklyn , as he led the team with 22 points and six rebounds . George Hill was n't far behind , finishing with 20 points , six rebounds and two assists of his own . David West recorded a double - double , amassing 17 points and 5 rebounds . Luis Scola was a huge spark off the bench , as he provided 13 points and 4 rebounds . Things do n't get any easier for Brooklyn , as they travel to play the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday for their next game . The Pacers ( 11 - 20 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . Jarrett Jack was the player of the game , as he dropped 22 points , six rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting . George Hill finished second on the team in scoring , collecting 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . Lavoy Allen was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 10 points and seven rebounds . Luis Scola led the bench with 13 points and five rebounds .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 140 - 116 , at Toyota Center on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions right now , as the Rockets put it to the Clippers in this blowout win . Not only did they score at least 32 points in every quarter , they shot 56 percent from the field against one of the best defenses in the NBA . The Rockets did have a 26 - point lead that was brought down to six in the fourth quarter , but they responded with a 160 run to take control late . Houston took advantage of a happy whistle , as they went 36 - of - 43 from the free - throw line , while Los Angles took just 16 free - throw attempts . The Rockets also won the rebounding ( 45 - 38 ) and assisting ( 29 - 22 ) differential by seven a piece , as they never trailed after the first quarter . The Clippers ( 22 - 13 ) had to play this game without Chris Paul and Blake Griffin , as they were simply outmatched against a hot Rockets bunch . The frustration hit the fan too , as Austin Rivers and Doc Rivers were both ejected in the second quarter . Raymond Felton did all he could to keep them hanging around , as he led the team with 26 points , five rebounds and eight assists off the bench . DeAndre Jordan led the starters in his homecoming game , as he totaled 20 points and 13 rebounds on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Austin Rivers was the best player on the floor , as he accumulated 26 points , five rebounds and eight assists off the bench . DeAndre Jordan led the starters in his homecoming game , as he totaled 20 points and 13 rebounds on 9 - of - 11 shooting .
The Miami Heat defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 125 - 102 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . Miami was expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Heat , as they led by 10 after the first quarter and by 11 headed into the fourth quarter . Shooting was key , as the Heat were held to 42 percent from the field , while the 76ers shot 59 percent . Miami also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 49 - 33 . Ersan Ilyasova was the player of the game , as he led Miami with 21 points , five rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic finished with 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , as he provided 21 points , five rebounds and two assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , totaling 30 points , 20 rebounds and three blocks on 2 - of - 17 shooting . Ersan Ilyasova went just 5 - of - 11 from the field , but finished with 21 points , four rebounds and three assists . Tyler Johnson also scored 16 points off the bench , doing his best to keep the Sixers in this game . Philadelphia will host the New York Knicks on Wednesday for their next game . The Heat ( 21 - 30 ) are now below .500 across their last 21 games , with this loss being the worst of the season . Hassan Whiteside did all he could for Philadelphia , as he led the team with 30 points , 27 rebounds and three blocks . Dion Waiters was second on the team , collecting 21 points , seven assists and two steals . Goran Dragic accumulated 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Richaun Holmes came off the bench to provide 12 points and nine rebounds .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Orlando Magic , 113 - 86 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 35 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Orlando 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while Orlando went 35 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as the Hawks recorded more assists than the Magic , while committing less turnovers . The Hawks ( 30 - 21 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Paul Millsap carried the load , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and four assists . Dennis Schroder was the only other starter with more than 12 points , as he accrued 17 points , four rebounds and 10 assists . Jeff Green was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 16 points and three rebounds . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the team in scoring off the bench , as he provided 21 points , five rebounds and two assists .

The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 63 percent from the three - point line , while the Trail Blazers went 47 percent from the floor and a meager 40 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were also able to force the Trail Blazers into 14 turnovers , while only committing 14 of their own . The Raptors were led by their backcourt of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum , who combined for 62 of the team 's 110 points . Damian Lillard did his best to keep the Trail Blazers in this game , going 8 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 27 points , to go along with five assists and two blocked shots . It was a career - high in both points and blocks for DeRozan , as he continues to make his case for a larger role come next season . Crabbe finished with 17 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and two steals , while Crabbe finished with 17 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and three rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 14 rebounds per game . He had a poor showing in Friday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get back on track . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 79 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Sixers ( 6 - 18 ) came in to the contest short - handed , as Joel Embiid was given the night off to tend to elbow inflammation , while starting point guard Sergio Rodriguez sat out with an illness . That opened the door for Jahlil Okafor and T.J. McConnell to enter the starting five , and both parlayed their opportunities into highly productive performances . McConnell came within an assist of a triple - double , tallying 12 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while also adding three steals . Meanwhile , Okafor stepped up with 14 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . The two players combined to go 12 - of - 18 from the field , and the Sixers shot an outstanding 56 percent from the field overall , keying what was only their second road win of the season . Robert Covington actually led Philadelphia in scoring , posting 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind with 15 points , eight boards and a pair of steals . Nik Stauskas received some extra run off the bench as a residual effect of Rodriguez 's absence , and he turned in 10 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal to lead the second unit . Nerlens Noel , making his season debut after recovering from a knee injury , was only able to log 10 minutes off the bench before being forced from the game with a sprained ankle . He supplied eight points and a steal during his time on the court . Marcus Morris led the offensive effort for the Pistons ( 13 - 13 ) , registering a game - high 28 points and supplementing them with two rebounds , an assist and a block . Andre Drummond posted a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a game - high six steals . Reggie Jackson managed 10 points , three assists , a rebound and two steals . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again Sunday afternoon for a date with the Charlotte Hornets .
The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 108 - 90 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . Despite there being just five ties and six lead changes in this game , it was close throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 12 points , as the eight - point final margin was one of the largest leads of the game . Miami won this game , despite being out shot from the field , from three - point range and from the free - throw line . Rebounding was the decisive statistic , with the Heat winning that battle , 54 - 45 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 12 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Tyler Johnson was the Hawks best player , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds and five assists . Paul Dragic finished with 21 points , six rebounds and 3 assists . Goran Dragic was huge off the bench , providing 17 points , six rebounds and three assists . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , as he provided 23 points , five rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Paul Millsap was the player of the game , collecting 21 points , four rebounds and 1 assists on 6 - of - 9 shooting . Goran Dragic finished with 17 points , six rebounds and three assists . Willie Reed also played well off the bench , accruing 12 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks . Atlanta will be in action again on Wednesday , as they travel to play the Orlando Magic .
The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los Angeles Lakers 129 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . Denver ( 32 - 35 ) inches closer to a .500 record for the season and more importantly , show cased their ability to blow out the bottom tier teams while also staving off the Portland Trail Blazers for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference playoffs picture . Depth was on display for the Nuggets in the rout , as they went up 67 - 43 at the half and handed over much of the work to the bench , who also flexed their scoring prowess in the win . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) were unable to match the shooting efficiency the Nuggets had going , and finished 30 percent from three point range and 43 percent from the field , compared to the lights out 54 percent effort by Denver . Nikola Jokic and Danilo Gallinari each scored 18 points , and combined for 12 rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored 15 points and added 10 rebounds across 36 minutes . Jamal Murray and Will Barton each pitched in 22 points and each played 30 minutes , and combined for nine three - pointers . Lakers Ivan Zubac drew the start at center and offered a bright spot in the box score . Zubac scored 25 points , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished out an assist in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , while Brandon Ingram pitched in 14 points , one rebound and two assists . Next up , the Lakers visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 54 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) 116 - 121 on Tuesday . The game was an entertaining offensive display that was befitting of both teams ' high - octane attacks . Both clubs managed to top the 64 percent mark from the field , and drained a total of 21 three - pointers between them . The two teams also saw all five members of their respective starting fives manage double - digit point totals , and the Suns received another standout performance from reserve forward Zach LaVine , who 's proven to be a spectacular signing so far . In the end , it was another stat - sheet - stuffing effort from perennial All-Star Andrew Wiggins that helped key the victory . Minnesota was led by a 30 - point effort from standout rookie Karl-Anthony Towns , who also tallied 10 rebounds , five assists and a pair of steals . Knight was next with 30 points , five rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Ricky Rubio followed with 17 points , 11 assists , seven rebounds and three steals . Gorgui Dieng had a near double - double with 11 points , nine boards , a steal and a block . Ronnie Price paced the bench with 12 points and two rebounds , while Shabazz Muhammad was productive in a reserve role as well with 12 points , five rebounds and an assist . Minnesota remains in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday night . Wiggins added five rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block to his team - leading scoring total . The Golden State Warriors defeated the Utah Jazz 104 - 74 at Oracle Arena on Wednesday . The Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) picked up their eighth straight home win behind a strong all - around performance from their big scoring three . With the likes of Derrick Favors in the mix as the team leader in assists per game this season , he found himself as the outside part of the big three consisting of Kevin Durant , Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson . From addition to the point guard , Curry had a chance to shine , scoring 25 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) while also adding 10 rebounds and four assists . Steph Curry led all scorers in the contest with 25 points , to go along with four assists and three rebounds , in 30 minutes . Kevin Durant tallied 22 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , along with five rebounds , one assist and one block , in 25 minutes . Draymond Green was solid with 15 points , 11 rebounds and four assists , in 31 minutes . Joe Johnson chipped in 14 points on 5 - 9 shooting , in 22 minutes off the bench , while Trey Lyles added 11 points , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Warriors were missing Derrick Favors , who sat out with a sore knee , while Derrick Favors returned to the starting lineup after missing the previous two games with a knee injury . Thompson finished with 11 points on 2 - of - 10 shooting in 24 minutes .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Golden State Warriors , 128 - 119 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . The Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but they did a fine job lighting up the scoreboard on Saturday as well after falling behind early . All five members of their first unit tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Memphis shot a stellar 49 percent from the field overall and 39 percent from three - point range . They put their stamp on the game in the first quarter by jumping out to a 27 - 34 lead . Stephen Curry 's 40 - point night led the Grizzlies . Randolph posted a 27 - point , 13 - rebound double - double , while Thompson poured in 17 points and added six rebounds , an assist , and a steal . Memphis had the hot hand overall , posting respective success rates of 49 and 39 percent from the field and three - point range . Their pinpoint accuracy helped them overcome a whopping 12 turnovers , as did the 16 they elicited from the visitors . Conley added three rebounds and six assists to his team - high scoring total . Klay Thompson was next with 17 points , which he complemented with six rebounds and two assists . Tony Allen posted a 11 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and a steal . Zaza Pachulia provided 10 points , five rebounds , two assists and three steals . Curry led the way for the visitors with 40 points , six assists , three rebounds , one steal and a block . Zach Randolph was right behind him with a 27 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also featured six assists and a block . Tony Allen managed 11 points , two rebounds , three assists and a steal . Troy Daniels paced the second unit with 12 points , one rebound , an assist and a steal . The Warriors next head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Monday night , while the Grizzlies head to the Windy City for a Saturday night date with the Chicago Bulls .
